(Comparison)";s:7:"attribs";a:0:{}s:8:"xml_base";s:0:"";s:17:"xml_base_explicit";b:0;s:8:"xml_lang";s:0:"";}}s:4:"link";a:1:{i:0;a:5:{s:4:"data";s:51:"https://www.isitwp.com/wpml-vs-polylang-comparison/";s:7:"attribs";a:0:{}s:8:"xml_base";s:0:"";s:17:"xml_base_explicit";b:0;s:8:"xml_lang";s:0:"";}}s:8:"comments";a:1:{i:0;a:5:{s:4:"data";s:59:"https://www.isitwp.com/wpml-vs-polylang-comparison/#respond";s:7:"attribs";a:0:{}s:8:"xml_base";s:0:"";s:17:"xml_base_explicit";b:0;s:8:"xml_lang";s:0:"";}}s:7:"pubDate";a:1:{i:0;a:5:{s:4:"data";s:31:"Wed, 28 Aug 2019 08:29:33 +0000";s:7:"attribs";a:0:{}s:8:"xml_base";s:0:"";s:17:"xml_base_explicit";b:0;s:8:"xml_lang";s:0:"";}}s:8:"category";a:5:{i:0;a:5:{s:4:"data";s:17:"WordPress Plugins";s:7:"attribs";a:0:{}s:8:"xml_base";s:0:"";s:17:"xml_base_explicit";b:0;s:8:"xml_lang";s:0:"";}i:1;a:5:{s:4:"data";s:24:"Best translation plugins";s:7:"attribs";a:0:{}s:8:"xml_base";s:0:"";s:17:"xml_base_explicit";b:0;s:8:"xml_lang";s:0:"";}i:2;a:5:{s:4:"data";s:30:"Comparing multilingual plugins";s:7:"attribs";a:0:{}s:8:"xml_base";s:0:"";s:17:"xml_base_explicit";b:0;s:8:"xml_lang";s:0:"";}i:3;a:5:{s:4:"data";s:16:"WPML vs Polylang";s:7:"attribs";a:0:{}s:8:"xml_base";s:0:"";s:17:"xml_base_explicit";b:0;s:8:"xml_lang";s:0:"";}i:4;a:5:{s:4:"data";s:27:"WPML Vs Polylang Comparison";s:7:"attribs";a:0:{}s:8:"xml_base";s:0:"";s:17:"xml_base_explicit";b:0;s:8:"xml_lang";s:0:"";}}s:4:"guid";a:1:{i:0;a:5:{s:4:"data";s:32:"https://www.isitwp.com/?p=235080";s:7:"attribs";a:1:{s:0:"";a:1:{s:11:"isPermaLink";s:5:"false";}}s:8:"xml_base";s:0:"";s:17:"xml_base_explicit";b:0;s:8:"xml_lang";s:0:"";}}s:11:"description";a:1:{i:0;a:5:{s:4:"data";s:617:"<p>Looking to create a multilingual website? Setting up a multilingual site is the best way to expand your reach to a global audience. While there are dozens of WordPress translation plugins on the market, 2 of them stand out from the rest &#8211; WPML and Polylang. In this article, we&#8217;ll do a head-to-head comparison between [&#8230;]</p>\
<p>The post <a rel="nofollow" href="https://www.isitwp.com/wpml-vs-polylang-comparison/">WPML vs. Polylang &#8211; Which One Is Better? (Comparison)</a> appeared first on <a rel="nofollow" href="https://www.isitwp.com">IsItWP - WordPress Technology Lookup Tool</a>.</p>\
";s:7:"attribs";a:0:{}s:8:"xml_base";s:0:"";s:17:"xml_base_explicit";b:0;s:8:"xml_lang";s:0:"";}}}s:32:"http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/";a:1:{s:7:"creator";a:1:{i:0;a:5:{s:4:"data";s:14:"Editorial Team";s:7:"attribs";a:0:{}s:8:"xml_base";s:0:"";s:17:"xml_base_explicit";b:0;s:8:"xml_lang";s:0:"";}}}s:40:"http://purl.org/rss/1.0/modules/content/";a:1:{s:7:"encoded";a:1:{i:0;a:5:{s:4:"data";s:17129:"<p>Looking to create a multilingual website? Setting up a multilingual site is the best way to expand your reach to a global audience.</p>\
<p>While there are dozens of <a href="https://www.isitwp.com/best-wordpress-translation-plugins-compared/" rel="nofollow" target="_blank" data-nojs="true"title="12 Best WordPress Translation Plugins Compared">WordPress translation plugins</a> on the market, 2 of them stand out from the rest &#8211; WPML and Polylang.</p>\
<p>In this article, we&#8217;ll do a head-to-head comparison between these 2 popular translation plugins and help you decide which one is the best choice for your unique needs. </p>\
<h3>WPML vs. Polylang &#8211; Table of Contents</h3>\
<p>The goal of this comparison is to explore the features of both the plugins in detail and compare their features, how they differ and which one really suits your needs.</p>\
<p>We&#8217;ll mainly cover the following points. </p>\
<ul>\
<li>Ease of use</li>\
<li>Translation management</li>\
<li>Translation service</li>\
<li>Number of languages supported</li>\
<li>Text translations</li>\
<li>eCommerce support</li>\
<li>Media integration</li>\
<li>Support and documentation</li>\
</ul>\
<p>But before we dive into the actual features of the plugins, let&#8217;s have a quick overview. It will help you understand the plugins better if you&#8217;re not yet familiar with them.</p>\
<h3>WPML vs. Polylang &#8211; Overview</h3>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/wpml/" rel="nofollow" target="_blank" data-nojs="true" >WPML</a> is a powerful multilingual plugin with simplified controls and configurations. With over 40K active installations, there is absolutely no doubt, WPML is one of the most popular multilingual WordPress plugins on the WordPress market.</p>\
<p>WPML makes it super easy to translate your content into different languages without having to sacrifice any features of your website.</p>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/wpml/" rel="nofollow" target="_blank"><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/10/wpml-plugin-reviewed.jpg" alt="wpml vs polylang" width="775" height="365" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-224013" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/10/wpml-plugin-reviewed.jpg 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/10/wpml-plugin-reviewed-300x141.jpg 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/10/wpml-plugin-reviewed-768x362.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></a> </p>\
<p>WPML is a paid plugin. The pricing for this plugin starts at $29. </p>\
<p><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/polylang/" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">Polylang</a> is another robust translation plugin that stands as WPML&#8217;s biggest competitor. The user-interface of Polylang is super simple. All you have to do is to add your content, create pages, categories, and tags and then define the languages for each of them.</p>\
<p><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/polylang/" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank"><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/polylang.png" alt="polylang, polylang VS WPML" width="775" height="241" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-217038" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/polylang.png 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/polylang-300x93.png 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/polylang-768x239.png 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></a></p>\
<p>You can provide as many language recommendations as you want to your users. You can also use RTL language scripts with Polylang. The plugin automatically downloads the WordPress language package and then updates them on your website. So no matter which language you want, you can rest assured that you&#8217;ll have the right language package with Polylang.</p>\
<p>Polylang also offers a premium version with extended features and customization options. The pricing for the commercial version of Polylang starts at €99 (around $111).</p>\
<h3>Feature Comparison: WPML vs. Polylang</h3>\
<p>Being two of the most popular translation plugins, both the plugins are packed with amazing features. Since this is a comparison post, we&#8217;ll have a closer look at each of its features.</p>\
<p>That being said, let&#8217;s get started. </p>\
<h3>1. WPML vs. Polylang &#8211; Ease of Use</h3>\
<p>With <a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/wpml/" rel="nofollow" target="_blank" data-nojs="true" >WPML</a>, you can convert a single language website into a multilingual one in just a couple of minutes. . </p>\
<p><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/WPML-ease-of-use.jpg" alt="WPML ease of use" width="775" height="265" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-235123" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/WPML-ease-of-use.jpg 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/WPML-ease-of-use-300x103.jpg 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/WPML-ease-of-use-768x263.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></p>\
<p>When you install and activate WPML Multilingual CMS (the core plugin), you&#8217;ll be directed to a setup wizard where you can specify the essential settings, such as an option for setting up the default language, add additional languages, specify where to set up language switchers. The language switchers can be displayed on the menu, footer, and sidebars.</p>\
<p>It also lets you configure the structure of your URLs for multiple languages for subdomains, directories, and URL parameters. </p>\
<p>On the other hand, <a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/polylang/" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">Polylang</a> doesn&#8217;t have a quick start guide or setup wizard to make your life easier with the plugin configuration. </p>\
<p>To configure languages on your site, you&#8217;ll need to navigate to the <strong>Language</strong> option inside the Polylang settings within your WordPress dashboard. </p>\
<p><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/Ease-of-use-Polylang.png" alt="Ease of use Polylang. WPML vs Polylang" width="775" height="349" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-235121" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/Ease-of-use-Polylang.png 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/Ease-of-use-Polylang-300x135.png 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/Ease-of-use-Polylang-768x346.png 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></p>\
<p>From there, you can find options to add a new language. After adding the required languages, it&#8217;s pretty easy to handle add translate your content from your post and page editor. All you have to do is to <strong>select</strong> the right language and <strong>save</strong> your page.</p>\
<p>Like WPML,  with Polylang it&#8217;s possible to change or update language settings from within  WordPress dashboard. You can also apply string language settings and media language settings as well.</p>\
<h3>Winner</h3>\
<p>Both plugins make it easy to translate your content, but with the setup wizard, translation is even easier with WPML. So WPML is the winner when it comes to ease of use. </p>\
<h3>2. WPML vs. Polylang &#8211; Translation Management</h3>\
<p>Both Polylang and WPML support automatic and manual translation. With automatic translation, you can save time. However, in order to ensure the translation is accurate and sound human, it&#8217;s advised to translate manually by yourself or by hiring a translation expert. Let&#8217;s take a look at how these plugins let you manage the entire manual translation process. </p>\
<p>With <a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/wpml/" rel="nofollow" target="_blank" data-nojs="true" >WPML</a>, the translation management feature is offered as an addon. Once you activated the addon, you can send content for translation right from your dashboard. </p>\
<p>On the other hand, <a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/polylang/" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">Polylang</a> lets you integrate a cloud-based translation management system known as Lingotek. With Lingotek, you can access free machine translation or hire a professional to do that for you. The downside is that you&#8217;re required to install a third-party plugin, Lingotek and you need to set up an account with Lingotek. </p>\
<h3>Winner</h3>\
<p>WPML&#8217;s translation management is available as an addon, whereas Polylang requires you to install Lingotek, a third-party plugin. </p>\
<h3>3. WPML vs. Polylang &#8211; Number of Supported Languages</h3>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/wpml/" rel="nofollow" target="_blank" data-nojs="true" >WPML</a> is shipped with translation files for 64 languages which you can use right after the installation of the plugin. But in case you need additional languages, you can add them as well with the help of its language editor.</p>\
<p><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/WPML-languages.png" alt="WPML languages, WPML vs Polylang" width="775" height="716" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-235115" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/WPML-languages.png 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/WPML-languages-300x277.png 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/WPML-languages-768x710.png 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></p>\
<p><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/polylang/" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">Polylang</a> too does a great job in this regard. </p>\
<p><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/Polylang-languages.png" alt="Polylang languages, WPML vs Polylang" width="775" height="432" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-235116" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/Polylang-languages.png 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/Polylang-languages-300x167.png 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/Polylang-languages-768x428.png 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></p>\
<p>It supports more than a hundred languages for translations and you can add more as well. </p>\
<h3>Winner</h3>\
<p>In terms of the number of supported languages, Polylang stacks up against all their competitions. </p>\
<h3>4. WPML vs. Polylang &#8211; Localization Options</h3>\
<p>Both WPML and Polylang enable you to translate your texts coming from themes and plugins you use on your site. With this feature, you can build a multilingual admin area as well. </p>\
<p>WPML supports themes and plugin localization in three ways:</p>\
<ul>\
<li>Use only String Translation</li>\
<li>Use String Translation but load .mo files as a backup</li>\
<li>Only load the .mo files.</li>\
</ul>\
<p>However, if a specific translation is not present in the file <a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/wpml/" rel="nofollow" target="_blank" data-nojs="true" >WPML</a> and <a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/polylang/" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">Polylang</a> will let you provide your own translation of a specific language for any theme or plugin.</p>\
<p>In WPML, translating the website theme and plugin&#8217;s text is controlled by the <strong>String Translation</strong> feature. It actually searches for the translatable content in your theme and plugin and then enables you to add the alternative text.</p>\
<p>Polylang, uses <strong>Poedit</strong> and <strong>Loco Translate</strong> to translate the theme and plugin texts.</p>\
<h3>Winner</h3>\
<p>Both the plugins offer a pretty good job in terms of translating the themes and plugins.</p>\
<h3>5. WPML vs. Polylang &#8211; eCommerce Support</h3>\
<p>Well, if you want to build a multilingual eCommerce site then these plugins can be really helpful. eCommerce sites need more work in terms of setting up the entire shop as compared to simple blogs. </p>\
<p>And as long as you are using these two plugins there is nothing to worry about. The higher-priced <a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/wpml/" rel="nofollow" target="_blank" data-nojs="true" >WPML</a> cms license will cover everything required to translate your entire eCommerce website. The cms license costs you around $79 and is supported by other eCommerce integrations as well.</p>\
<p>In case you want to use Polylang to design a multilingual eCommerce store, then you should either upgrade to the <a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/polylang/" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">Polylang</a> Pro or purchase the WooCommerce add-on of Polylang.</p>\
<h3>Winner</h3>\
<p>Once again both the plugins offer great options but WPML can be the more optimal choice for users as it costs less.</p>\
<h3>6. Media Integrations</h3>\
<p>There is a lot to work on when it comes to translating media files like images and videos. If you display the image captions and work with the internal configurations like alt tags, naming, etc, then you should go for the plugin which has greater support to the media file.</p>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/wpml/" rel="nofollow" target="_blank" data-nojs="true" >WPML</a> comes with the media translation module that needs to be activated before you can translate media files. </p>\
<p><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/WPML-media-translations.png" alt="WPML vs Polylang, WPML media translations" width="775" height="690" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-235118" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/WPML-media-translations.png 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/WPML-media-translations-300x267.png 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/WPML-media-translations-768x684.png 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></p>\
<p>Using one media file for multiple languages is a great option since it will save a lot of work and space on the website. </p>\
<p><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/polylang/" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">Polylang</a> does pretty much the same work as WPML. </p>\
<p><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/Polylang-Media-translations.png" alt="Polylang media translations, WPLM vs Polylang" width="775" height="371" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-235119" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/Polylang-Media-translations.png 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/Polylang-Media-translations-300x144.png 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/Polylang-Media-translations-768x368.png 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></p>\
<p>You just need to enable a module inside the plugin and then, you can configure the media files with respective captions and names in multiple languages.</p>\
<h3>Winner</h3>\
<p>Since both WPML and Polylang does the same job, using any one of them can give you the same experience for your media files.</p>\
<h3>7. Support and Documentation</h3>\
<p>One of the advantages of choosing a premium WordPress plugin over a free plugin is that the premium plugin comes with premium support. This can be extremely beneficial because if you&#8217;re stuck at any point while using or configuring the plugin you can get in touch with the support team or refer to the documentation and get your issues fixed.</p>\
<p>As a premium plugin, the <a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/wpml/" rel="nofollow" target="_blank" data-nojs="true" >WPML</a> plugin beats the pants of all its competition when it comes to support. The online documentation is very detailed and it explains everything clearly from setting up the plugin to using its features for best results.</p>\
<p><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/polylang/" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">Polylang</a> doesn&#8217;t offer support for its free plugin. Their documentation is not as extensive as the WPML plugin.</p>\
<h3>Winner</h3>\
<p>WPML is a clear winner when it comes to support</p>\
<h3>Conclusion: Which One is Better &#8211; WPML or Polylang?</h3>\
<p>Both <a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/wpml/" rel="nofollow" target="_blank" data-nojs="true" >WPML</a> and <a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/polylang/" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">Polylang</a> are great choices for creating a multilingual website. We believe WPML is a better translation plugin than Polylang because of its easy-to-use setup wizard and excellent support.</p>\
<p>If you&#8217;d rather go with a free plugin, then Polylang is the right choice for you. We hope this article helps you find out the right translation plugin for your needs. </p>\
<p>If you are interested, you can go into the details of <a href="https://www.isitwp.com/easily-create-multilingual-wordpress-website/">creating a multilingual site with WPML</a> and <a href="https://www.wpbeginner.com/beginners-guide/how-to-easily-create-a-multilingual-wordpress-site/" rel="noopener" target="_blank">with Polylang </a>. </p>\
<p>The post <a rel="nofollow" href="https://www.isitwp.com/wpml-vs-polylang-comparison/">WPML vs. Polylang &#8211; Which One Is Better? (Comparison)</a> appeared first on <a rel="nofollow" href="https://www.isitwp.com">IsItWP - WordPress Technology Lookup Tool</a>.</p>\

\	\	";s:7:"attribs";a:0:{}s:8:"xml_base";s:0:"";s:17:"xml_base_explicit";b:0;s:8:"xml_lang";s:0:"";s:5:"child";a:5:{s:0:"";a:7:{s:5:"title";a:1:{i:0;a:5:{s:4:"data";s:65:"14 Best WordPress Gutenberg Plugins to Enhance Your Editor (2019)";s:7:"attribs";a:0:{}s:8:"xml_base";s:0:"";s:17:"xml_base_explicit";b:0;s:8:"xml_lang";s:0:"";}}s:4:"link";a:1:{i:0;a:5:{s:4:"data";s:63:"https://www.isitwp.com/best-wordpress-gutenberg-blocks-plugins/";s:7:"attribs";a:0:{}s:8:"xml_base";s:0:"";s:17:"xml_base_explicit";b:0;s:8:"xml_lang";s:0:"";}}s:8:"comments";a:1:{i:0;a:5:{s:4:"data";s:71:"https://www.isitwp.com/best-wordpress-gutenberg-blocks-plugins/#respond";s:7:"attribs";a:0:{}s:8:"xml_base";s:0:"";s:17:"xml_base_explicit";b:0;s:8:"xml_lang";s:0:"";}}s:7:"pubDate";a:1:{i:0;a:5:{s:4:"data";s:31:"Tue, 27 Aug 2019 10:08:20 +0000";s:7:"attribs";a:0:{}s:8:"xml_base";s:0:"";s:17:"xml_base_explicit";b:0;s:8:"xml_lang";s:0:"";}}s:8:"category";a:4:{i:0;a:5:{s:4:"data";s:17:"WordPress Plugins";s:7:"attribs";a:0:{}s:8:"xml_base";s:0:"";s:17:"xml_base_explicit";b:0;s:8:"xml_lang";s:0:"";}i:1;a:5:{s:4:"data";s:13:"block plugins";s:7:"attribs";a:0:{}s:8:"xml_base";s:0:"";s:17:"xml_base_explicit";b:0;s:8:"xml_lang";s:0:"";}i:2;a:5:{s:4:"data";s:16:"gutenberg blocks";s:7:"attribs";a:0:{}s:8:"xml_base";s:0:"";s:17:"xml_base_explicit";b:0;s:8:"xml_lang";s:0:"";}i:3;a:5:{s:4:"data";s:16:"gutenberg editor";s:7:"attribs";a:0:{}s:8:"xml_base";s:0:"";s:17:"xml_base_explicit";b:0;s:8:"xml_lang";s:0:"";}}s:4:"guid";a:1:{i:0;a:5:{s:4:"data";s:32:"https://www.isitwp.com/?p=236358";s:7:"attribs";a:1:{s:0:"";a:1:{s:11:"isPermaLink";s:5:"false";}}s:8:"xml_base";s:0:"";s:17:"xml_base_explicit";b:0;s:8:"xml_lang";s:0:"";}}s:11:"description";a:1:{i:0;a:5:{s:4:"data";s:665:"<p>It&#8217;s always been possible to create blog posts and media-rich pages on WordPress, but it could have been easier. Now it is thanks to the WordPress Gutenberg editor. Without a doubt, Gutenberg transforms your editing experience in WordPress. Even if you&#8217;re an absolute newbie to WordPress, you can easily write articles and create media-rich pages. [&#8230;]</p>\
<p>The post <a rel="nofollow" href="https://www.isitwp.com/best-wordpress-gutenberg-blocks-plugins/">14 Best WordPress Gutenberg Plugins to Enhance Your Editor (2019)</a> appeared first on <a rel="nofollow" href="https://www.isitwp.com">IsItWP - WordPress Technology Lookup Tool</a>.</p>\
";s:7:"attribs";a:0:{}s:8:"xml_base";s:0:"";s:17:"xml_base_explicit";b:0;s:8:"xml_lang";s:0:"";}}}s:32:"http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/";a:1:{s:7:"creator";a:1:{i:0;a:5:{s:4:"data";s:14:"Editorial Team";s:7:"attribs";a:0:{}s:8:"xml_base";s:0:"";s:17:"xml_base_explicit";b:0;s:8:"xml_lang";s:0:"";}}}s:40:"http://purl.org/rss/1.0/modules/content/";a:1:{s:7:"encoded";a:1:{i:0;a:5:{s:4:"data";s:19648:"<p>It&#8217;s always been possible to create blog posts and media-rich pages on WordPress, but it could have been easier. Now it is thanks to the WordPress Gutenberg editor.</p>\
<p>Without a doubt, Gutenberg transforms your editing experience in WordPress. Even if you&#8217;re an absolute newbie to WordPress, you can easily write articles and create media-rich pages.</p>\
<p>In this article, we&#8217;ll show you some of the best WordPress Gutenberg plugins that enhance your editing experience.</p>\
<h3>Why You Need WordPress Gutenberg Plugins</h3>\
<p>WordPress comes with a lot of Gutenberg blocks, such as paragraph, image, bullet points, etc.  that let you easily build a page the way you want without having to memorize the shortcode. All you have to do is to choose the right block and add it to your page. If you want to enhance your editing experience even further, you can install a Gutenberg blocks plugin. </p>\
<p>For example, if you want to <a href="https://www.isitwp.com/add-contact-form-wordpress-website/" title="How to Create a Contact Form on WordPress (the Easy Way)">add a contact form to your page</a>, you just need to install WPForms and add the WPForms block from your Blocks list to your page. Best of all, instead of a shortcode, you&#8217;ll see the form fields in the editor, meaning you don&#8217;t have to switch to the preview page to see how your form would look like.</p>\
<h3><a href="https://wpforms.com/" rel="noopener" target="_blank">1. WPForms</a></h3>\
<p><a href="https://wpforms.com/" rel="noopener" target="_blank"><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/wpforms.png" alt="WPForms, user registration,  plugin, user login plugin" width="775" height="350" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-231941" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/wpforms.png 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/wpforms-300x135.png 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/wpforms-768x347.png 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></a></p>\
<p><a href="https://wpforms.com" rel="noopener" target="_blank">WPForms</a> is one of the most <a href="https://www.isitwp.com/best-wordpress-contact-form-plugins/" title="17 Best Form Plugins for WordPress in 2019 (Most Are Free!)">popular form builder plugins</a> that lets you create different kinds of forms using a block. Whether you want to add a contact form, survey form, payment form or any other forms, WPForms makes it easy to embed it onto your page. </p>\
<p>You can easily choose from its library of pre-built templates and start customizing it if you want. All forms you create with WPForms are responsive, meaning they look great on phone, tablet, and computer.  </p>\
<h3><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/envira-gallery/" rel="nofollow" target="_blank" data-nojs="true" >2. Envira Gallery</a></h3>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/envira-gallery/" rel="nofollow" target="_blank" data-nojs="true" ><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/envira-gallery-review.png" alt="envira gallery review" width="775" height="350" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-221521" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/envira-gallery-review.png 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/envira-gallery-review-300x135.png 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/envira-gallery-review-768x347.png 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></a></p>\
<p>With <a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/envira-gallery/" rel="nofollow" target="_blank" data-nojs="true" >Envira Gallery</a>, you can create image and video galleries on your <a href="https://www.isitwp.com/how-to-make-a-website-step-by-step/" title="How to Make a Website - Step by Step (with Pictures)">WordPress website</a>. You can use its native blocks to embed your galleries on your site.</p>\
<p>The plugin lets you use some really cool features on your galleries like watermark protection, image proofing etc. You can also sell your images with Easy Digital Downloads or WooCommerce integration. </p>\
<h3><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/arraythemes-atomicblocks/" rel="nofollow" target="_blank" data-nojs="true" >3. Atomic Blocks</a></h3>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/arraythemes-atomicblocks/" rel="nofollow" target="_blank" data-nojs="true" ><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Aomic-blocks.png" alt="Aomic blocks, gutenberg block plugins" width="750" height="329" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-236376" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Aomic-blocks.png 750w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Aomic-blocks-300x132.png 300w" sizes="(max-width: 750px) 100vw, 750px" /></a></p>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/arraythemes-atomicblocks/" rel="nofollow" target="_blank" data-nojs="true" >Atomic Blocks</a> is another amazing WordPress Gutenberg plugin that comes with great options to add beautiful custom blocks to your website. It&#8217;s a collection of blocks for the Gutenberg editor which let you easily build a page the way you want. </p>\
<p>It comes with a wide variety of blocks, such as advanced column block, newsletter block, pricing tables, containers, buttons and more. Best of all, you can use this plugin with any theme you want. </p>\
<h3><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/kadence-blocks-pro/" rel="nofollow" target="_blank" data-nojs="true" >4. Kadence</a></h3>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/kadence-blocks-pro/" rel="nofollow" target="_blank" data-nojs="true" ><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Kadence-Blocks-Pro-Kadence-WP.png" alt="" width="775" height="469" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-236378" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Kadence-Blocks-Pro-Kadence-WP.png 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Kadence-Blocks-Pro-Kadence-WP-300x182.png 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Kadence-Blocks-Pro-Kadence-WP-768x465.png 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></a></p>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/kadence-blocks-pro/" rel="nofollow" target="_blank" data-nojs="true" >Kadence</a> is an amazing WordPress Gutenberg block plugin that comes with beautiful custom blocks that are ready to use right away. Its block options run the gamut from icons, buttons to row and grid/carousel. </p>\
<p>All of these blocks are super flexible and supports 800+ Google fonts. You&#8217;ll also have over 1500 icons to choose from. </p>\
<h3><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/kingblocks/" rel="nofollow" target="_blank" data-nojs="true" >5. KingBlocks</a></h3>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/kingblocks/" rel="nofollow" target="_blank" data-nojs="true" ><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Kingblocks.png" alt="Kingblocks" width="775" height="427" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-236379" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Kingblocks.png 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Kingblocks-300x165.png 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Kingblocks-768x423.png 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></a></p>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/kingblocks/" rel="nofollow" target="_blank" data-nojs="true" >KingBlocks</a> is a WordPress Gutenberg plugin that comes with 20 striking blocks for your website. All blocks are fully responsive, so your content will look great regardless of the device you&#8217;re using to browse your site.</p>\
<p>KingBlocks makes use of the Leaflet JavaScript library to embed a mobile-friendly map on your pages. This plugin is compatible with most themes and plugins. </p>\
<h3><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/code-canyon-cpelementia/" rel="nofollow" target="_blank" data-nojs="true" >6. CPElementia</a></h3>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/code-canyon-cpelementia/" rel="nofollow" target="_blank" data-nojs="true" ><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/CPElementia.jpg" alt="CPElementia" width="775" height="357" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-236380" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/CPElementia.jpg 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/CPElementia-300x138.jpg 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/CPElementia-768x354.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></a></p>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/code-canyon-cpelementia/" rel="nofollow" target="_blank" data-nojs="true" >CPElementia</a> is yet another WordPress Gutenberg plugin that offers a huge collection of Gutenberg blocks and extended component features. This plugin is available to purchase from the Codecanyon marketplace.</p>\
<p>Here are a few blocks that are available on CPElementia: </p>\
<ul>\
<li>countdown timer </li>\
<li>feature boxes </li>\
<li>social icons</li>\
<li>pricing lists</li>\
<li>and more&#8230;</li>\
</ul>\
<h3><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/code-canyon-soloblocks/" rel="nofollow" target="_blank" data-nojs="true" >7. Solo Blocks</a></h3>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/code-canyon-soloblocks/" rel="nofollow" target="_blank" data-nojs="true" ><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Solo.png" alt="Solo" width="775" height="404" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-236385" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Solo.png 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Solo-300x156.png 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Solo-768x400.png 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></a></p>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/code-canyon-soloblocks/" rel="nofollow" target="_blank" data-nojs="true" >SoloBlocks</a> is a nice plugin that let you create rich post layouts for your website. With this plugin, you can add additional blocks to your website without hassle. It offers the easiest way to add more blocks and you will just love it.</p>\
<p>This plugin is compatible with almost all modern themes and you can also use any other advanced plugin if you want alongside it. </p>\
<h3><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/code-canyon-inster-instagram-block/" rel="nofollow" target="_blank" data-nojs="true" >8. Inster Instagram Block</a></h3>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/code-canyon-inster-instagram-block/" rel="nofollow" target="_blank" data-nojs="true" ><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Inster-–-Instagram-Block-for-WP.png" alt="Gutenberg block plugins" width="775" height="373" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-236393" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Inster-–-Instagram-Block-for-WP.png 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Inster-–-Instagram-Block-for-WP-300x144.png 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Inster-–-Instagram-Block-for-WP-768x370.png 768w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Inster-–-Instagram-Block-for-WP-330x160.png 330w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></a></p>\
<p>The popularity of Instagram has been increasing every day. If you love using Instagram and want to showcase your profile on your WordPress website, <a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/code-canyon-inster-instagram-block/" rel="nofollow" target="_blank" data-nojs="true" >Inster Instagram block</a> is one plugin that you need to check out. With this plugin, you can display your profile in a grid form using its Gutenberg blocks. </p>\
<p>Inster allows you to display Instagram feed using your username, location ID or tag. Your pictures will be shown great on all devices. It also lets you add initial animation effects to give you feed a distinct look. </p>\
<h3><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/otter-blocks/" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">9. Otter Blocks</a></h3>\
<p><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/otter-blocks/" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank"><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Otter.png" alt="" width="775" height="258" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-236394" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Otter.png 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Otter-300x100.png 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Otter-768x256.png 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></a></p>\
<p><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/otter-blocks/" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">Otter</a> is a free Gutenberg block plugin that lets you add some really cool blocks to your website. You can use these blocks to create any kind of design including complex eCommerce pages. </p>\
<p>With Otter Blocks, you can add some advanced heading blocks, section blocks, button groups, testimonials, Google maps and more. It just takes you a few seconds to get it ready. </p>\
<h3><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/ultimate-blocks/" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">10. Ultimate</a></h3>\
<p><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/ultimate-blocks/" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank"><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Ultimate.png" alt="Ultimate block plugin" width="775" height="258" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-236395" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Ultimate.png 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Ultimate-300x100.png 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Ultimate-768x256.png 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></a></p>\
<p><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/ultimate-blocks/" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">Ultimate</a> is another popular WordPress Gutenberg plugin that have already bagged 2k active installs. This plugin provides you with a collection of 18 blocks to give a distinct look to your site.</p>\
<p>Whether you want to build a portfolio site, an eCommerce store or anything else, you have all the blocks you&#8217;ll need. Ultimate works beautifully with other advanced plugins and looks stunning on all screen sizes. It is also compatible across all browsers.  </p>\
<h3><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/advanced-gutenberg/" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">11. Advanced Gutenberg</a></h3>\
<p><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/advanced-gutenberg/" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank"><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Advanced-Gutenberg.png" alt="Advanced Gutenberg, block plugins" width="775" height="271" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-236396" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Advanced-Gutenberg.png 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Advanced-Gutenberg-300x105.png 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Advanced-Gutenberg-768x269.png 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></a></p>\
<p><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/advanced-gutenberg/" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">Advanced Gutenberg</a> is an excellent plugin that comes with all the essential blocks you&#8217;ll need to enhance your editing experience. It comes with more than 20 brilliant blocks that are fully customizable. </p>\
<p>This is a free plugin that&#8217;s available to download from WordPress.org. It has been installed on over 10,000 websites all around the globe.</p>\
<h3><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/stackable-ultimate-gutenberg-blocks/" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">12. Stackable</a></h3>\
<p><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/stackable-ultimate-gutenberg-blocks/" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank"><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Stackable-–-Gutenberg-Blocks.png" alt="" width="775" height="252" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-236397" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Stackable-–-Gutenberg-Blocks.png 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Stackable-–-Gutenberg-Blocks-300x98.png 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Stackable-–-Gutenberg-Blocks-768x250.png 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></a></p>\
<p>Use the ready-to-use custom blocks by <a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/stackable-ultimate-gutenberg-blocks/" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">Stackable</a> to make your design stand out. All blocks offered by Stackable are super robust and extremely flexible. </p>\
<p>In total it offers 23 block styles. You can use these blocks to display your content beautifully. </p>\
<h3><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/coblocks/" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">13. Coblocks</a></h3>\
<p><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/coblocks/" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank"><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/coblocks.png" alt="" width="775" height="255" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-236404" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/coblocks.png 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/coblocks-300x99.png 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/coblocks-768x253.png 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></a></p>\
<p><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/coblocks/" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">Coblocks</a> is yet another Gutenberg block plugin that you need to check out. Although it&#8217;s a free plugin, it comes with the most amazing collection of blocks that you&#8217;ll love using. If you want a real page builder experience using the blocks, this is a plugin you will surely need.</p>\
<p>You will get to use more than 23 blocks to meet your requirements. From food block, gif blocks, click to tweet block and more, this plugin offers everything that is missing in the Gutenberg editor. </p>\
<h3><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/tinymce-advanced/" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">14. TinyMCE</a></h3>\
<p><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/tinymce-advanced/" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank"><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/TinyMCE-Advanced-.png" alt="TinyMCE Advanced" width="775" height="342" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-236408" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/TinyMCE-Advanced-.png 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/TinyMCE-Advanced--300x132.png 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/TinyMCE-Advanced--768x339.png 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></a></p>\
<p><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/tinymce-advanced/" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">TinyMCE</a> is a bit different from the plugins that we discussed so far. This plugin helps you stick to your classic editor if you are still not ready to switch to Gutenberg. Plus, you can access all the amazing features of the block editor. </p>\
<p>The plugin comes with an improved “Clear Formatting” button, and several advanced settings for your tables. You also have an option to always keep paragraph tags in the block editor. </p>\
<p>These are some of the WordPress Gutenberg plugins that enhance your WordPress editing experience. If you want to <a ahref="https://optinmonster.com/11-web-design-principles-that-will-boost-your-conversion-rate/" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">create beautiful websites that convert, here are some designing principles</a> you need to check out. </p>\

Blog";s:7:"attribs";a:0:{}s:8:"xml_base";s:0:"";s:17:"xml_base_explicit";b:0;s:8:"xml_lang";s:0:"";}}s:4:"link";a:1:{i:0;a:5:{s:4:"data";s:54:"https://www.isitwp.com/wordpress-autoblogging-plugins/";s:7:"attribs";a:0:{}s:8:"xml_base";s:0:"";s:17:"xml_base_explicit";b:0;s:8:"xml_lang";s:0:"";}}s:8:"comments";a:1:{i:0;a:5:{s:4:"data";s:62:"https://www.isitwp.com/wordpress-autoblogging-plugins/#respond";s:7:"attribs";a:0:{}s:8:"xml_base";s:0:"";s:17:"xml_base_explicit";b:0;s:8:"xml_lang";s:0:"";}}s:7:"pubDate";a:1:{i:0;a:5:{s:4:"data";s:31:"Mon, <p>The post <a rel="nofollow" href="https://www.isitwp.com/wordpress-autoblogging-plugins/">7 Best WordPress Autoblogging Plugins to Autopilot Your Blog</a> appeared first on <a rel="nofollow" href="https://www.isitwp.com">IsItWP - WordPress Technology Lookup Tool</a>.</p>\
";s:7:"attribs";a:0:{}s:8:"xml_base";s:0:"";s:17:"xml_base_explicit";b:0;s:8:"xml_lang";s:0:"";}}}s:32:"http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/";a:1:{s:7:"creator";a:1:{i:0;a:5:{s:4:"data";s:14:"Editorial Team";s:7:"attribs";a:0:{}s:8:"xml_base";s:0:"";s:17:"xml_base_explicit";b:0;s:8:"xml_lang";s:0:"";}}}s:40:"http://purl.org/rss/1.0/modules/content/";a:1:{s:7:"encoded";a:1:{i:0;a:5:{s:4:"data";s:11187:"<p>Are you looking for the best WordPress autoblogging plugins? Starting a blog is easy but a lot of people struggle with producing content on a regular basis for their blog. </p>\
<p>WordPress autoblogging plugins allow you to curate content from other sources and display them on your blog. You can also rephrase and post fresh articles.</p>\
<p>In this article, we&#8217;ll share some of the best WordPress autoblogging plugins to autopilot your blog.</p>\
<h3>Why WordPress Autoblogging Plugins?</h3>\
<p>Running a blog and adding new content every day isn&#8217;t an easy job. With a WordPress autoblogging plugin, you can autopilot your blog and post new content on a regular basis. </p>\
<p>A WordPress autoblogging plugin imports content from various RSS feeds to your WordPress site. Some plugins even rephrase your WordPress content and ensures you have no duplicate content. </p>\
<p>There&#8217;re hundreds of free and premium WordPress plugins for autoblogging. But before you dive in and choose a plugin for your blog, keep in mind that autoblogging isn&#8217;t for everyone. While an autoblogging plugin makes it easy to post regular articles on your blog, instead of simply copying articles, it&#8217;s in your best interest to change your curated content in some way so as to ensure your site doesn&#8217;t get penalized for duplicate content. </p>\
<p>Here are a few recommended practices to follow if you&#8217;re using an autoblogging plugin.</p>\
<ul>\
<li>Feature only excerpts instead of an entire article.</li>\
<li>Add twice as much original content than sourced content. </li>\
<li>Add commentary in between your gathered content.</li>\
</ul>\
<h3><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/themeisle-freedzy-rss-feeds/" title="Feedzy RSS" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">1. Feedzy RSS</a></h3>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/themeisle-freedzy-rss-feeds/" title="Feedzy RSS" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank"><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/feedzyrss.jpg" alt="Feedzy RSS" width="775" height="250" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-236482" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/feedzyrss.jpg 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/feedzyrss-300x97.jpg 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/feedzyrss-768x248.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></a></p>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/themeisle-freedzy-rss-feeds/" title="Feedzy RSS" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">Feedzy RSS</a> is a popular WordPress autoblogging plugin. It allows you to display content from unlimited RSS feeds on your website. Feedzy RSS integrates with WordAI and SpinnerCheif to rephrase the articles that you imported, so you can always add fresh content to your blog automatically.</p>\
<p>It supports complex media, including audio playback and YouTube videos. You can also blacklist keywords to fully control what you want to show on your WordPress blog.</p>\
<h3><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/wp-rss-aggregator/" title="WP RSS Aggregator" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">2. WP RSS Aggregator</a></h3>\
<p><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/wp-rss-aggregator/" title="WP RSS Aggregator" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank"><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/wprssaggregator.jpg" alt="WP RSS Aggregator" width="775" height="250" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-236481" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/wprssaggregator.jpg 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/wprssaggregator-300x97.jpg 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/wprssaggregator-768x248.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></a></p>\
<p><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/wp-rss-aggregator/" title="WP RSS Aggregator" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">WP RSS Aggregator</a> is a free and popular WordPress autoblogging plugin. It gives you the option to import, merge, and display RSS feeds from multiple resources. It also imports Atom feeds and shows them on your WordPress blog. WP RSS Aggregator has custom templates with styling options for the feeds.</p>\
<p>It supports shortcodes and blocks to display feeds on posts, pages, and custom post types. It allows you to import content from unlimited websites and even manage all sources from your WordPress dashboard&#8230;</p>\
<h3><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/wpematico/" title="RSS Feed Fetcher" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">3. RSS Feed Fetcher</a></h3>\
<p><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/wpematico/" title="RSS Feed Fetcher" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank"><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/rss-feed-catcher.jpg" alt="RSS Feed Catcher" width="775" height="250" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-236485" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/rss-feed-catcher.jpg 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/rss-feed-catcher-300x97.jpg 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/rss-feed-catcher-768x248.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></a></p>\
<p><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/wpematico/" title="RSS Feed Fetcher" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">RSS Feed Catcher</a> is an easy to use WordPress autoblogging plugin. It comes with an easy-to-use interface that lets you manage content that you import from other websites. You can curate content into categories and schedule them based on your preferred interval.</p>\
<p>It also imports images with the RSS feeds using WordPress functions. </p>\
<h3><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/cybersyn/" title="CyberSEO" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">4. CyberSEO</a></h3>\
<p><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/cybersyn/" title="CyberSEO" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank"><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/cyberseo.jpg" alt="CyberSEO" width="775" height="250" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-236488" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/cyberseo.jpg 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/cyberseo-300x97.jpg 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/cyberseo-768x248.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></a></p>\
<p><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/cybersyn/" title="CyberSEO" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">CyberSEO</a> is an advanced WordPress autoblogging and content curation plugin. It imports RSS and Atom feeds to display articles on your blog. It translates content from over 100 languages using Google Translate and Yandex Translate to publish in your language.</p>\
<p>With third-party spinners, it lets you rephrase sourced content to make sure your content isn&#8217;t plagiarized. It also embeds media content, including images and videos.</p>\
<h3><a href="https://wprobot.net/" title="WP Robot" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">5. WP Robot</a></h3>\
<p><a href="https://wprobot.net/" title="WP Robot" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank"><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/wprobot.jpg" alt="WP Robot" width="775" height="250" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-236486" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/wprobot.jpg 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/wprobot-300x97.jpg 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/wprobot-768x248.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></a></p>\
<p><a href="https://wprobot.net/" title="WP Robot" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">WP Robot</a> is a premium WordPress autoblogging plugin. It aggregates RSS feeds from relevant resources and publishes regular content on your blog. It allows you to customize sourced articles and works well with all <a href="https://www.isitwp.com/top-wordpress-themes/" title="The Best and Most Popular WordPress Themes (UPDATED)">top WordPress themes</a>.</p>\
<p>It supports 30 content sources, including Amazon, eBay, YouTube, Vimeo, Flickr, etc. to import the content. You can also curate eCommerce products and sell them on your online store. It has tools for translations, content rephrasing, and more. WP Robot drip-feed the content on your blog, and even lets you publish bulk articles with 1-click manually.</p>\
<h3><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/wp-pipes/" title="WP Pipes" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">6. WP Pipes</a></h3>\
<p><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/wp-pipes/" title="WP Pipes" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank"><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/wppipes.jpg" alt="WP Pipes" width="775" height="250" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-236483" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/wppipes.jpg 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/wppipes-300x97.jpg 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/wppipes-768x248.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></a></p>\
<p><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/wp-pipes/" title="WP Pipes" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">WP Pipes</a> is a powerful and free WordPress autoblogging plugin. It&#8217;s perfect for importing news from multiple resources and RSS feeds, and even imports WooCommerce products.</p>\
<p>WP Pipes allows you to build a pipeline of content to post on the blog. It publishes articles and WooCommerce products to your social pages like Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, and more automatically.</p>\
<h3><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/rss-import/" title="RSSImport" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">7. RSSImport</a></h3>\
<p><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/rss-import/" title="RSSImport" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank"><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/rssimport.png" alt="RSSImport" width="775" height="250" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-236484" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/rssimport.png 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/rssimport-300x97.png 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/rssimport-768x248.png 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></a></p>\
<p><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/rss-import/" title="RSSImport" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">RSSImport</a> is a simple WordPress autoblogging plugin that imports RSS feeds and display content on your blog. It supports widgets and shortcodes to post articles.</p>\
<p>You can also use template codes to add articles to your pages.</p>\
<p>That&#8217;s all.</p>\
<p>We hope this article helped you find the best WordPress autoblogging plugin to autopilot your blog. You may also want to check out our article on <a href="https://www.isitwp.com/best-wordpress-plugins-for-user-generated-content/" title="9 Best WordPress Plugins for User Generated Content">best WordPress plugins for user generated content</a>.</p>\

\	\	";s:7:"attribs";a:0:{}s:8:"xml_base";s:0:"";s:17:"xml_base_explicit";b:0;s:8:"xml_lang";s:0:"";s:5:"child";a:5:{s:0:"";a:7:{s:5:"title";a:1:{i:0;a:5:{s:4:"data";s:68:"How to A/B Split Test Your WordPress Forms to Boost Your Conversions";s:7:"attribs";a:0:{}s:8:"xml_base";s:0:"";s:17:"xml_base_explicit";b:0;s:8:"xml_lang";s:0:"";}}s:4:"link";a:1:{i:0;a:5:{s:4:"data";s:52:"https://www.isitwp.com/ab-split-test-wordpess-forms/";s:7:"attribs";a:0:{}s:8:"xml_base";s:0:"";s:17:"xml_base_explicit";b:0;s:8:"xml_lang";s:0:"";}}s:8:"comments";a:1:{i:0;a:5:{s:4:"data";s:60:"https://www.isitwp.com/ab-split-test-wordpess-forms/#respond";s:7:"attribs";a:0:{}s:8:"xml_base";s:0:"";s:17:"xml_base_explicit";b:0;s:8:"xml_lang";s:0:"";}}s:7:"pubDate";a:1:{i:0;a:5:{s:4:"data";s:31:"Fri, 23 Aug 2019 14:04:04 +0000";s:7:"attribs";a:0:{}s:8:"xml_base";s:0:"";s:17:"xml_base_explicit";b:0;s:8:"xml_lang";s:0:"";}}s:8:"category";a:5:{i:0;a:5:{s:4:"data";s:19:"WordPress Tutorials";s:7:"attribs";a:0:{}s:8:"xml_base";s:0:"";s:17:"xml_base_explicit";b:0;s:8:"xml_lang";s:0:"";}i:1;a:5:{s:4:"data";s:18:"a/b test web forms";s:7:"attribs";a:0:{}s:8:"xml_base";s:0:"";s:17:"xml_base_explicit";b:0;s:8:"xml_lang";s:0:"";}i:2;a:5:{s:4:"data";s:11:"a/b testing";s:7:"attribs";a:0:{}s:8:"xml_base";s:0:"";s:17:"xml_base_explicit";b:0;s:8:"xml_lang";s:0:"";}i:3;a:5:{s:4:"data";s:25:"how to a/b test web forms";s:7:"attribs";a:0:{}s:8:"xml_base";s:0:"";s:17:"xml_base_explicit";b:0;s:8:"xml_lang";s:0:"";}i:4;a:5:{s:4:"data";s:20:"split test web forms";s:7:"attribs";a:0:{}s:8:"xml_base";s:0:"";s:17:"xml_base_explicit";b:0;s:8:"xml_lang";s:0:"";}}s:4:"guid";a:1:{i:0;a:5:{s:4:"data";s:32:"https://www.isitwp.com/?p=235515";s:7:"attribs";a:1:{s:0:"";a:1:{s:11:"isPermaLink";s:5:"false";}}s:8:"xml_base";s:0:"";s:17:"xml_base_explicit";b:0;s:8:"xml_lang";s:0:"";}}s:11:"description";a:1:{i:0;a:5:{s:4:"data";s:614:"<p>Do you want to A/B split test your WordPress forms? A/B split testing helps you compare two versions of your WordPress forms and determine which one performs better. There are many tools that allow you to A/B test your web forms. We use and recommend Google Optimize, the free a/b testing and personalization tool by [&#8230;]</p>\
<p>The post <a rel="nofollow" href="https://www.isitwp.com/ab-split-test-wordpess-forms/">How to A/B Split Test Your WordPress Forms to Boost Your Conversions</a> appeared first on <a rel="nofollow" href="https://www.isitwp.com">IsItWP - WordPress Technology Lookup Tool</a>.</p>\
";s:7:"attribs";a:0:{}s:8:"xml_base";s:0:"";s:17:"xml_base_explicit";b:0;s:8:"xml_lang";s:0:"";}}}s:32:"http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/";a:1:{s:7:"creator";a:1:{i:0;a:5:{s:4:"data";s:14:"Editorial Team";s:7:"attribs";a:0:{}s:8:"xml_base";s:0:"";s:17:"xml_base_explicit";b:0;s:8:"xml_lang";s:0:"";}}}s:40:"http://purl.org/rss/1.0/modules/content/";a:1:{s:7:"encoded";a:1:{i:0;a:5:{s:4:"data";s:16400:"<p>Do you want to A/B split test your WordPress forms? A/B split testing helps you compare two versions of your WordPress forms and determine which one performs better. </p>\
<p>There are many tools that allow you to A/B test your web forms. We use and recommend Google Optimize, the free a/b testing and personalization tool by Google. </p>\
<p>In this article, we&#8217;ll show you how to A/B split test your WordPress forms to boost your conversions.</p>\
<h3>Why Should You A/B Split Test WordPress Forms?</h3>\
<p>Your web form is the first point where an actual interaction with your customer begins. Not to mention, it should be impactful so as to encourage more people to fill in the details.  </p>\
<p>A/B split testing allows you to create one or more variants of any web form. </p>\
<p>For example, in your variant, you can add an additional form field, change the placeholder, change the copy of the button or anything else that you can think of that would bring in more engagement. Once you created a variant, by default, half of your traffic is shown the original version of the page and half are shown the modified version.</p>\
<p>After the test, you&#8217;ll get to know which form is driving more conversions, so you can stick to the one that resonates best with your audience.</p>\
<h3>Choosing the Right A/B Testing Tool for WordPress &#8211; Google Optimize</h3>\
<p>We use and recommend Google Optimize to set up a/b tests. Google Optimize is a free A/B testing and personalization solution by Google. Best of all, it&#8217;s natively integrated with Google Analytics so you can use your Analytics data to create experiments quickly and easily.</p>\
<p><a href="https://www.monsterinsights.com" title="MonsterInsights" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">MonsterInsights</a> is the best plugin that lets you easily connect Google Analytics and Google Optimize on your WordPress website. With MonsterInsights, you don&#8217;t have to touch a single line of code to set up Google Optimize. All you have to do is to install the Google Optimize addon and you&#8217;ll be ready to start experiments. </p>\
<h4>Step 1: Get Started With Google Optimize</h4>\
<p>The first thing you&#8217;ll need to do is to install and activate the <a href="https://www.monsterinsights.com" title="MonsterInsights" rel="nofollow" target="_blank">MonsterInsights</a> plugin. For more details, check out our guide on <a href="https://www.isitwp.com/install-google-analytics-wordpress-site/" title="How to Install Google Analytics">how to connect Google Analytics with MonsterInsights.</a></p>\
<p>Once you completed the set up process, you need to visit <strong>Insights &raquo; Addons</strong> and install the <strong>Google Optimize</strong> Addon.</p>\
<p><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/googleoptimizeaddon.jpg" alt="Google Optimize Addon" width="775" height="200" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-236108" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/googleoptimizeaddon.jpg 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/googleoptimizeaddon-300x77.jpg 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/googleoptimizeaddon-768x198.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></p>\
<p>After that, you need to create an account on <a href="https://www.google.com/analytics/optimize/" title="Google Optimize" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">Google Optimize</a>.</p>\
<p>Once logged in, hit the <strong>Get Started</strong> button.</p>\
<p><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/get-started.jpg" alt="Get started" width="775" height="358" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-236105" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/get-started.jpg 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/get-started-300x139.jpg 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/get-started-768x355.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></p>\
<p>Next, you&#8217;ll be asked to agree to the terms and conditions. Finally, click on the <strong>Finished</strong> button, and you&#8217;ll be directed to the main page.</p>\
<p><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/finised-setting.jpg" alt="Finished and redirected" width="775" height="328" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-236106" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/finised-setting.jpg 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/finised-setting-300x127.jpg 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/finised-setting-768x325.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></p>\
<p>Now, you&#8217;ll see a container information section on the right-hand side of the screen. </p>\
<p>Google automatically creates an Account ID and Container ID for you. However, you have the option to change them if you want by clicking on Edit Container Details.</p>\
<p>The account section allows you to run your A/B testing experiments and the container is where your Optimize configurations for your A/B testing experiments are saved. You can click on the three vertical dots to edit container details and manage notifications.</p>\
<p><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/edit-container.jpg" alt="Edit container" width="775" height="336" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-236109" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/edit-container.jpg 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/edit-container-300x130.jpg 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/edit-container-768x333.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></p>\
<p>The container information is created by Google automatically. However, you can change the container name, account ID, and container ID in this section.</p>\
<h3>Step 2: Link Google Optimize to Your Google Analytics Account</h3>\
<p>In order to start collecting your A/B testing data on Google Analytics, you&#8217;ll need to link your Google Optimize to Google Analytics.</p>\
<p>To link the accounts, On the right-hand side of your screen, you need to expand the <strong>Link to Google Analytics</strong> section and click on the <strong>Link Property</strong> button.</p>\
<p><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/link-property.jpg" alt="Link property" width="775" height="350" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-236110" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/link-property.jpg 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/link-property-300x135.jpg 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/link-property-768x347.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></p>\
<p>Now click on the dropdown to select a property that you want to link with Google Optimize. If you don&#8217;t find the property that you want to link, then follow this guide to <a href="https://www.monsterinsights.com/how-to-add-a-property-in-google-analytics/" title="How to Create a Property in Google Analytics" rel="noopener" target="_blank">create a property in Google Analytics</a>.</p>\
<p><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/link-analytics.jpg" alt="Link analytics" width="775" height="360" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-236136" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/link-analytics.jpg 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/link-analytics-300x139.jpg 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/link-analytics-768x357.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></p>\
<p>Data can now flow between both your Google Optimize and Analytics accounts.</p>\
<h3>Step 3: Add Google Optimize to WordPress</h3>\
<p>MonsterInsights makes it easy for you to add Google Optimize to your website using the <strong>Optimize</strong> addon that you&#8217;ve installed previously.</p>\
<p>To do this, you&#8217;ll need the container ID which is available in the container information section. Copy the container ID from there.</p>\
<p><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/container-id.jpg" alt="Container ID" width="776" height="183" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-236112" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/container-id.jpg 776w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/container-id-300x71.jpg 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/container-id-768x181.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 776px) 100vw, 776px" /></p>\
<p>Now head over to your WordPress admin area and visit <strong>Insights &raquo; Settings &raquo; Tracking &raquo; Google Optimize</strong> to paste the Google Optimize Container ID.</p>\
<p><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/mi-container-id.jpg" alt="Container ID" width="775" height="375" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-236113" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/mi-container-id.jpg 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/mi-container-id-300x145.jpg 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/mi-container-id-768x372.jpg 768w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/mi-container-id-330x160.jpg 330w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></p>\
<p>Click on the <strong>Save Changes</strong> button. You have successfully added Google Optimize to your website.</p>\
<h3>Step 4: Start the A/B Test Experiment</h3>\
<p>Now you can start A/B split testing for your WordPress forms. For the sake of this tutorial, we&#8217;ll take a signup form as an example to run the test.</p>\
<p>You need to visit your Google Optimize account and click on the <strong>Let&#8217;s Go</strong> button to create an experiment.</p>\
<p><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/create-experiment.jpg" alt="Create an experiment" width="775" height="385" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-236120" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/create-experiment.jpg 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/create-experiment-300x149.jpg 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/create-experiment-768x382.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></p>\
<p>A sidebar popup will appear where you&#8217;ll be asked to enter the name of your experiment and URL of the signup form page.</p>\
<p>After specifying the details, you&#8217;ll need to select the type of experiment/test you want to perform on your specified URL.</p>\
<p>Click on the <strong>A/B Test</strong> option which allows you to test two or more variants of a page.</p>\
<p><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/ab-test-experiment.jpg" alt="A/B Test" width="775" height="294" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-236126" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/ab-test-experiment.jpg 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/ab-test-experiment-300x114.jpg 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/ab-test-experiment-768x291.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></p>\
<p>Once selected, click on the <strong>Create</strong> button.</p>\
<p>Now you&#8217;ll notice that your test is still in the <strong>Draft</strong> mode. To start the experiment, you&#8217;ll need to take a few more steps. Start by adding a variant to your original signup form. To do that, click on the <strong>Add Variant</strong> button and type a name for the variant you want to create.</p>\
<p><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/add-variant.jpg" alt="Add variant" width="775" height="319" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-236127" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/add-variant.jpg 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/add-variant-300x123.jpg 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/add-variant-768x316.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></p>\
<p>Now click on the <strong>Edit</strong> button to make changes in the new variant of your signup form.</p>\
<p><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/edit-variant.jpg" alt="Edit variant" width="775" height="167" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-236128" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/edit-variant.jpg 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/edit-variant-300x65.jpg 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/edit-variant-768x165.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></p>\
<p>This will take you to the <strong>Optimize Visual Editor</strong> where you can customize the size of the fields, change labels, edit button text, and more.</p>\
<p><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/optimizeeditor.jpg" alt="Optimize Visual Editor" width="775" height="355" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-236129" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/optimizeeditor.jpg 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/optimizeeditor-300x137.jpg 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/optimizeeditor-768x352.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></p>\
<p>Once you make all the changes, click on the <strong>Save</strong> and <strong>Finished</strong> buttons.</p>\
<p>After that, you need to define the objectives for your A/B test. These objectives will help you decide which signup form variant the winner is.</p>\
<p>Click on the <strong>Add Experiment Objective</strong> link. There are many pre-defined objectives, including pageviews, bounces, and session durations. You can also set a custom objective for the experiment.</p>\
<p><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/bounces.jpg" alt="Bounces" width="775" height="195" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-236130" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/bounces.jpg 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/bounces-300x75.jpg 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/bounces-768x193.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></p>\
<p>For this experiment, we&#8217;ll be choosing <strong>Bounces</strong> as our objective to find out which signup form has the lowest bounce rate.</p>\
<p>You can also custom objectives that are not mentioned in the account.</p>\
<p>Finally, you&#8217;ll need to define a percentage for how many people should see the original sign up form and its variant.</p>\
<p>By default, if you only have one variant, the traffic will be split equally between the original page and its variant.</p>\
<p>You can click on the weight to customize it, but make sure the balance weight is 100%.</p>\
<p><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/edit-variant-weight.jpg" alt="Edit variant weight" width="775" height="440" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-236132" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/edit-variant-weight.jpg 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/edit-variant-weight-300x170.jpg 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/edit-variant-weight-768x436.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></p>\
<p>Then, click on the <strong>Finished</strong> button.</p>\
<p>That&#8217;s all. You can click on the <strong>Start</strong> button to start your experiment.</p>\
<p><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/start-experiment.jpg" alt="Start experiment" width="775" height="400" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-236133" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/start-experiment.jpg 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/start-experiment-300x155.jpg 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/start-experiment-768x396.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></p>\
<p>It&#8217;s advised to at least run the A/B test experiment for two weeks or more to make sure you&#8217;ve gathered enough data. Once enough data has been collected, Google will declare a winner.</p>\
<p>We hope this guide helped you learn how to A/B test WordPress forms. You may also want to check out the <a href="https://www.isitwp.com/best-wordpress-analytics-solutions-compared/" title="13 Best WordPress Analytics Plugins">best WordPress analytics plugins</a>.</p>\
<p>The post <a rel="nofollow" href="https://www.isitwp.com/ab-split-test-wordpess-forms/">How to A/B Split Test Your WordPress Forms to Boost Your Conversions</a> appeared first on <a rel="nofollow" href="https://www.isitwp.com">IsItWP - WordPress Technology Lookup Tool</a>.</p>\

alternatives";s:7:"attribs";a:0:{}s:8:"xml_base";s:0:"";s:17:"xml_base_explicit";b:0;s:8:"xml_lang";s:0:"";}i:2;a:5:{s:4:"data";s:25:"best adsense
