<p>The post <a rel="nofollow" href="https://www.isitwp.com/best-google-adsense-alternatives/">9 Best Google AdSense Alternatives to Monetize Your Website</a> appeared first on <a rel="nofollow" href="https://www.isitwp.com">IsItWP - WordPress Technology Lookup Tool</a>.</p>\
";s:7:"attribs";a:0:{}s:8:"xml_base";s:0:"";s:17:"xml_base_explicit";b:0;s:8:"xml_lang";s:0:"";}}}s:32:"http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/";a:1:{s:7:"creator";a:1:{i:0;a:5:{s:4:"data";s:14:"Editorial Team";s:7:"attribs";a:0:{}s:8:"xml_base";s:0:"";s:17:"xml_base_explicit";b:0;s:8:"xml_lang";s:0:"";}}}s:40:"http://purl.org/rss/1.0/modules/content/";a:1:{s:7:"encoded";a:1:{i:0;a:5:{s:4:"data";s:13095:"<p>Are you looking for the best Google AdSense alternatives to monetize your website?</p>\
<p>AdSense is the most popular advertising service in the world for earning money from ads. However, if your AdSense account is banned or deleted for any reason, then you&#8217;ll need to use another method to continue monetizing your content.</p>\
<p>In this article, we&#8217;ll share 9 of the best Google AdSense alternatives you can use.</p>\
<h3><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/shareasale/" title="ShareASale" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">1. ShareASale</a></h3>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/shareasale/" title="ShareASale" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank"><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/shareasale.jpg" alt="ShareASale" width="775" height="340" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-232111" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/shareasale.jpg 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/shareasale-300x132.jpg 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/shareasale-768x337.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></a></p>\
<p>ShareASale is the most popular affiliate marketing network. It offers multiple categories like fashion, technology, business, etc. which allows many varied business niches to earn extra money. You can sign up for any product that&#8217;s registered with <a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/shareasale/" title="ShareASale" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">ShareASale</a> and get your commission on each sale.</p>\
<p>It can be an alternative to Google AdSense as it generates income from your website traffic. It&#8217;s easy to join and you&#8217;ll be paid on a monthly basis. However, you&#8217;ll need the minimum $50 payment balance in your affiliate account to withdraw your revenue.</p>\
<h3><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/media-net/" title="Media.net" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">2. Media.net</a></h3>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/media-net/" title="Media.net" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank"><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/medianet.jpg" alt="Media.net" width="775" height="340" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-232107" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/medianet.jpg 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/medianet-300x132.jpg 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/medianet-768x337.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></a></p>\
<p>Media.net is a similar service to <a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/google-adsense/" title="Google AdSense" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">Google AdSense</a> and can easily be used as an alternative. It displays contextual ads with customized designs that are relevant to your website&#8217;s content. It integrates with Yahoo! Bing Network&#8217;s contextual ads program to increase your outreach.</p>\
<p>With their native ads technique, they improve user engagement and personalize the look of your <a href="https://www.isitwp.com/best-wordpress-landing-page-plugins/" title="7 Best WordPress Landing Page Plugins That Convert">landing pages</a>. All their ads are fully responsive and look great on any screen size. Media.net pays out any revenue earned every 30 days.</p>\
<h3><a href="https://adbuff.com/" title="AdBuff" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">3. AdBuff</a></h3>\
<p><a href="https://adbuff.com/" title="AdBuff" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank"><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/adbuff.jpg" alt="AdBuff" width="775" height="340" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-232116" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/adbuff.jpg 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/adbuff-300x132.jpg 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/adbuff-768x337.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></a></p>\
<p>AdBuff is an AdSense-like ad network that connects you with advertisers. It has a real-time dashboard to see your revenue status, so you can properly manage your ads. The account manager allows you to review the performance of an ad and helps optimize it for better results.</p>\
<p>All their ads are family-friendly and protected from malicious content. It has integration with popular advertising companies to boost your revenue. AdBuff pays your earned revenue on a net 45 basis.</p>\
<h3><a href="https://www.bidvertiser.com/publisher/" title="Bidvertiser" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">4. Bidvertiser</a></h3>\
<p><a href="https://www.bidvertiser.com/publisher/" title="Bidvertiser" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank"><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/bidvertiser.jpg" alt="Bidvertiser" width="775" height="340" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-232115" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/bidvertiser.jpg 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/bidvertiser-300x132.jpg 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/bidvertiser-768x337.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></a></p>\
<p>Bidvertiser is a direct advertising network you can use to monetize your website&#8217;s traffic and content. It has a control panel to <a href="https://www.isitwp.com/best-seo-tools-to-grow-your-site-traffic/" title="9 Best SEO Tools to Grow Your Website Traffic, FAST!">optimize your traffic</a> and uses Smartlink technology to send your users directly to the chosen links. Unlike other ad services, your account will be approved right away. The ad formats include banners, sliders, popups, and more.</p>\
<p>It works with your website, mobile apps, extensions, and all other resources to monetize your traffic. Bidvertiser displays safe ads and integrates with popular payment services, like PayPal, to dispatch your revenue. You can withdraw your earned revenue with a balance as low as $10.</p>\
<h3><a href="https://www.popads.net/" title="PopAds" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">5. PopAds</a></h3>\
<p><a href="https://www.popads.net/" title="PopAds" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank"><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/popads.jpg" alt="PopAds" width="775" height="340" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-232114" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/popads.jpg 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/popads-300x132.jpg 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/popads-768x337.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></a></p>\
<p>PopAds is a popular advertising network and ad publishing service. It&#8217;s a direct alternative to Google AdSense and is a high-paying solution. You can get your account approved and start publishing ads on your website in no time.</p>\
<p>All their ads are optimized to load quickly and efficiently. PopAds is liked by thousands of publishers for their unique payment criteria. They pay on a daily basis if you hit the minimum $5 / day target.</p>\
<h3><a href="https://affiliate-program.amazon.com/" title="Amazon Associates" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">6. Amazon Associates</a></h3>\
<p><a href="https://affiliate-program.amazon.com/" title="Amazon Associates" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank"><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/amazonassociates.jpg" alt="Amazon Associates" width="775" height="340" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-232113" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/amazonassociates.jpg 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/amazonassociates-300x132.jpg 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/amazonassociates-768x337.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></a></p>\
<p>Amazon Associates is one of the best affiliate programs in the world. It may not be a direct alternative to Google AdSense, but you can earn commissions from selling Amazon products on your website. If you own an <a href="https://www.isitwp.com/how-to-create-an-online-store-step-by-step/" title="How to Create an Online Store – Step by Step (with Pictures)">eCommerce store</a>, then you can simply sign up for the Amazon Associates program and display dynamic image ads on your website.</p>\
<p>Since Amazon has millions of products, you can choose to display the most relevant items to your product line. Amazon Associates pays up to 10% commission on each sale.</p>\
<p>You can also <a href="https://www.isitwp.com/create-amazon-affiliate-store-wordpress-make-money/" title="How to Create an Amazon Affiliate Store With WordPress (and Make Money)">create your own Amazon affiliate store</a> to earn more money.</p>\
<h3><a href="https://adsterra.com/" title="Adsterra" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">7. Adsterra</a></h3>\
<p><a href="https://adsterra.com/" title="Adsterra" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank"><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/adsterra.jpg" alt="Adsterra" width="775" height="340" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-232112" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/adsterra.jpg 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/adsterra-300x132.jpg 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/adsterra-768x337.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></a></p>\
<p>Adsterra is a digital advertising network for publishers and advertisers. It comes with a personal account manager to monitor the performance of your ad campaigns. You can target web and mobile traffic separately to make the most of your ads. It also shows real-time performance statistics for your ads.</p>\
<p>All ads are secured by their in-house team and with the help of third-party solutions. The minimum payout for Adsterra is $100 and they pay twice a month to publishers.</p>\
<h3><a href="https://publishers.propellerads.com/#/pub/auth" title="Propeller Ads" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">8. Propeller Ads</a></h3>\
<p><a href="https://publishers.propellerads.com/#/pub/auth" title="Propeller Ads" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank"><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/propellerads.jpg" alt="Propeller Ads" width="775" height="340" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-232110" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/propellerads.jpg 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/propellerads-300x132.jpg 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/propellerads-768x337.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></a></p>\
<p>Propeller Ads is another alternative to <a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/google-adsense/" title="Google AdSense" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">Google AdSense</a>. It&#8217;s a performance-driven advertising and affiliate network that allows you to create conversion-focused campaigns. It has an AI system that automates ad optimization and produces amazing results. Propeller Ads is a self-serving platform with real-time, in-depth statistics on your ads&#8217; performances.</p>\
<p>It offers multiple ad formats including onclick ads, native ads, etc. It also comes with an affiliate program to earn commissions on sales. You can choose from multiple payment gateways to pull out your income. Propeller Ads pay on a net 30 basis. For a few select countries, they also offer weekly payments.</p>\
<h3><a href="https://www.revenuehits.com/lps/pubref" title="RevenueHits" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">9. RevenueHits</a></h3>\
<p><a href="https://www.revenuehits.com/lps/pubref" title="RevenueHits" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank"><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/revenuehits.jpg" alt="RevenueHits" width="775" height="340" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-232108" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/revenuehits.jpg 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/revenuehits-300x132.jpg 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/revenuehits-768x337.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></a></p>\
<p>RevenueHits is another popular advertising network on the market. It guarantees quick approval of your account and boosts the ads to generate money from your website. It has multiple formats to display ads like banners, buttons, sliders, popups, etc.</p>\
<p>You can take out your revenue through PayPal, Payoneer, and other popular payment gateways. The minimum income amount to withdraw your money is $50, and they pay on a net 30 basis.</p>\

Thousands of blogs and websites are being hacked every day. In this article, we&#8217;ll show you some of the best WordPress security authentication plugins. Why Use a WordPress Security [&#8230;]</p>\
<p>The post <a rel="nofollow" href="https://www.isitwp.com/best-wordpress-security-authentication-plugins/">9 Best WordPress Security Authentication Plugins (Compared)</a> appeared first on <a rel="nofollow" href="https://www.isitwp.com">IsItWP - WordPress Technology Lookup Tool</a>.</p>\
";s:7:"attribs";a:0:{}s:8:"xml_base";s:0:"";s:17:"xml_base_explicit";b:0;s:8:"xml_lang";s:0:"";}}}s:32:"http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/";a:1:{s:7:"creator";a:1:{i:0;a:5:{s:4:"data";s:14:"Editorial Team";s:7:"attribs";a:0:{}s:8:"xml_base";s:0:"";s:17:"xml_base_explicit";b:0;s:8:"xml_lang";s:0:"";}}}s:40:"http://purl.org/rss/1.0/modules/content/";a:1:{s:7:"encoded";a:1:{i:0;a:5:{s:4:"data";s:15006:"<p>Is your website secure enough? Thousands of blogs and websites are being hacked every day. </p>\
<p>You&#8217;ll need to ensure your site is secure from potentially vulnerable threats by imposing security authentication while logging into your site. </p>\
<p>In this article, we&#8217;ll show you some of the best WordPress security authentication plugins. </p>\
<h3>Why Use a WordPress Security Authentication Plugin?</h3>\
<p>There are tons of amazing <a href="https://www.isitwp.com/best-wordpress-security-plugins-compared/" title="8 Best WordPress Security Plugins Compared">WordPress security plugins</a> that can protect your website and inform you about any suspicious activities when detected.</p>\
<p>It&#8217;s also important for you to enable security authentication, so you can rest assured that only authorized users are logging into your site. A security authentication plugin can authorize users automatically or let them go through two-factor authentication.</p>\
<h3><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/ithemes-security/" rel="nofollow" target="_blank" data-nojs="true" >1. iThemes Security</a></h3>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/ithemes-security/" rel="nofollow" target="_blank" data-nojs="true" ><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/09/ithemes-security.png" alt="iThemes Security, security plugins" width="775" height="350" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-222794" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/09/ithemes-security.png 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/09/ithemes-security-300x135.png 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/09/ithemes-security-768x347.png 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></a></p>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/ithemes-security/" rel="nofollow" target="_blank" data-nojs="true" >iThemes Security</a> is an excellent WordPress security authentication plugin that helps you keep your website safe and secure with its two-factor authentication feature. When it&#8217;s enabled, a user will not be able to log into your website unless they first provide the password and then the secondary code sent to their authentication app. </p>\
<p>It also checks for multiple login attempts and limits the number of attempts per user with WordPress brute force protection. The plugin watches out for users who try altering any file on the site. If any such action is detected, the plugin will immediately send you a notification so that you can take appropriate action. In case you suspect vulnerability, you can even lock out user access to the site during a specified time.</p>\
<h3><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/wp-login-plus/" rel="nofollow" target="_blank" data-nojs="true" >2. WP Login Plus</a></h3>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/wp-login-plus/" rel="nofollow" target="_blank" data-nojs="true" ><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/WP-login-Plus.png" alt="security authentication plugins" width="775" height="401" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-236081" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/WP-login-Plus.png 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/WP-login-Plus-300x155.png 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/WP-login-Plus-768x397.png 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></a></p>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/wp-login-plus/" rel="nofollow" target="_blank" data-nojs="true" >WP Login Plus</a> is a robust plugin that offers amazing protection to your website with its user ID authentication process. It lets you customize the login page as well. With this plugin, you can even add login animations to your website. If you think you don&#8217;t want it anymore, just disable it and you&#8217;re done. </p>\
<p>It also lets you add an auto-complete option, so that users can skip entering every little detail for registering or logging in to the site. The details will be automatically filled out based on the data from the computer memory.</p>\
<h3><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/code-canyon-worldpay-xml-direct-gateway-woocommerce/" rel="nofollow" target="_blank" data-nojs="true" >3. WorldPay XML Direct</a></h3>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/code-canyon-worldpay-xml-direct-gateway-woocommerce/" rel="nofollow" target="_blank" data-nojs="true" ><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/WorldPay-plugin.png" alt="Security authentication plugin" width="775" height="409" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-236082" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/WorldPay-plugin.png 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/WorldPay-plugin-300x158.png 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/WorldPay-plugin-768x405.png 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></a></p>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/code-canyon-worldpay-xml-direct-gateway-woocommerce/" rel="nofollow" target="_blank" data-nojs="true" >WorldPay XML Direct</a> is a fantastic WordPress authentication plugin for WooCommerce site. It&#8217;s best suited for you if you <a href="https://www.isitwp.com/legit-ways-to-make-money-online-blogging/" title="30 Ways to Make Money Online Blogging (On the Side)">accept online payments</a> or donations. With this plugin, you can first securely capture all payment details on your server and then send the captured data to WorldPay. It will then be processed using WorldPay’s hosted payment pages.</p>\
<p>You can also have full control over the way your customers sees the payment pages. It supports the cardholder authentication and makes sure that all your payments are processed with the MasterCard’s SecureCode security protocol. You can use this plugin to accept your payments in multiple currencies as well. </p>\
<h3><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/code-canyon-wp-magic-link-login/" rel="nofollow" target="_blank" data-nojs="true" >4. WP Magic Link Login</a></h3>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/code-canyon-wp-magic-link-login/" rel="nofollow" target="_blank" data-nojs="true" ><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/WP-Magic-Link-Login-1.png" alt="WP Magic Link Login" width="775" height="376" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-236087" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/WP-Magic-Link-Login-1.png 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/WP-Magic-Link-Login-1-300x146.png 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/WP-Magic-Link-Login-1-768x373.png 768w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/WP-Magic-Link-Login-1-330x160.png 330w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></a></p>\
<p>With the <a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/code-canyon-wp-magic-link-login/" rel="nofollow" target="_blank" data-nojs="true" >WP Magic Link Login</a> plugin, you can empower your users to log in to your website without a password. All they need to do is submit their email addresses. The plugin will then automatically send a link to the given email address. This link expires after a specified time. </p>\
<p>To enhance security, you can enable an option that accepts users from the same IP address only. </p>\
<h3><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/wordfence/" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">5. Wordfence Security</a></h3>\
<p><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/wordfence/"rel="nofollow" target="_blank" data-nojs="true"><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/Wordfence.png" alt="Wordfence security plugin" width="775" height="350" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-235406" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/Wordfence.png 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/Wordfence-300x135.png 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/Wordfence-768x347.png 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></a></p>\
<p><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/wordfence/" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">Wordfence Security</a> is a free security plugin that identifies and blocks malicious traffic in order to ensure your website is totally safe. The plugin comes with a real-time IP blocker that actively works to block all requests from any suspicious IP addresses.</p>\
<p>It also has a malware scanner that will block all request that comes with dangerous code. The two-factor authentication form that comes with the plugin proactively protects your site from spammers.</p>\
<p>If you have multiple admins, it is possible for you to block some of them as well using the known compromised password. You can use the plugin on an unlimited number of websites and it will notify you of any breached password attacks, administrator logins, suspicious actions on the site, etc.</p>\
<h3><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/rublon/" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">6. Rublon Two-Factor Authentication</a></h3>\
<p><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/rublon/"rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank"><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Rublon.png" alt="" width="775" height="265" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-236084" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Rublon.png 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Rublon-300x103.png 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Rublon-768x263.png 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></a></p>\
<p><a href="http://wordpress.org/plugins/rublon/" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank"" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">Rublon</a> is yet another WordPress security authentication plugin that lets you maintain full-proof security for your website. By using this plugin, you can secure your website from Botnets that has a reputation of attacking thousands of websites every day. </p>\
<p>All you have to do is install and activate this plugin on your WordPress website. This will instantly protect your administration account with an email-based two-factor authentication. If you want to protect more than one account, you will have to switch to a paid version of the plugin. You can avail that by signing up from their official website and then selecting a preferred plan.  </p>\
<h3><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/duo-wordpress/" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">7. Duo Two Factor Authentication</a></h3>\
<p><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/duo-wordpress/" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank"><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Duo-two-factor-authentication.png" alt="Duo two-factor authentication" width="775" height="250" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-236085" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Duo-two-factor-authentication.png 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Duo-two-factor-authentication-300x97.png 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Duo-two-factor-authentication-768x248.png 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></a></p>\
<p><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/duo-wordpress/" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">Duo Two Factor Authentication</a> is an amazing WordPress security authentication plugin that protects your website data from being robbed by any mischievous element. With this plugin, you can quickly add a two-factor authentication password to your website and rest assured that your site&#8217;s security is in safe hands. </p>\
<p>You can do this with the help of Duo&#8217;s mobile app that works even if your phone is out of coverage. Alternatively, you can enable authentication using SMS or a call back to your phone. The plugin has options for that too. It works great with other plugins that you may have installed on your site. </p>\
<h3><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/wp-simple-firewall" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">8. Shield Security</a></h3>\
<p><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/wp-simple-firewall" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank"><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Shield-Security.png" alt="Shield Security" width="775" height="332" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-236089" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Shield-Security.png 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Shield-Security-300x129.png 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Shield-Security-768x329.png 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></a></p>\
<p><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/wp-simple-firewall/" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">Shield Security</a> is another robust security authentication plugin for WordPress that shields your website from all security threats with its two-factor authentication. The plugin supports Google authenticator and Email authentication. It will also notify you every time it detects a threat on your site with its powerful core file scanner. </p>\
<p>Besides, it also works on limiting login attempts, blocking automated spam comments and much more. It will also identify and block malicious IP addresses that can cause harm to your website. The plugin is super easy to use and set up.  </p>\
<h3><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/miniorange-2-factor-authentication/" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">9. Google Authenticator</a></h3>\
<p><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/miniorange-2-factor-authentication/" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank"><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Google-authenticator.png" alt="" width="775" height="266" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-236090" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Google-authenticator.png 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Google-authenticator-300x103.png 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Google-authenticator-768x264.png 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></a></p>\
<p><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/miniorange-2-factor-authentication/" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">Google Authenticator</a> lets you enable two-factor authentication (2FA, MFA) on your site. With its authentication, you can rest assured that your site is secure from any kind of unauthorized access. </p>\
<p>It is translation ready and supports standard TOTP and HOTP protocols for the authentication methods. The plugin is compatible with the latest version of WordPress and works wonderfully alongside various modern and advanced plugins. </p>\
<p>These are some of the best security authentication plugins that you might want to use on your website. If you want to know more about <a href="https://www.isitwp.com/ultimate-wordpress-security-guide-beginner-friendly/">WordPress security</a>, here&#8217;s a detailed guide for you.</p>\

<p>The post <a rel="nofollow" href="https://www.isitwp.com/wordpress-plugins/paid-member-subscriptions/">Paid Member Subscriptions Review (2019): The Good, the Bad &#038; the Ugly</a> appeared first on <a rel="nofollow" href="https://www.isitwp.com">IsItWP - WordPress Technology Lookup Tool</a>.</p>\
";s:7:"attribs";a:0:{}s:8:"xml_base";s:0:"";s:17:"xml_base_explicit";b:0;s:8:"xml_lang";s:0:"";}}}s:32:"http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/";a:1:{s:7:"creator";a:1:{i:0;a:5:{s:4:"data";s:13:"Shahzad Saeed";s:7:"attribs";a:0:{}s:8:"xml_base";s:0:"";s:17:"xml_base_explicit";b:0;s:8:"xml_lang";s:0:"";}}}s:40:"http://purl.org/rss/1.0/modules/content/";a:1:{s:7:"encoded";a:1:{i:0;a:5:{s:4:"data";s:12140:"<p>Are you looking to set up a membership site with WordPress and WooCommerce?</p>\
<p>Paid Member Subscriptions boasts about being the most intuitive WordPress membership plugin for WooCommerce on the market. In this review, we’ll take a look at the <a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/coxmoslabs-paid-member-subscriptions/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">Paid Member Subscriptions</a> plugin and its features to find out if it lives up to the hype.</p>\
<p>Let’s get started.</p>\
<h3>About Paid Member Subscriptions</h3>\
<p><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/paid-membership-subscriptions.png" alt="paid member subscriptions" width="740" height="443" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-235710" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/paid-membership-subscriptions.png 740w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/paid-membership-subscriptions-300x180.png 300w" sizes="(max-width: 740px) 100vw, 740px" /></p>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/coxmoslabs-paid-member-subscriptions/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">Paid Member Subscriptions</a> is an easy-to-use WooCommerce membership plugin by Cozmoslabs, the same folks behind TranslatePress, one of the leading <a href="https://www.isitwp.com/best-wordpress-translation-plugins-compared/">WordPress translation plugins</a>.</p>\
<p>Ease of use is the #1 thing that sets Paid Member Subscriptions apart from their competitors.</p>\
<p>It doesn’t force you into a predefined structure because the plugin seamlessly integrates into your WordPress site and content. That means there’s no learning curve to tackle, so even if you’re absolute newbie, you’ll be able to set up a membership site with Paid Member Subscriptions almost instantly.</p>\
<h3>Paid Member Subscriptions Review: Sell Membership Subscriptions With WooCommerce</h3>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/coxmoslabs-paid-member-subscriptions/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">Paid Member Subscriptions</a> is one of the best plugins to restrict product viewing, purchasing and offer special product prices to your members.</p>\
<p>Aside from restricting content, it lets you accept recurring payments, provide free trials, upgrade or downgrade membership and a lot more.</p>\
<p>To set up Paid Member Subscriptions, all you have to do is to specify your PayPal address to accept payment, set up subscription plans and protect your content via a metabox that appears in each individual post, page or custom post type.</p>\
<p><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/woocommerce_shop_page_content_restriction.jpg" alt="woocommerce shop page content restriction" width="770" height="358" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-236273" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/woocommerce_shop_page_content_restriction.jpg 770w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/woocommerce_shop_page_content_restriction-300x139.jpg 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/woocommerce_shop_page_content_restriction-768x357.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 770px) 100vw, 770px" /></p>\
<p>With Paid Member Subscriptions, you can</p>\
<ul>\
<li><strong>Restrict product viewing and purchasing</strong>: If you run a membership site, limiting product access to your members will encourage non-members to join your membership site.</li>\
<li><strong>Offer an “Amazon Prime” type of selling</strong>: If you’re an eCommerce merchant, you can provide special pricing with discounts, like Amazon Prime to your paid subscribers or members. This encourages your existing customers to subscribe to your paid membership.</li>\
<li><strong>Set up free trial on your membership site</strong>: Offer a free trial and allow users to access member-only area for a limited period.</li>\
</ul>\
<h3>How to Use Paid Member Subscriptions to Set Up a Membership Site</h3>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/coxmoslabs-paid-member-subscriptions/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">Paid Member Subscriptions</a> provides you with a great onboarding experience, so regardless of your skillset, you’ll be able to set up a membership site quickly and easily.</p>\
<p>Upon activating the plugin, you’ll be directed to a setup page. The best part is that you can set up the plugin with 3 easy steps.</p>\
<p><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/paid-member-subscriptions-review-settings.jpg" alt="paid member subscriptions review settings" width="740" height="500" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-236272" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/paid-member-subscriptions-review-settings.jpg 740w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/paid-member-subscriptions-review-settings-300x203.jpg 300w" sizes="(max-width: 740px) 100vw, 740px" /></p>\
<p>On the first page, you’ll be asked if you want to create membership pages, such as registration, login, etc. automatically. With a click of a button, you can set up those membership pages.</p>\
<p><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/paid-member-subscriptions-review-payment.jpg" alt="paid member subscriptions review payment" width="740" height="500" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-236271" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/paid-member-subscriptions-review-payment.jpg 740w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/paid-member-subscriptions-review-payment-300x203.jpg 300w" sizes="(max-width: 740px) 100vw, 740px" /></p>\
<p>After configuring the necessary settings on the first page, you’ll be asked to specify your PayPal details. The plugin also offers Stripe and PayPal Express support with the help of addons.</p>\
<p>Next, you’ll be asked to add new subscription plans.</p>\
<p><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/add-new-subscription-plan.jpg" alt="add new subscription plan" width="678" height="499" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-236270" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/add-new-subscription-plan.jpg 678w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/add-new-subscription-plan-300x221.jpg 300w" sizes="(max-width: 678px) 100vw, 678px" /></p>\
<h3>Paid Member Subscriptions Addons</h3>\
<p>The <a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/coxmoslabs-paid-member-subscriptions/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">Paid Member Subscriptions</a> plugin comes with 9 basic addons and 7 pro addons. The basic addons are available with all plans, but the pro addons are only available with the Pro plan.</p>\
<p><strong>Basic addons</strong>:</p>\
<ul>\
<li>Global Content Restriction: Restrict content globally rather than restricting certain pages.</li>\
<li>Discount Codes: Allow users to enter a discount code while signing up.</li>\
<li>Email Reminders: Remind your users about important account events, like subscription expiry.</li>\
<li>Navigation Menu Filtering: Customize the visibility of navigation menu based on users’ subscription plan.</li>\
<li>bbPress: Integrate a forum to your membership site.</li>\
<li>Fixed Period Membership: End member subscriptions at a specified date.</li>\
<li>Pay What You Want: Allows members to pay what they want as a subscription fee.</li>\
<li>reCaptcha: Avoid bot spam registration.</li>\
<li>Labels Edit: Edit label, string or message that is coming from the Paid Member Subscriptions plugin.</li>\
</ul>\
<p><strong>Pro addons</strong>:</p>\
<ul>\
<li>Group Memberships: Sell group memberships managed by a single account for a discounted price.</li>\
<li>Recurring Payments for PayPal Standard: Accept recurring payment with PayPal.</li>\
<li>PayPal Express: Accept payment via PayPal Express checkout.</li>\
<li>Stripe: Accept Stripe payment on your membership site.</li>\
<li>Invoices: Dynamically generate invoices for subscription payments.</li>\
<li>Content Dripping: Provide access to your content only after a certain period since the subscription.</li>\
<li>Multiple Subscriptions Per User: Allow users to subscribe to multiple plans.</li>\
</ul>\
<h3>Paid Member Subscriptions: Pros and Cons</h3>\
<p>Let’s take a look at the pros and cons of using the <a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/coxmoslabs-paid-member-subscriptions/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">Paid Member Subscriptions</a> plugin for setting up a membership site.</p>\
<p><strong>Pros</strong>:</p>\
<ul>\
<li><strong>Free version</strong>: A free version of the plugin is available to download from WordPress.org.</li>\
<li><strong>Easy to use</strong>: Paid Member Subscriptions makes it super easy to get started with a new membership site thanks to its great onboarding experience.</li>\
<li><strong>Elementor compatibility</strong>: You can use its content restriction features directly from Elementor&#8217;s front-end visual interface.</li>\
<li><strong>Fits every budget</strong>: Paid Member Subscriptions is probably the most affordable premium WooCommerce membership plugin for the features it offers.</li>\
</ul>\
<p><strong>Cons: </strong></p>\
<ul>\
<li><strong>Limited integration options</strong>: Even though Paid Member Subscriptions comes with all the essential features, it lacks built-in integration with third-party services, such as Zapier and Authorize.net.</li>\
<li><strong>No intermediate pricing plans</strong>: The plugin offers only 2 plans, Hobbyist for 1-site license and Pro Version for unlimited site licences. There are no other intermediate plans.</li>\
<li><strong>Refund policy</strong>: While they do have a 15-day refund policy, you’re advised to open a support ticket that explains your inconvenience, so they can better assist you before you request a refund.</li>\
</ul>\
<h3>Pricing: Paid Member Subscriptions vs. WooCommerce Memberships vs. MemberPress</h3>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/coxmoslabs-paid-member-subscriptions/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">Paid Member Subscriptions</a> is probably the most affordable premium membership plugin for the features it offers.</p>\
<p>For example, the pricing for another popular plugin, <a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/woocommerce-memberships/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">WooCommerce Memberships</a>, starts at $149 for a single site license but it doesn’t offer subscriptions. For subscriptions, you’re required to install another plugin called <a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/woocommerce-subscriptions/">WooCommerce Subscriptions</a>, which costs an additional $199 for a single site license.</p>\
<p>Similarly, the pricing for <a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/memberpress/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">MemberPress</a> starts at $149 for a single site license.</p>\
<p>On the other hand, Paid Member Subscriptions only charges you $69 for a single site license.</p>\
<p>Paid Member Subscriptions offers 2 plans:</p>\
<ul>\
<li><strong>Hobbyist</strong>: $69 for a single site license with 9 basic addons.</li>\
<li><strong>Pro Version</strong>: $149 for unlimited sites with 9 basic addons + 7 pro addons.</li>\
</ul>\
<h3>Our Verdict on Paid Member Subscriptions for Selling Membership</h3>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/coxmoslabs-paid-member-subscriptions/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">Paid Member Subscriptions</a> is one of the most intuitive membership plugins for WordPress and WooCommerce. It doesn’t force you into a predefined structure and integrates into your existing WordPress site and content.</p>\
<p>In just a few clicks, you can set up a membership site thanks to the great onboarding experience it offers. You can either restrict the content globally or individually via the metabox that you can see on your page, post or custom post types.</p>\
<p>If you liked this article, you might also want to check out our guide on <a href="https://www.isitwp.com/best-woocommerce-plugins-grow-sales-rapidly/">best WooCommerce plugins to grow your sales rapidly</a>.</p>\

<p>The post <a rel="nofollow" href="https://www.isitwp.com/wordpress-themes-for-writers-authors/">27 Best WordPress Themes for Writers and Book Authors (2019)</a> appeared first on <a rel="nofollow" href="https://www.isitwp.com">IsItWP - WordPress Technology Lookup Tool</a>.</p>\
";s:7:"attribs";a:0:{}s:8:"xml_base";s:0:"";s:17:"xml_base_explicit";b:0;s:8:"xml_lang";s:0:"";}}}s:32:"http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/";a:1:{s:7:"creator";a:1:{i:0;a:5:{s:4:"data";s:14:"Editorial Team";s:7:"attribs";a:0:{}s:8:"xml_base";s:0:"";s:17:"xml_base_explicit";b:0;s:8:"xml_lang";s:0:"";}}}s:40:"http://purl.org/rss/1.0/modules/content/";a:1:{s:7:"encoded";a:1:{i:0;a:5:{s:4:"data";s:37824:"<p>Are you looking for the best WordPress themes for book authors?</p>\
<p>A good WordPress theme makes it easy for writers to show off their portfolio and get more clients online. Book authors can use their website to sell books, connect with readers, and organize book signing events.</p>\
<p>In this article, we&#8217;ll share some of the best WordPress themes for writers and authors.</p>\
<h3>Choosing the Best WordPress Theme for Writers and Book Authors</h3>\
<p>To <a href="https://www.isitwp.com/how-to-make-a-website-step-by-step/" title="How to Make a Website - Step by Step (with Pictures)">create a website</a> for writers and authors, you’ll need a WordPress theme that offers the right features that match your needs. You may know that there are thousands of WordPress themes for writers on the market, which makes it challenging to select the best theme for your website.</p>\
<p>Here are some of the key features you’ll often find on a WordPress theme for authors.</p>\
<ul>\
<li>Modern and professional minimalistic layout</li>\
<li>Custom page templates for book description</li>\
<li>eCommerce support to sell books online</li>\
<li>Amazing typography to provide an excellent reading experience</li>\
<li>Showcase writing portfolio</li>\
</ul>\
<p>Let&#8217;s take a look at some of the best WordPress themes for book authors and writers.</p>\
<h3><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/divi/" title="Divi" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">1. Divi</a></h3>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/divi/" title="Divi" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank"><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/divi.jpg" alt="Divi" width="775" height="340" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-234395" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/divi.jpg 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/divi-300x132.jpg 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/divi-768x337.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></a></p>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/divi/" title="Divi" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">Divi</a> is a powerful WordPress theme and page builder. With Divi, you can create a website for book authors, writers, and bloggers. You can use the <a href="https://www.isitwp.com/best-wordpress-page-builders-compared/" title="7 Best Drag and Drop WordPress Page Builders">drag and drop page builder</a> to customize your website without editing any code. It also comes with several prebuilt demo websites to create pages quickly and easily.</p>\
<p>With its one-click demo install, you can quickly launch a writer / author website and create a distinct look by customizing your text and images. </p>\
<h3><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/oceanwp/" title="OceanWP" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">2. OceanWP</a></h3>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/oceanwp/" title="OceanWP" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank"><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/oceanwp-1.jpg" alt="OceanWP" width="775" height="340" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-234396" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/oceanwp-1.jpg 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/oceanwp-1-300x132.jpg 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/oceanwp-1-768x337.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></a></p>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/oceanwp/" title="OceanWP" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">OceanWP</a> is a popular WordPress multi-purpose theme that lets you create any website, including one for writers. It offers demo websites for book authors, sellers, and writers. With its 1-click demo content installer, all you have to do is to import the demo site and then customize the content. </p>\
<p>This theme is built with SEO best practices in mind, so you can rest assured that you&#8217;ll be in good hands with OceanWP. OceanWP supports RTL languages, so you can translate your site to your preferred language with ease.</p>\
<h3><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/astra-wordpress-theme/" title="Astra Theme" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">3. Astra Theme</a></h3>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/astra-wordpress-theme/" title="Astra Theme" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank"><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/astra-1.jpg" alt="Astra Theme" width="775" height="340" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-234397" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/astra-1.jpg 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/astra-1-300x132.jpg 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/astra-1-768x337.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></a></p>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/astra-wordpress-theme/" title="Astra Theme" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">Astra Theme</a> is a lightweight WordPress theme designed to build any website. It provides seamless integration with WordPress page builders so you can edit the layout the way you want with drag and drop. </p>\
<p>There are many ready-made starter sites, including a website for book authors, writers, and sellers. Astra Theme works great with <a href="https://www.isitwp.com/must-have-wordpress-plugins-for-business-websites/" title="25 Must Have WordPress Plugins for Business Websites (Expert Pick)">popular WordPress plugins</a> to extend the features and functionality.</p>\
<h3><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/themify-ultra/" title="Ultra" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">4. Ultra</a></h3>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/themify-ultra/" title="Ultra" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank"><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/ultra-1.jpg" alt="Ultra" width="775" height="340" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-234398" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/ultra-1.jpg 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/ultra-1-300x132.jpg 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/ultra-1-768x337.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></a></p>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/themify-ultra/" title="Ultra" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">Ultra</a> is a multi-purpose WordPress theme that allows you to create a website for book authors, publishers, and bloggers. It ships with dozens of theme skins to change the layout in 1-click. You can add unique features to your website using the free builder addons to give your site a unique look.</p>\
<p>Ultra is bundled with stunning features like smart layout options, color controls, parallax scrolling, mega menu, animations, and more. Ultra also comes with <a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/themify-builder/" title="Themify Builder" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">Themify Builder</a>, a <a href="https://www.isitwp.com/best-wordpress-page-builders-compared/">drag and drop page builder</a>.</p>\
<h3><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/studiopress-author-pro/" title="Author Pro" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">5. Author Pro</a></h3>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/studiopress-author-pro/" title="Author Pro" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank"><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/author-pro.jpg" alt="Author Pro" width="775" height="340" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-234399" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/author-pro.jpg 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/author-pro-300x132.jpg 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/author-pro-768x337.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></a></p>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/studiopress-author-pro/" title="Author Pro" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">Author Pro</a> is an excellent WordPress theme built specifically for book authors, writers, sellers, online libraries, and publishing houses. It lets you showcase your books on the homepage along with a short description.</p>\
<p>This theme is powered by <a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/studiopress-genesis/" title="Genesis Framework" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">Genesis Framework</a>, which lays a solid foundation for your site. Like any other StudioPress theme, Author Pro also comes with several widgetized sections on the homepage, so you can set up your homepage by adding the right widgets.</p>\
<h3><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/cssigniter-truenorth/" title="True North" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">6. True North</a></h3>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/cssigniter-truenorth/" title="True North" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank"><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/truenorth.jpg" alt="True North" width="775" height="340" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-234400" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/truenorth.jpg 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/truenorth-300x132.jpg 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/truenorth-768x337.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></a></p>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/cssigniter-truenorth/" title="True North" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">True North</a> is a free WordPress theme for book authors, writers, and publishers. It comes with several layout options, such as portfolio display, column listing, and isotope filtering. It comes with the portfolio content type to display your work on the homepage professionally.</p>\
<p>The theme offers custom widgets, and 1-click demo content installer. It seamlessly integrates with <a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/wpml/" title="WPML" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">WPML</a>, so you can <a href="https://www.isitwp.com/easily-create-multilingual-wordpress-website/" title="How to Easily Create a Multilingual WordPress Website (Step by Step)">easily build a multilingual website</a>.</p>\
<h3><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/wpzoom-presence/" title="Presence" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">7. Presence</a></h3>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/wpzoom-presence/" title="Presence" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank"><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/presence.jpg" alt="Presence" width="775" height="340" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-234401" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/presence.jpg 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/presence-300x132.jpg 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/presence-768x337.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></a></p>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/wpzoom-presence/" title="Presence" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">Presence</a> is a flexible WordPress theme designed to create a website for educational institutions, book authors, writers, and online libraries. Presence also comes with a drag and drop builder to get the look you want and import designs from their pre-built layouts.</p>\
<p>The Presence theme comes with 2 layouts (boxed and Full-width) and 10 website demos. Presence has <a href="https://www.isitwp.com/best-wordpress-social-media-plugins/" title="12 Best WordPress Social Media Plugins for Engagement">social media icons</a>, custom widgets, image sliders, and event calendar.</p>\
<h3><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/studiopress-hello-pro/" title="Hello Pro" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">8. Hello Pro</a></h3>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/studiopress-hello-pro/" title="Hello Pro" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank"><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/hello-pro.jpg" alt="Hello Pro" width="775" height="340" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-234402" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/hello-pro.jpg 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/hello-pro-300x132.jpg 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/hello-pro-768x337.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></a></p>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/studiopress-hello-pro/" title="Hello Pro" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">Hello Pro</a> is a simple WordPress theme built on top of Genesis framework. It lets you display a welcome message to your visitors and draw them into brand messaging. It includes custom page templates, homepage and footer widget areas, and a fully customizable header.</p>\
<p>Using the WordPress customizer, you can change colors, background, buttons, links, and fonts. This theme is highly optimized for <a href="https://www.isitwp.com/boost-wordpress-performance-speed/" title="How to Boost WordPress Performance &#038; Speed (Expert Advice)">performance and speed</a>, so you can rest assured that your site doesn&#8217;t slow down because of the theme elements.</p>\
<h3><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/themeisle-hestia-pro/" title="Hestia Pro" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">9. Hestia Pro</a></h3>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/themeisle-hestia-pro/" title="Hestia Pro" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank"><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/hestiapro.jpg" alt="Hestia Pro" width="775" height="340" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-234403" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/hestiapro.jpg 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/hestiapro-300x132.jpg 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/hestiapro-768x337.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></a></p>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/themeisle-hestia-pro/" title="Hestia Pro" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">Hestia</a> is a one-page WordPress multi-purpose theme for book authors, writers, publishers, and sellers. It offers a slick material design, which is perfect for building any type of websites.</p>\
<p>The theme has a customizable homepage with sections and blocks. You&#8217;ll get 2 extra options, a portfolio section and a fully customized Jetpack supported pricing section. </p>\
<h3><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/themeisle-neve/" title="Neve" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">10. Neve</a></h3>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/themeisle-neve/" title="Neve" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank"><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/neve-1.jpg" alt="Neve" width="775" height="340" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-234404" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/neve-1.jpg 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/neve-1-300x132.jpg 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/neve-1-768x337.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></a></p>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/themeisle-neve/" title="Neve" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">Neve</a> is a minimal WordPress theme with a sleek and simple design, which is perfect for creating a website for book authors, writers, and sellers. It comes with custom layout designs for the header and footer of your website.</p>\
<p>This theme is lightweight and built with blazing fast loading time in mind. You can customize most elements in this theme using WordPress customizer, so you don&#8217;t have to switch between preview and the editor.</p>\
<h3><a href="https://wordpress.org/themes/writee/" title="Writee" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">11. Writee</a></h3>\
<p><a href="https://wordpress.org/themes/writee/" title="Writee" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank"><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/writee.jpg" alt="Writee" width="775" height="340" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-234405" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/writee.jpg 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/writee-300x132.jpg 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/writee-768x337.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></a></p>\
<p>As the name suggests, <a href="https://wordpress.org/themes/writee/" title="Writee" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">Writee</a> is a free WordPress theme well-suited for writers, book authors, and bloggers. It has beautiful typography, providing a great reading experience to your visitors. The theme includes a customizable header with image slider, social icons, and navigation menu.</p>\
<p>It comes with unlimited color schemes, custom widgets, and sidebar. Writee has a widget area that lets you add your author biography in the about me section.</p>\
<h3><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/studiopress-magazine-pro/" title="Magazine Pro" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">12. Magazine Pro</a></h3>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/studiopress-magazine-pro/" title="Magazine Pro" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank"><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/magazinepro.jpg" alt="Magazine Pro" width="775" height="340" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-234406" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/magazinepro.jpg 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/magazinepro-300x132.jpg 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/magazinepro-768x337.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></a></p>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/studiopress-magazine-pro/" title="Magazine Pro" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">Magazine Pro</a> is a beautiful WordPress online publishing theme explicitly built for magazines, authors, newspapers, and bloggers. This theme is also perfect for creating online magazine and has several ad slot areas, email newsletter subscription box, featured content area, and more.</p>\
<p>It&#8217;s built on top of the Genesis theme framework and integrates with <a href="https://www.isitwp.com/wordpress-plugins/beaver-builder/" title="Beaver Builder Review: Is It the Best Drag and Drop Builder?">drag and drop page builders</a> to customize each section of your layout.</p>\
<h3><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/templatic-ebook/" rel="nofollow" target="_blank" data-nojs="true" >13. eBook</a></h3>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/templatic-ebook/" rel="nofollow" target="_blank" data-nojs="true" ><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/ebook.jpg" alt="eBook" width="775" height="340" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-234407" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/ebook.jpg 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/ebook-300x132.jpg 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/ebook-768x337.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></a></p>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/templatic-ebook/" rel="nofollow" target="_blank" data-nojs="true" >eBook</a> is a premium WordPress theme crafted professionally for authors, publishers, and writers. It comes with amazing features to showcase your ebooks and sell them. You can easily customize the homepage thanks to the widgetized area and custom widgets.</p>\
<p>This theme is compatible with WooCommerce, so you can sell ebooks easily.</p>\
<h3><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/artisanthemes-binderpro/" title="Binder Pro" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">14. Binder Pro</a></h3>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/artisanthemes-binderpro/" title="Binder Pro" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank"><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/binderpro.jpg" alt="Binder Pro" width="775" height="340" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-234408" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/binderpro.jpg 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/binderpro-300x132.jpg 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/binderpro-768x337.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></a></p>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/artisanthemes-binderpro/" title="Binder Pro" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">Binder Pro</a> is a WordPress journalist theme, which is a great option for book authors, magazines, publishers, and newspapers. It features a modular building system that helps you place your content in the center of the scene.</p>\
<p>It&#8217;s compatible with popular WordPress plugins and is translation ready and supports RTL languages.</p>\
<h3><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/cssigniter-brittany/" title="Brittany" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">15. Brittany</a></h3>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/cssigniter-brittany/" title="Brittany" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank"><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/brittany.jpg" alt="Brittany" width="775" height="340" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-234409" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/brittany.jpg 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/brittany-300x132.jpg 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/brittany-768x337.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></a></p>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/cssigniter-brittany/" title="Brittany" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">Brittany</a> is a stylish WordPress theme built for book authors and bloggers in the lifestyle niche. It allows you to showcase your featured work in the look book section on the homepage. Beside that section, you can add your personal information, Instagram photos, and blog posts.</p>\
<p>It comes with a sticky header and customizable footer. The theme has a neat grey layout and is easy to setup thanks to WordPress live customizer.</p>\
<h3><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/templatic-publisher/" rel="nofollow" target="_blank" data-nojs="true" >16. Publisher</a></h3>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/templatic-publisher/" rel="nofollow" target="_blank" data-nojs="true" ><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/publisher.jpg" alt="Publisher" width="775" height="340" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-234410" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/publisher.jpg 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/publisher-300x132.jpg 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/publisher-768x337.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></a></p>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/templatic-publisher/" rel="nofollow" target="_blank" data-nojs="true" >Publisher</a> is a high-quality WordPress theme for writers, authors, and publishers. It&#8217;s built to help struggling book authors and publishers to sell books online. The theme welcomes the visitors with a custom message and showcases featured books in a carousel slider.</p>\
<p>In the sidebar area, you can display author details, latest books, videos, and useful links. It&#8217;s compatible with WPML to <a href="https://www.isitwp.com/easily-create-multilingual-wordpress-website/" title="How to Easily Create a Multilingual WordPress Website (Step by Step)">create a multilingual website</a> properly.</p>\
<h3><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/studiopress-daily-dish-pro-theme/" title="Daily Dish Pro" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">17. Daily Dish Pro</a></h3>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/studiopress-daily-dish-pro-theme/" title="Daily Dish Pro" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank"><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/the-daily-dish.jpg" alt="The Daily Dish Pro" width="775" height="340" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-234411" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/the-daily-dish.jpg 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/the-daily-dish-300x132.jpg 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/the-daily-dish-768x337.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></a></p>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/studiopress-daily-dish-pro-theme/" title="Daily Dish Pro" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">The Daily Dish Pro</a> is a relatively new WordPress multi-purpose theme designed beautifully for writers, magazines, and book authors. It&#8217;s best suited for you if you to put your users attention to the content. To the 2-column layout, you can add featured content and about me section.</p>\
<p>Using the theme customizer, you can edit colors, fonts, and background without having to switch back and forth between the editor and preview. You can also use this theme to build eCommerce stores.</p>\
<h3><a href="https://wordpress.org/themes/libretto/" title="Libretto" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">18. Libretto</a></h3>\
<p><a href="https://wordpress.org/themes/libretto/" title="Libretto" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank"><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/libretto.jpg" alt="Libretto" width="775" height="340" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-234412" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/libretto.jpg 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/libretto-300x132.jpg 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/libretto-768x337.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></a></p>\
<p><a href="https://wordpress.org/themes/libretto/" title="Libretto" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">Libretto</a> is a one-column WordPress theme for authors, writers, and publishers. This theme is released by Automattic, the parent company of WordPress.com. This theme is perfect for long-form articles with images and quotes.</p>\
<p>It allows you to customize the background, header, colors, and navigation menu. Libretto supports WooCommerce to start your online store for selling books.</p>\
<h3><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/templatic-mybook/" rel="nofollow" target="_blank" data-nojs="true" >19. MyBook</a></h3>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/templatic-mybook/" rel="nofollow" target="_blank" data-nojs="true" ><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/mybook.jpg" alt="MyBook" width="775" height="340" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-234413" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/mybook.jpg 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/mybook-300x132.jpg 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/mybook-768x337.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></a></p>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/templatic-mybook/" rel="nofollow" target="_blank" data-nojs="true" >MyBook</a> is a perfect WordPress theme to launch a website for book authors, sellers, and publishers. It&#8217;s highly compatible with drag and drop page builders to customize the layout. You can also create custom landing pages for your featured books, book overview, and downloads.</p>\
<p>This theme has an about me section for the author to display his biography. .</p>\
<h3><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/cssigniter-public-opinion/" title="Public Opinion" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">20. Public Opinion</a></h3>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/cssigniter-public-opinion/" title="Public Opinion" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank"><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/publicopinion.jpg" alt="Public Opinion" width="775" height="340" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-234414" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/publicopinion.jpg 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/publicopinion-300x132.jpg 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/publicopinion-768x337.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></a></p>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/cssigniter-public-opinion/" title="Public Opinion" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">Public Opinion</a> is a powerful WordPress theme for online magazines, book authors, publishers, and writers. It has beautiful color variations to create a unique and attractive looking website. With multiple category layouts, you can organize your books easily.</p>\
<p>It features an advertising space where you can promote relevant products by displaying banners and <a href="https://www.isitwp.com/legit-ways-to-make-money-online-blogging/" title="30 Ways to Make Money Online Blogging (On the Side)">make money online</a>. You can use the <a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/elementor-pro/" title="Elementor" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">Elementor page builder</a> along with the theme to customize your website with real-time preview.</p>\
<h3><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/themify-elegant/" title="Elegant" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">21. Elegant</a></h3>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/themify-elegant/" title="Elegant" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank"><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/elegant.jpg" alt="Elegant" width="775" height="340" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-234415" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/elegant.jpg 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/elegant-300x132.jpg 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/elegant-768x337.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></a></p>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/themify-elegant/" title="Elegant" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">Elegant</a> is a modern and stylish WordPress theme built specifically for bloggers, writers, and authors. It&#8217;s shipped with portfolio post type to showcase your work professionally. The theme also offers fancy animations on your homepage.</p>\
<p>Other notable features include masonry and grid layouts, image filters, team section, and centered layout. It has color skins, header styling, and more in the theme customization panel.</p>\
<h3><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/teslathemes-relive/" title="Relive" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">22. Relive</a></h3>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/teslathemes-relive/" title="Relive" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank"><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/relive.jpg" alt="Relive" width="775" height="340" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-234416" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/relive.jpg 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/relive-300x132.jpg 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/relive-768x337.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></a></p>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/teslathemes-relive/" title="Relive" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">Relive</a> is a WordPress storytelling theme designed with an urge to promote book authors, bloggers, and writers. It&#8217;s packed with image and video galleries, sidebar layouts, custom header, and more. The theme has a featured content slider on the homepage.</p>\
<p>It integrates social media networks to make your website shareable. The theme is <a href="https://www.isitwp.com/best-seo-tools-to-grow-your-site-traffic/" title="9 Best SEO Tools to Grow Your Website Traffic, FAST!">optimized for SEO</a> to boost your traffic from search engines.</p>\
<h3><a href="https://wordpress.org/themes/author/" title="Author" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">23. Author</a></h3>\
<p><a href="https://wordpress.org/themes/author/" title="Author" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank"><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/author.jpg" alt="Author" width="775" height="340" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-234390" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/author.jpg 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/author-300x132.jpg 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/author-768x337.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></a></p>\
<p><a href="https://wordpress.org/themes/author/" title="Author" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">Author</a> is a free WordPress theme made for publishers, writers, and book authors. It provides a great reading experience to your visitors with crisp typography. It has a 2-column layout with the sidebar navigation menu on the left side and featured content on the right side.</p>\
<p>This theme is compatible with drag and drop page builders, so you can customize it without writing a line of code.</p>\
<h3><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/templatic-book-author/" rel="nofollow" target="_blank" data-nojs="true" >24. Book Author</a></h3>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/templatic-book-author/" rel="nofollow" target="_blank" data-nojs="true" ><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/book-author.jpg" alt="Book Author" width="775" height="340" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-234391" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/book-author.jpg 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/book-author-300x132.jpg 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/book-author-768x337.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></a></p>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/templatic-book-author/" rel="nofollow" target="_blank" data-nojs="true" >Book Author</a> is an excellent WordPress theme to create an online bookselling store. It features a user review section on the homepage to showcase testimonials from your readers. It comes with an image slider to showcase your featured books to your potential book readers.</p>\
<p>With this theme, you can create a catalog to display all your books.</p>\
<h3><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/teslathemes-suarez/" title="Suarez" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">25. Suarez</a></h3>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/teslathemes-suarez/" title="Suarez" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank"><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/suarez.jpg" alt="Suarez" width="775" height="340" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-234392" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/suarez.jpg 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/suarez-300x132.jpg 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/suarez-768x337.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></a></p>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/teslathemes-suarez/" title="Suarez" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">Suarez</a> is a creative WordPress theme built for bloggers, writers, and book authors. It offers fullscreen header background image slider with a custom logo and navigation menu. On top of that, you can add author bio with an image and call-to-action button.</p>\
<p>It also allows you to display featured posts, newsletter subscription box, Instagram photos, and social icons. It&#8217;s easy to set up and customizable with WordPress live customizer.</p>\
<h3><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/artisanthemes-modules/" title="Modules" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">26. Modules</a></h3>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/artisanthemes-modules/" title="Modules" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank"><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/modules-1.jpg" alt="Modules" width="775" height="340" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-234393" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/modules-1.jpg 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/modules-1-300x132.jpg 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/modules-1-768x337.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></a></p>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/artisanthemes-modules/" title="Modules" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">Modules</a> is a delicate and sophisticated WordPress theme to create any website. It has a beautiful and flexible layout with fullscreen header background. This theme comes with multiple pre-built demo sites, including a template for book authors, writers, and publishers.</p>\
<p>It has a video background, color schemes, fonts, custom sidebars, and more. Modules theme supports WooCommerce and <a href="https://wpforms.com/" title="WPForms" rel="noopener" target="_blank">WPForms</a> plugins out of the box.</p>\
<h3><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/studiopress-pretty-creative/" title="Pretty Creative" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">27. Pretty Creative</a></h3>\
<p><a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/studiopress-pretty-creative/" title="Pretty Creative" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank"><img src="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/pretty-creative.jpg" alt="Pretty Creative" width="775" height="340" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-234394" srcset="https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/pretty-creative.jpg 775w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/pretty-creative-300x132.jpg 300w, https://www.isitwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/pretty-creative-768x337.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 775px) 100vw, 775px" /></a></p>\
<p>If you&#8217;re looking for an attractive and stylish WordPress theme for your website, then <a href="https://www.isitwp.com/refer/studiopress-pretty-creative/" title="Pretty Creative" rel="noopener nofollow" target="_blank">Pretty Creative</a> is the right choice. It&#8217;s built on top of the Genesis theme framework that lays a strong foundation to the theme.</p>\
<p>The theme includes several custom page templates, widget areas, header layouts, color schemes, and theme options panel. </p>\
