entries";s:7:"attribs";a:0:{}s:8:"xml_base";s:0:"";s:17:"xml_base_explicit";b:0;s:8:"xml_lang";s:0:"";}i:2;a:5:{s:4:"data";s:11:"file upload";s:7:"attribs";a:0:{}s:8:"xml_base";s:0:"";s:17:"xml_base_explicit";b:0;s:8:"xml_lang";s:0:"";}i:3;a:5:{s:4:"data";s:15:"document upload";s:7:"attribs";a:0:{}s:8:"xml_base";s:0:"";s:17:"xml_base_explicit";b:0;s:8:"xml_lang";s:0:"";}i:4;a:5:{s:4:"data";s:21:"attach files to forms";s:7:"attribs";a:0:{}s:8:"xml_base";s:0:"";s:17:"xml_base_explicit";b:0;s:8:"xml_lang";s:0:"";}i:5;a:5:{s:4:"data";s:17:"conditional logic";s:7:"attribs";a:0:{}s:8:"xml_base";s:0:"";s:17:"xml_base_explicit";b:0;s:8:"xml_lang";s:0:"";}}s:4:"guid";a:1:{i:0;a:5:{s:4:"data";s:27:"https://wpforms.com/?p=1202";s:7:"attribs";a:1:{s:0:"";a:1:{s:11:"isPermaLink";s:5:"false";}}s:8:"xml_base";s:0:"";s:17:"xml_base_explicit";b:0;s:8:"xml_lang";s:0:"";}}s:11:"description";a:1:{i:0;a:5:{s:4:"data";s:588:"<p>Want to let your website visitors upload file attachments to your WordPress forms? Giving users the ability to add files and media to your site&#8217;s forms can make it way easier for you to collect the information you need. In this article, we’ll show you how to easily create a file upload form in WordPress. [&#8230;]</p>\
<p>The post <a rel="nofollow" href="https://wpforms.com/how-to-create-a-file-upload-form-in-wordpress/">How to Create a File Upload Form in WordPress in 2019 (Step by Step)</a> appeared first on <a rel="nofollow" href="https://wpforms.com">WPForms</a>.</p>\
";s:7:"attribs";a:0:{}s:8:"xml_base";s:0:"";s:17:"xml_base_explicit";b:0;s:8:"xml_lang";s:0:"";}}}s:32:"http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/";a:1:{s:7:"creator";a:1:{i:0;a:5:{s:4:"data";s:12:"Lisa Gennaro";s:7:"attribs";a:0:{}s:8:"xml_base";s:0:"";s:17:"xml_base_explicit";b:0;s:8:"xml_lang";s:0:"";}}}s:40:"http://purl.org/rss/1.0/modules/content/";a:1:{s:7:"encoded";a:1:{i:0;a:5:{s:4:"data";s:34544:"<p>Want to let your website visitors upload file attachments to your WordPress forms?</p>\
<p>Giving users the ability to add files and media to your site&#8217;s forms can make it way easier for you to collect the information you need.</p>\
<p>In this article, we’ll show you how to easily create a file upload form in WordPress.</p>\
<p style="text-align: center;"><a class="btn btn-block" style="background-color: #659a17 !important; color: #fff !important; padding: 20px 25px !important; text-align: center; text-decoration: none; border-radius: 4px !important; -moz-border-radius: 4px !important; -webkit-border-radius: 4px !important; line-height: 48px; font-weight: bold;" title="Click Here to Start Making Your File Upload Form Now" href="http://www.wpforms.com/pricing/">Click Here to Start Making Your File Upload Form Now</a></p>\
<p><iframe src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/zPVHHX99N_g?rel=0" width="560" height="315" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="allowfullscreen"><span data-mce-type="bookmark" style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; overflow: hidden; line-height: 0;" class="mce_SELRES_start">﻿</span></iframe></p>\
<p>If you don’t like watching videos, or need more instructions, check out our step by step tutorial below.</p>\
<p>Here&#8217;s a table of contents for easy navigation of each step:</p>\
<ol>\
<li><a href="#step1">Create Your File Upload Form in WordPress</a></li>\
<li><a href="#step2">Allow Multiple File Uploads</a> (Optional)</li>\
<li><a href="#step3">Customize Your File Upload Form Settings</a></li>\
<li><a href="#step4">Configure Your File Upload Form’s Notifications</a></li>\
<li><a href="#step5">Configure Your File Upload Form’s Confirmations</a></li>\
<li><a href="#step6">Add Your File Upload Form to Your Website</a></li>\
<li><a href="#step7">View The Files</a></li>\
</ol>\
<h3>Why Use a File Upload Feature on Your WordPress Forms?</h3>\
<p>Depending on the type of information you want to collect on your form, using a file upload feature is one of the best ways to make it easier for you to get more info from your users quicker. Making forms easier to fill out helps <a href="https://wpforms.com/how-to-combat-order-form-abandonment-and-increase-your-sales/">reduce your form abandonment rate</a> so your site can generate more revenue.</p>\
<p>You might need to add a file upload feature to your WordPress forms so you can collect different types of files and media from site visitors as they submit their form to you.</p>\
<p>Here are some of the most common times you might want to allow users to upload a file through your contact form:</p>\
<ul>\
<li><a href="https://wpforms.com/how-to-create-a-job-application-form-in-wordpress/">Job application forms</a> so applicants can attach their resume files</li>\
<li>Pictures as image files for a contest or a <a href="https://wpforms.com/rafflecopter-alternatives-create-free-giveaway/">giveaway</a></li>\
<li><a href="https://wpforms.com/how-to-allow-users-to-submit-blog-posts-on-your-wordpress-site/">User submitted content forms</a> so users can attach a blog post or image they want to share</li>\
<li><a href="https://wpforms.com/how-to-create-a-request-a-quote-form-in-wordpress/">Client services forms</a> so clients can attach their spreadsheet or project spec document</li>\
<li><a title="How to Create a Custom Support Ticket Form on WordPress With Zendesk" href="https://wpforms.com/how-to-create-a-custom-support-ticket-form-on-wordpress-with-zendesk/">Customer support forms</a> so customers can attach documents to provide additional information</li>\
<li>Audio clips for you to play back during your <a href="https://wpforms.com/best-wordpress-podcasting-plugins/">podcast</a></li>\
<li>User-submitted videos on an <a href="https://wpforms.com/how-to-make-an-event-registration-form-in-wordpress/">event registration form</a> so you have content to play at your event (great for <a href="https://wpforms.com/demo/wedding-invitation-rsvp-form-demo/">weddings</a>, anniversaries, and <a href="https://wpforms.com/online-fundraising-ideas-for-nonprofits/">fundraisers</a>.)</li>\
</ul>\
<p>And this is just the beginning.</p>\
<p>Luckily, the <a href="http://wpforms.com">WPForms</a> plugin makes it easy for your site visitors to upload the following file types to your contact forms:</p>\
<ul>\
<li><strong>Documents</strong> (.doc, .xls, .ppt, and .pdf)</li>\
<li><strong>Images</strong> (.png, .gif, and .jpg)</li>\
<li><strong>Video</strong> (.mpg, .mov, and .wmv)</li>\
<li><strong>Audio</strong> (.wav, .mp3, and .mp4)</li>\
</ul>\
<div class="alert alert-info"><p> Note: For <a href="http://www.wpbeginner.com/wordpress-security/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">WordPress security reasons</a>, the default file types that can be uploaded are limited. Here&#8217;s <a href="https://wpforms.com/docs/how-to-allow-additional-file-upload-types/">how to allow additional file upload types</a> to your forms.</p>\
</div>\
<p>Now let’s see how to add the file upload feature to your WordPress contact form.</p>\
<h3 id="step1">Step 1: Create Your File Upload Form in WordPress</h3>\
<p>The first thing you’ll need to do is install and activate the <a href="https://wpforms.com/pricing/">WPForms plugin</a>. For more details, see this step by step guide on <a title="Step by step guide on How to Install a WordPress Plugin" href="http://www.wpbeginner.com/beginners-guide/step-by-step-guide-to-install-a-wordpress-plugin-for-beginners/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">how to install a plugin in WordPress</a>.</p>\
<p>Next, go to <strong>WPForms » Add New</strong> to create a new form.</p>\
<p>Now, on the setup screen, name your form. Next, scroll down to the <strong>Additional Templates</strong> section and type &#8220;File Upload Form&#8221;, then click on it to open the template.</p>\
<p><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-538155" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/file-upload-form-template.png" alt="file upload form template" width="1116" height="596" srcset="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/file-upload-form-template.png 1116w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/file-upload-form-template-300x160.png 300w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/file-upload-form-template-768x410.png 768w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/file-upload-form-template-1024x547.png 1024w" sizes="(max-width: 1116px) 100vw, 1116px" /></p>\
<div class="alert alert-success"><p>Make sure you&#8217;ve already <a href="https://wpforms.com/docs/how-to-install-and-use-the-form-templates-pack-addon/">activated the Form Templates Pack Addon</a> to search for this form.</p>\
</div>\
<p>Now, WPForms will now populate a pre-built File Upload Form and display the drag and drop builder.</p>\
<p><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-538172" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/simple-form-with-file-upload-field.jpg" alt="simple form with file upload field" width="1116" height="561" srcset="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/simple-form-with-file-upload-field.jpg 1116w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/simple-form-with-file-upload-field-300x151.jpg 300w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/simple-form-with-file-upload-field-768x386.jpg 768w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/simple-form-with-file-upload-field-1024x515.jpg 1024w" sizes="(max-width: 1116px) 100vw, 1116px" /></p>\
<p>Here, you can add additional fields to your contact form by dragging them from the left hand panel to the right hand panel.</p>\
<p>With the File Upload Form template, you’ll already have the <strong>Name</strong>, <strong>Email</strong>, <strong>Phone, File Upload</strong>, and <strong>Additional Comments</strong> fields.</p>\
<p>Click on any of the form fields to make changes. You can also click on a form field and drag it to rearrange the order on your contact form.</p>\
<p>You can also add the File Upload field to <strong>any WordPress form you create</strong>. Just drag the File Upload form field, found under <strong>Fancy Fields</strong>, from the left hand panel of the Form Editor to the right hand panel.</p>\
<p><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-538279" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/how-to-add-a-file-upload-field-to-a-contact-form.gif" alt="how to add a file upload field to a contact form" width="1116" height="690" /></p>\
<p>You can click on the File Upload field and change the:</p>\
<ul>\
<li><strong>Label —</strong> Name the form field so your site visitors know what it’s for.</li>\
<li><strong>Description — </strong>Add a description explaining details to users. For example, if you only want people to upload an image, tell them that.</li>\
<li><strong>Allowed File Extensions</strong> — If you want to restrict the types of files that can be uploaded to your WordPress form, put them here, each separated by a comma</li>\
<li><strong>Max File Size —</strong> Specify, in megabytes, the max size file you’ll allow users to upload. If you leave this blank, WPForms will allow a max of 128MB.</li>\
<li><strong>Required —</strong> If you want to require that users upload a file before they can submit their form, select this checkbox.</li>\
</ul>\
<p>Wondering where these file uploads will be stored?</p>\
<p>By default, all files uploaded by users are stored in the WPForms folder inside the Uploads directory of your site. To make things easier, you can also store these files in your WordPress Media Library by selecting the <b>Store field in WordPress Media Library </b>checkbox under Advanced Options.</p>\
<p><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-538263" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/check-to-store-uploads-in-wordpress-media-library.jpg" alt="check to store uploads in wordpress media library" width="1116" height="646" srcset="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/check-to-store-uploads-in-wordpress-media-library.jpg 1116w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/check-to-store-uploads-in-wordpress-media-library-300x174.jpg 300w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/check-to-store-uploads-in-wordpress-media-library-768x445.jpg 768w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/check-to-store-uploads-in-wordpress-media-library-1024x593.jpg 1024w" sizes="(max-width: 1116px) 100vw, 1116px" /></p>\
<p>Each file upload field allows users to upload one single file. To learn how to add multiple file uploads, read on. If just one file upload field works for you, you can skip the next step.</p>\
<h3 id="step2">Step 2: Allow Multiple File Uploads (Optional)</h3>\
<p>You can add as many File Upload fields to your form as you want. To add multiple File Upload fields to your form, drag the field from the left hand panel onto your form.</p>\
<p><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-538319" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Multiple-File-Upload-Fields-onto-form.jpg" alt="Multiple File Upload Fields onto form" width="1116" height="628" srcset="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Multiple-File-Upload-Fields-onto-form.jpg 1116w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Multiple-File-Upload-Fields-onto-form-300x169.jpg 300w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Multiple-File-Upload-Fields-onto-form-768x432.jpg 768w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Multiple-File-Upload-Fields-onto-form-1024x576.jpg 1024w" sizes="(max-width: 1116px) 100vw, 1116px" /></p>\
<p>But let&#8217;s say you want to add a bunch of File Upload fields — things might start to look a little cluttered.</p>\
<p>To make your form appear clutter free, you&#8217;ll want to <a href="https://wpforms.com/how-to-create-clutter-free-forms-with-smart-logic/">enable conditional logic</a> on the first File Upload field before you add those other fields. That way, those extra File Upload fields won&#8217;t show up on your form unless a user needs them.</p>\
<p><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-67046" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/wordpress-multiple-file-upload-form.gif" alt="wordpress multiple file upload form" width="562" height="548" /></p>\
<div class="alert alert-success"><p>This trick makes the form look more organized and helps fight form fatigue, which can <a href="https://wpforms.com/simple-ways-to-design-your-forms-and-boost-conversions/">help boost form conversions</a>.</p>\
</div>\
<p>To do this, drag a Dropdown field from the left-hand panel to your form, just above the file upload field. (This will work with any number of Upload File fields, but for the sake of this example we&#8217;ll do 3.)</p>\
<p><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-538218" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/drag-dropdown-to-add-multiple-file-upload-fields.jpg" alt="drag dropdown to add multiple file upload fields" width="1116" height="479" srcset="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/drag-dropdown-to-add-multiple-file-upload-fields.jpg 1116w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/drag-dropdown-to-add-multiple-file-upload-fields-300x129.jpg 300w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/drag-dropdown-to-add-multiple-file-upload-fields-768x330.jpg 768w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/drag-dropdown-to-add-multiple-file-upload-fields-1024x440.jpg 1024w" sizes="(max-width: 1116px) 100vw, 1116px" /></p>\
<p>Now click on the dropdown field to see the Field Options on the left panel and edit the Dropdown field label to say <strong>Number of Files to Upload </strong>and the Choices to say <strong>1</strong>, <strong>2</strong>, and <strong>3</strong>.</p>\
<p><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-538211" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/number-of-files-to-upload-dropdown.jpg" alt="number of files to upload dropdown" width="1116" height="483" srcset="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/number-of-files-to-upload-dropdown.jpg 1116w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/number-of-files-to-upload-dropdown-300x130.jpg 300w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/number-of-files-to-upload-dropdown-768x332.jpg 768w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/number-of-files-to-upload-dropdown-1024x443.jpg 1024w" sizes="(max-width: 1116px) 100vw, 1116px" /></p>\
<p>After that, click on the File Upload field and in the options, scroll down to and expand the Conditionals tab in the left-hand panel. Then, select the checkmark for <strong>Enable conditional logic</strong>.</p>\
<p><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-223510" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/06/Conditional-Logic.png" alt="Conditional Logic" width="562" height="227" srcset="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/06/Conditional-Logic.png 562w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/06/Conditional-Logic-300x121.png 300w" sizes="(max-width: 562px) 100vw, 562px" /></p>\
<p>Customize the conditional logic of the File Upload field just like the screenshot below:</p>\
<p><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-444029" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/upload-your-file.jpg" sizes="(max-width: 562px) 100vw, 562px" srcset="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/upload-your-file.jpg 562w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/upload-your-file-300x192.jpg 300w" alt="upload your file" width="562" height="359" /></p>\
<p>Keep in mind that new fields are added by clicking the Add new group button, which applies the OR logic. If you need more details about using the OR logic, read our guide on <a href="https://wpforms.com/docs/how-to-use-and-or-conditional-logic/">how to use And OR conditional logic</a>.</p>\
<p>The next step is to duplicate this File Upload field.</p>\
<p>On your form, click on the duplicate icon on the right-hand side of the File Upload field.</p>\
<p><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-444198" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/duplicate-file-upload.png" sizes="(max-width: 562px) 100vw, 562px" srcset="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/duplicate-file-upload.png 562w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/duplicate-file-upload-300x152.png 300w" alt="duplicate file upload" width="562" height="284" /></p>\
<p>In the left-hand panel, change the label of the new File Upload field to <strong>Upload Your Second File</strong>.</p>\
<p><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-538324" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/rename-your-multiple-upload-fields-label.jpg" alt="rename your multiple upload fields label" width="1116" height="594" srcset="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/rename-your-multiple-upload-fields-label.jpg 1116w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/rename-your-multiple-upload-fields-label-300x160.jpg 300w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/rename-your-multiple-upload-fields-label-768x409.jpg 768w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/rename-your-multiple-upload-fields-label-1024x545.jpg 1024w" sizes="(max-width: 1116px) 100vw, 1116px" /></p>\
<p>Now configure the conditional logic for this new field just like the screenshot below. The only change from the above step is that we removed the first action where it says the Number of Files to Upload is 1.</p>\
<p><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-67043" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/upload-second-file.jpg" sizes="(max-width: 562px) 100vw, 562px" srcset="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/upload-second-file.jpg 562w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/upload-second-file-300x193.jpg 300w" alt="wordpress contact form multiple attachments" width="562" height="361" /></p>\
<p>Now, duplicate the 2nd file upload field by clicking the icon and changing the label to <strong>Upload Your Third File</strong>.</p>\
<p><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-538327" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/name-your-file-upload-form-on-form.jpg" alt="name your file upload form on form" width="1116" height="720" srcset="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/name-your-file-upload-form-on-form.jpg 1116w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/name-your-file-upload-form-on-form-300x194.jpg 300w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/name-your-file-upload-form-on-form-768x495.jpg 768w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/name-your-file-upload-form-on-form-1024x661.jpg 1024w" sizes="(max-width: 1116px) 100vw, 1116px" /></p>\
<p>Configure the conditional logic field just like the screenshot below. We’ll only keep the last field where it says the Number of Files to Upload is 3.</p>\
<p><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-444020" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/upload-third-file.jpg" sizes="(max-width: 562px) 100vw, 562px" srcset="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/upload-third-file.jpg 562w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/upload-third-file-300x192.jpg 300w" alt="Upload third file" width="562" height="359" /></p>\
<p>Once you are done customizing your form, click <strong>Save </strong>in the top right corner of your screen. You&#8217;ve just added multiple file upload fields to your form.</p>\
<p><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-538332" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/save-your-multiple-file-upload-form.jpg" alt="save your multiple file upload form" width="1116" height="619" srcset="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/save-your-multiple-file-upload-form.jpg 1116w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/save-your-multiple-file-upload-form-300x166.jpg 300w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/save-your-multiple-file-upload-form-768x426.jpg 768w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/save-your-multiple-file-upload-form-1024x568.jpg 1024w" sizes="(max-width: 1116px) 100vw, 1116px" /></p>\
<p>So now that you have the right amount of file upload fields on your form (be it just 1 or multiple), you’re ready to configure your form’s settings.</p>\
<h3 id="step3">Step 3: Customize Your File Upload Form Settings</h3>\
<p>To start, go to <strong>Settings</strong> » <strong>General</strong>.</p>\
<p><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-538333" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/File-Upload-Form-General-Settings-configurations.jpg" alt="File Upload Form General Settings configurations" width="1116" height="668" srcset="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/File-Upload-Form-General-Settings-configurations.jpg 1116w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/File-Upload-Form-General-Settings-configurations-300x180.jpg 300w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/File-Upload-Form-General-Settings-configurations-768x460.jpg 768w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/File-Upload-Form-General-Settings-configurations-1024x613.jpg 1024w" sizes="(max-width: 1116px) 100vw, 1116px" /></p>\
<p>Here you can configure the following:</p>\
<ul>\
<li><strong>Form Name — </strong>Rename your form here if you want to.</li>\
<li><strong>Form Description — </strong>Give your form a description.</li>\
<li><strong>Submit Button Text —</strong> Customize the copy on the submit button.</li>\
<li><strong>Spam Prevention —</strong> <a href="https://wpforms.com/how-to-build-a-spam-free-contact-form-without-captcha/">Enable the anti-spam honeypot feature</a> to prevent spambot submissions. This feature is automatically enabled on all WordPress forms. If you decide to use another form of spam prevention, unclick this option.</li>\
<li><strong>GDPR Enhancements —</strong> You can disable the storing of entry information and user details, such as IP addresses and user agents, in an effort to <a href="https://wpforms.com/docs/how-to-create-gdpr-compliant-forms/">comply with GDPR requirements</a>. In addition, check out our step by step instructions on <a href="https://wpforms.com/how-to-add-a-gdpr-agreement-field-to-your-sites-forms/">how to add a GDPR agreement field to your simple contact form</a>.</li>\
</ul>\
<p>And when you’re done, click <strong>Save</strong>.</p>\
<h3 id="step4">Step 4: Configure Your File Upload Form’s Notifications</h3>\
<p>Notifications are an excellent way to know when someone submits one of your file upload forms.</p>\
<p>And, unless you disable the notification feature, you’ll get an email notification whenever someone submits a form on your site.</p>\
<p><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-538336" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/set-up-notifications-on-file-upload-form.jpg" alt="set up notifications on file upload form" width="1116" height="453" srcset="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/set-up-notifications-on-file-upload-form.jpg 1116w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/set-up-notifications-on-file-upload-form-300x122.jpg 300w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/set-up-notifications-on-file-upload-form-768x312.jpg 768w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/set-up-notifications-on-file-upload-form-1024x416.jpg 1024w" sizes="(max-width: 1116px) 100vw, 1116px" /></p>\
<p>To get an email message when someone completes your form, you’ll need to <a href="https://wpforms.com/docs/setup-form-notification-wpforms/">set up form notifications in WordPress</a> and provide your email address.</p>\
<p>Also, if you use <a href="https://wpforms.com/docs/how-to-use-smart-tags-in-wpforms/">smart tags</a>, you can send a personalized notification to your site visitors once they finish your form to let them know you received it. This assures users their form has gone through properly, along with their file upload.</p>\
<p><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-519747" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/how-to-use-smart-tags-in-notifications.jpg" sizes="(max-width: 1116px) 100vw, 1116px" srcset="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/how-to-use-smart-tags-in-notifications.jpg 1116w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/how-to-use-smart-tags-in-notifications-300x173.jpg 300w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/how-to-use-smart-tags-in-notifications-768x444.jpg 768w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/how-to-use-smart-tags-in-notifications-1024x592.jpg 1024w" alt="how to use smart tags in notifications" width="1116" height="645" /></p>\
<p>For more on this, check out our step by step guide on <a href="https://wpforms.com/how-to-create-multiple-form-notifications-in-wordpress-forms/">how to send multiple form notifications in WordPress</a>.</p>\
<p>In addition, you have the option to easily brand your notification emails by adding your logo or any image you choose in the custom header image area. The logo/image you choose will show up at the top of email notifications like the WPForms logo below.</p>\
<p><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-211599" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/06/Custom-Email-Header.jpg" alt="Custom Email Header" width="562" height="314" srcset="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/06/Custom-Email-Header.jpg 562w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/06/Custom-Email-Header-300x168.jpg 300w" sizes="(max-width: 562px) 100vw, 562px" /></p>\
<div class="alert alert-info"><p> Note: Since file attachments can often <strong>hurt email deliverability</strong>, WPForms doesn&#8217;t attach your user&#8217;s files in notification emails. Instead, we send the file uploads via email as links.</p>\
</div>\
<p><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-223516" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/06/Notification-Email-Links.png" alt="Notification Email Links" width="562" height="186" srcset="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/06/Notification-Email-Links.png 562w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/06/Notification-Email-Links-300x99.png 300w" sizes="(max-width: 562px) 100vw, 562px" /></p>\
<h3 id="step5">Step 5: Configure Your File Upload Form’s Confirmations</h3>\
<p>Form confirmations are ways to take action immediately (and automatically) after your user has submitted information to your form. For extra help with this step, check out our tutorial on <a href="https://wpforms.com/docs/setup-form-confirmation-wpforms/">how to setup form confirmations</a>.</p>\
<p>There are 3 different kinds of confirmations in WPForms:</p>\
<ol>\
<li><strong>Message — </strong>This is the default confirmation type that appears after someone hits submit on your form, and it’s customizable. Check out our tips on ways to <a href="https://wpforms.com/form-success-message-ideas-to-boost-customer-happiness/">customize your confirmation message to boost your site visitors’ happiness</a>.</li>\
<li><strong>Display Page —</strong> Automatically send users to any page on your site like a <a href="https://wpforms.com/4-thank-you-page-examples-to-boost-customer-loyalty/">thank you page</a></li>\
<li><strong>Redirect —</strong> Useful if you want to take the user to a different website or specialized URL for more complex development.</li>\
</ol>\
<p>So let’s see how to set up a simple form confirmation in WPForms so you can customize the <a href="https://wpforms.com/form-success-message-ideas-to-boost-customer-happiness/">success message</a> site visitors will see when they submit a form on your site.</p>\
<p>To start, click on the <strong>Confirmation</strong> tab in the Form Editor under <strong>Settings</strong>.</p>\
<p>Next, select the type of confirmation type you’d like to create. For this example, we’ll select <strong>Message</strong>.</p>\
<p><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-538344" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Form-Confirmation-Type-settings-1.jpg" alt="Form Confirmation Type settings" width="1116" height="396" srcset="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Form-Confirmation-Type-settings-1.jpg 1116w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Form-Confirmation-Type-settings-1-300x106.jpg 300w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Form-Confirmation-Type-settings-1-768x273.jpg 768w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Form-Confirmation-Type-settings-1-1024x363.jpg 1024w" sizes="(max-width: 1116px) 100vw, 1116px" /></p>\
<p>Then, customize the confirmation message to your liking and click <strong>Save</strong> when you’re done.</p>\
<p>Now you’re ready to add your contact form to your website.</p>\
<h3 id="step6">Step 6: Add Your File Upload Form to Your Website</h3>\
<p>After you’ve created your form, you need to add it to your WordPress website.</p>\
<p>WPForms lets you add your forms to multiple places on your website including your pages, blog posts, and <a href="https://wpforms.com/how-to-add-a-contact-form-in-wordpress-sidebar-widget/">sidebar widgets</a>.</p>\
<p>Let’s take a look at the most common placement option: page/post embedding.</p>\
<p>To begin, create a new page or post in WordPress, or go to the update settings on an existing one. After that, click inside the first block (the blank area below your page title) and click on the Add WPForms icon.</p>\
<p><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-520176" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/embed-your-form-by-clicking-on-the-Add-WPForms-icon.jpg" alt="embed your form by clicking on the Add WPForms icon" width="1116" height="399" srcset="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/embed-your-form-by-clicking-on-the-Add-WPForms-icon.jpg 1116w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/embed-your-form-by-clicking-on-the-Add-WPForms-icon-300x107.jpg 300w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/embed-your-form-by-clicking-on-the-Add-WPForms-icon-768x275.jpg 768w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/embed-your-form-by-clicking-on-the-Add-WPForms-icon-1024x366.jpg 1024w" sizes="(max-width: 1116px) 100vw, 1116px" /></p>\
<p>The WPForms widget will appear inside of your block. Click on the WPForms dropdown and pick the forms you’ve already created that you want to insert into your page. Select your file upload form.</p>\
<p><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-538367" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/add-your-file-upload-form-to-your-site.jpg" alt="add your file upload form to your site" width="1116" height="488" srcset="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/add-your-file-upload-form-to-your-site.jpg 1116w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/add-your-file-upload-form-to-your-site-300x131.jpg 300w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/add-your-file-upload-form-to-your-site-768x336.jpg 768w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/add-your-file-upload-form-to-your-site-1024x448.jpg 1024w" sizes="(max-width: 1116px) 100vw, 1116px" /></p>\
<p>Next, click on the blue button in the top right that says either Publish or Update, so your form will appear on your website.</p>\
<p><img class="alignnone wp-image-520197 size-full" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/publish-or-update-your-page.jpg" alt="publish or update your page and add a wordpress ajax contact form" width="1116" height="501" srcset="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/publish-or-update-your-page.jpg 1116w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/publish-or-update-your-page-300x135.jpg 300w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/publish-or-update-your-page-768x345.jpg 768w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/publish-or-update-your-page-1024x460.jpg 1024w" sizes="(max-width: 1116px) 100vw, 1116px" /></p>\
<p>That&#8217;s it! Your file upload form is now on your website.</p>\
<h3 id="step7">Step 7: View The Files</h3>\
<p>WPForms stores each form submission as an entry. To view uploaded files, go to <strong>WPForms</strong> » <strong>Entries</strong>.</p>\
<p>From there, select the right form from the dropdown menu and click on <strong>View</strong>.</p>\
<p><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-538377" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/View-File-Upload-Entries.jpg" alt="View File Upload Entries" width="1116" height="447" srcset="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/View-File-Upload-Entries.jpg 1116w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/View-File-Upload-Entries-300x120.jpg 300w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/View-File-Upload-Entries-768x308.jpg 768w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/View-File-Upload-Entries-1024x410.jpg 1024w" sizes="(max-width: 1116px) 100vw, 1116px" /></p>\
<p>Right click the file to download the file, or click to view it in your browser.</p>\
<p><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-538383" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/view-file-upload-entry-in-wpforms.jpg" alt="view file upload entry in wpforms" width="562" height="331" srcset="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/view-file-upload-entry-in-wpforms.jpg 562w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/view-file-upload-entry-in-wpforms-300x177.jpg 300w" sizes="(max-width: 562px) 100vw, 562px" /></p>\
<p>Better yet, you can use our <a href="https://wpforms.com/addons/zapier-addon/">Zapier addon</a>, to automatically save all file uploads to:</p>\
<ul>\
<li><a href="https://wpforms.com/how-to-create-a-wordpress-google-drive-upload-form/">Google Drive</a></li>\
<li><a href="https://wpforms.com/how-to-create-a-simple-dropbox-upload-form-in-wordpress/">Dropbox</a></li>\
<li>and many other cloud storage services</li>\
</ul>\
<h3>In Conclusion</h3>\
<p>And there you have it! You now know how to create a file upload form in WordPress.</p>\
<p>If you want to allow site visitors to upload files directly to your website, be sure to check out our helpful guide on <a href="https://wpforms.com/how-to-create-a-file-upload-widget-in-wordpress/">how to create a file upload widget in WordPress</a>.</p>\
<p>So, what are you waiting for? Get started with the most powerful <a href="https://wpforms.com">WordPress forms plugin</a> today.</p>\
<p>And don’t forget, if you like this article, then please follow us on <a href="https://www.facebook.com/wpforms" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer">Facebook</a> and <a href="http://twitter.com/easywpforms" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer">Twitter</a>.</p>\

In this guide, we&#8217;ve put together the very best website builders for small business and their features [&#8230;]</p>\
<p>The post <a rel="nofollow" href="https://wpforms.com/best-website-builder-for-small-business/">The 11 Best Website Builders for Small Business (Expert Roundup)</a> appeared first on <a rel="nofollow" href="https://wpforms.com">WPForms</a>.</p>\
";s:7:"attribs";a:0:{}s:8:"xml_base";s:0:"";s:17:"xml_base_explicit";b:0;s:8:"xml_lang";s:0:"";}}}s:32:"http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/";a:1:{s:7:"creator";a:1:{i:0;a:5:{s:4:"data";s:12:"Lisa Gennaro";s:7:"attribs";a:0:{}s:8:"xml_base";s:0:"";s:17:"xml_base_explicit";b:0;s:8:"xml_lang";s:0:"";}}}s:40:"http://purl.org/rss/1.0/modules/content/";a:1:{s:7:"encoded";a:1:{i:0;a:5:{s:4:"data";s:28836:"<p>Want to build your small business website yourself in just a few clicks?</p>\
<p>These days, there are lots of beginner-friendly website builders that can help you save money by not hiring someone to make a website for you.</p>\
<p>In this guide, we&#8217;ve put together the very best website builders for small business and their features so you can find the right one for you.</p>\
<h3>The Best Website Builders for Small Business</h3>\
<p>We&#8217;ve rounded up a list of the world&#8217;s most popular and best website builders for small business.</p>\
<h3>1. <a title="Bluehost" href="https://wpforms.com/refer/bluehost/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer">WordPress.org</a></h3>\
<p><a title="Bluehost" href="https://wpforms.com/refer/bluehost/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-535783" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/build-a-website-for-your-small-business.jpg" alt="build a website for your small business" width="1116" height="726" srcset="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/build-a-website-for-your-small-business.jpg 1116w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/build-a-website-for-your-small-business-300x195.jpg 300w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/build-a-website-for-your-small-business-768x500.jpg 768w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/build-a-website-for-your-small-business-1024x666.jpg 1024w" sizes="(max-width: 1116px) 100vw, 1116px" /></a></p>\
<p>The most popular website builder in the world is WordPress.org — the platform powers 34% of the entire internet.</p>\
<p><a title="Bluehost" href="https://wpforms.com/refer/bluehost/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer">WordPress.org self-hosted with Bluehost</a> is a Content Management System (CMS) that&#8217;s flexible and super easy to use. Most people agree that it&#8217;s the best free website builder for your small business website.</p>\
<div class="alert alert-warning"><p>Make sure you&#8217;re clear on the differences of <a href="https://wpforms.com/wordpress-com-vs-wordpress-org-pros-and-cons-compared/">WordPress.com vs </a><a href="https://wpforms.com/wordpress-com-vs-wordpress-org-pros-and-cons-compared/">WordPress.org</a>.</p>\
</div>\
<p>If you&#8217;re using WordPress.org, creating a website is super easy because you can use the fantastic <a href="https://wpforms.com/best-drag-and-drop-wordpress-page-builders/">drag and drop website builders</a> out there like <a title="Divi" href="https://wpforms.com/refer/divi/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer">Divi</a>, <a title="Elementor Pro" href="https://wpforms.com/refer/elementor-pro/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer">Elementor</a>, or <a title="Beaver Builder" href="https://wpforms.com/refer/beaver-builder/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer">Beaver Builder</a> to make your site look professionally designed.</p>\
<p>You can also use one of the <a href="https://wpforms.com/best-wordpress-themes-for-small-business/">best WordPress themes for small business</a> to make your site look like you had a web designer&#8217;s help.</p>\
<p><strong>Pros:</strong></p>\
<ul>\
<li>It&#8217;s open-source which means it&#8217;s available on most <a href="https://wpforms.com/best-wordpress-hosting-guide/">web hosting platforms</a>, including Bluehost</li>\
<li>WordPress.org has drag and drop builder compatibility</li>\
<li>1,000&#8217;s of <a href="https://wpforms.com/best-free-wordpress-plugins-for-your-website/">WordPress plugins</a> are available to give your site more functions and features (for ultimate customization)</li>\
<li>Used and loved by <a href="https://www.wpbeginner.com/showcase/40-most-notable-big-name-brands-that-are-using-wordpress/">major brands</a></li>\
<li>Easily take credit cards and <a href="https://www.wpbeginner.com/beginners-guide/make-money-online/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">make money online</a> with an eCommerce store</li>\
</ul>\
<p><strong>Cons:</strong></p>\
<ul>\
<li>Unless you have <a href="https://wpforms.com/best-managed-wordpress-hosting/">managed WordPress hosting</a>, you&#8217;re in charge of maintaining your website (backups, security, updates, and more), which might not be part of your business plan</li>\
<li>Setting up a website can be a little time-consuming but there&#8217;s lots of <a href="https://www.wpbeginner.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">WordPress for beginners</a> resources out there</li>\
</ul>\
<p><strong>Pricing:</strong></p>\
<p>WordPress.org on it&#8217;s own is free. But you need to install it somewhere, so you&#8217;ll need to get your domain name and hosting — we recommend <a title="Bluehost" href="https://wpforms.com/refer/bluehost/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer">Bluehost</a>.</p>\
<p>You can get started for just $2.75/month which includes a free custom domain.</p>\
<p><a title="Bluehost" href="https://wpforms.com/refer/bluehost/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer">Click here to get started with WordPress on Bluehost</a>.</p>\
<h3>2. <a title="Constant Contact Website Builder" href="https://wpforms.com/refer/constant-contact-website-builder/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer">Constant Contact Website Builder</a></h3>\
<p><a title="Constant Contact Website Builder" href="https://wpforms.com/refer/constant-contact-website-builder/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-535786" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/constant-contact-website-builder.png" alt="constant contact website builder" width="1116" height="541" srcset="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/constant-contact-website-builder.png 1116w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/constant-contact-website-builder-300x145.png 300w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/constant-contact-website-builder-768x372.png 768w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/constant-contact-website-builder-1024x496.png 1024w" sizes="(max-width: 1116px) 100vw, 1116px" /></a></p>\
<p>Wondering which website builder is easiest to use? <a title="Constant Contact Website Builder" href="https://wpforms.com/refer/constant-contact-website-builder/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer">Constant Contact Website Builder</a> comes from the people who created one of the <a href="https://wpforms.com/best-email-marketing-service-providers-with-free-options/">best email marketing services around,</a> Constant Contact, so you know it&#8217;s easy to use while still being powerful.</p>\
<p><strong>Pros:</strong></p>\
<ul>\
<li>Easy to use drag and drop builder lets you build a site in minutes</li>\
<li>Amazing customer support available 24/7 to help via email, live chat, or phone</li>\
<li>Includes a free SSL certificate for added <a href="https://www.wpbeginner.com/wordpress-security/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">WordPress security</a></li>\
<li>Comes with essential features like blog and eCommerce integration</li>\
</ul>\
<p><strong>Cons:</strong></p>\
<ul>\
<li>No integrations for 3rd-party extensions</li>\
<li>It&#8217;s not as customizable and full of features as other website builders like WordPress.org</li>\
</ul>\
<p><strong>Pricing:</strong></p>\
<p>There&#8217;s a free version but you&#8217;ll need to upgrade to get a custom domain which starts at $10/month.</p>\
<p><a title="Constant Contact Website Builder" href="https://wpforms.com/refer/constant-contact-website-builder/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer">Click here to get started with Constant Contact Website Builder today</a>.</p>\
<h3>3. <a title="BigCommerce" href="https://wpforms.com/refer/bigcommerce/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer">BigCommerce</a></h3>\
<p><a title="BigCommerce" href="https://wpforms.com/refer/bigcommerce/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-535792" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/bigcommerce-site-builder-for-small-business-owners.jpg" alt="bigcommerce site builder for small business owners" width="1116" height="550" srcset="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/bigcommerce-site-builder-for-small-business-owners.jpg 1116w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/bigcommerce-site-builder-for-small-business-owners-300x148.jpg 300w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/bigcommerce-site-builder-for-small-business-owners-768x378.jpg 768w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/bigcommerce-site-builder-for-small-business-owners-1024x505.jpg 1024w" sizes="(max-width: 1116px) 100vw, 1116px" /></a></p>\
<p>Looking to power your online store? <a title="BigCommerce" href="https://wpforms.com/refer/bigcommerce/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer">BigCommerce</a> is the website builder behind websites like Ben &amp; Jerry&#8217;s, CamelBak, Skullcandy, and other well-known online stores. They know their stuff about eCommerce and they&#8217;ve made a product to help people build, manage, and grow an online store without knowing a line of code.</p>\
<p><strong>Pros:</strong></p>\
<ul>\
<li>You don&#8217;t have to worry about the technical side of things when you build a website</li>\
<li>Easily build and design your own eCommerce store with beautiful templates</li>\
<li>Keep credit cards and financial info safe with protection from hackers and <a href="https://www.wpbeginner.com/glossary/ddos/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">DDoS attacks</a></li>\
<li>Customize your store by adding advanced features with BigCommerce apps including reviews, shipping tools, and more</li>\
<li>They offer 24/7 chat, email, and phone support which is incredibly helpful for small business owners and employees</li>\
</ul>\
<p><strong>Cons:</strong></p>\
<ul>\
<li>You can&#8217;t install any 3rd-party extensions outside of the ones offered by Constant Contact</li>\
<li>It&#8217;s not free and you&#8217;ll need to upgrade for additional features like stored credit cards</li>\
</ul>\
<p><strong>Pricing:</strong></p>\
<p>Their basic plan starts at $29.95/month.</p>\
<h3>4. <a title="Shopify" href="https://wpforms.com/refer/shopify/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer">Shopify</a></h3>\
<p><a title="Shopify" href="https://wpforms.com/refer/shopify/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-535807" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/shopify-custom-domain-to-build-a-website.png" alt="shopify custom domain to build a website" width="1116" height="588" srcset="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/shopify-custom-domain-to-build-a-website.png 1116w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/shopify-custom-domain-to-build-a-website-300x158.png 300w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/shopify-custom-domain-to-build-a-website-768x405.png 768w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/shopify-custom-domain-to-build-a-website-1024x540.png 1024w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/shopify-custom-domain-to-build-a-website-625x328.png 625w" sizes="(max-width: 1116px) 100vw, 1116px" /></a></p>\
<p>Curious which website builder is best for eCommerce? <a title="Shopify" href="https://wpforms.com/refer/shopify/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer">Shopify</a> is one of the best and well-known website builders made especially for online stores and eCommerce small business websites. It powers over 500,000 businesses and more than $40 billion of products have been sold through this powerful site builder platform.</p>\
<p><strong>Pros:</strong></p>\
<ul>\
<li>Since it&#8217;s an all-in-one managed solution, you don&#8217;t have to worry about updating software or backups</li>\
<li>They offer 100&#8217;s of stunning pre-built designs to give your online store a professional look</li>\
<li>The drag and drop website builder is easy to use even for beginners</li>\
<li>Shopify offers an in-store POS so you can sell products on location as well as your eCommerce store</li>\
</ul>\
<p><strong>Cons:</strong></p>\
<ul>\
<li>If you use an external payment gateway, Shopify charges a fee of .5 to 2% per transaction</li>\
<li>It&#8217;s difficult to move your site away from Shopify</li>\
<li>The pricing is higher than most other website builders which might be an issue for many small business owners</li>\
</ul>\
<p><strong>Pricing:</strong></p>\
<p>Shopify&#8217;s basic plan starts at $29/month.</p>\
<h3>5. <a title="GoDaddy Website Builder" href="https://wpforms.com/refer/godaddy-website-builder/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer">GoDaddy Website Builder</a></h3>\
<p><a title="GoDaddy Website Builder" href="https://wpforms.com/refer/godaddy-website-builder/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-535805" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/godaddy-website-builder-easy-to-use.jpg" alt="godaddy website builder easy to use" width="1116" height="579" srcset="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/godaddy-website-builder-easy-to-use.jpg 1116w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/godaddy-website-builder-easy-to-use-300x156.jpg 300w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/godaddy-website-builder-easy-to-use-768x398.jpg 768w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/godaddy-website-builder-easy-to-use-1024x531.jpg 1024w" sizes="(max-width: 1116px) 100vw, 1116px" /></a></p>\
<p><a title="GoDaddy Website Builder" href="https://wpforms.com/refer/godaddy-website-builder/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer">GoDaddy Website Builder</a> comes from one of the most well-known domain name and hosting service providers in the world. Of course, this simple online website builder includes GoDaddy hosting. It&#8217;s a good bet if you want a simple website and don&#8217;t need to have lots of content on it.</p>\
<p><strong>Pros:</strong></p>\
<ul>\
<li>Has an easy to use drag and drop website builder</li>\
<li>Works on smaller screens like tablets and mobile phones</li>\
<li>A Getty Photography integrated image library for you to use on your site</li>\
</ul>\
<p><strong>Cons:</strong></p>\
<ul>\
<li>Has a limited set of features and fewer design and customization options</li>\
<li>It&#8217;s difficult to move your site away from GoDaddy Website Builder</li>\
</ul>\
<p><strong>Pricing:</strong></p>\
<p>GoDaddy Website Builder has business plans that start at $9.99/month.</p>\
<h3>6. <a title="HostGator Builder" href="https://wpforms.com/refer/hostgator-builder/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer">Gator Website Builder</a></h3>\
<p><a title="HostGator Builder" href="https://wpforms.com/refer/hostgator-builder/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer"><img class="alignnone wp-image-535804 size-full" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/host-gator-1.png" alt="host gator website builder" width="1116" height="501" srcset="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/host-gator-1.png 1116w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/host-gator-1-300x135.png 300w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/host-gator-1-768x345.png 768w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/host-gator-1-1024x460.png 1024w" sizes="(max-width: 1116px) 100vw, 1116px" /></a></p>\
<p>Another builder created by a hosting company is <a title="HostGator Builder" href="https://wpforms.com/refer/hostgator-builder/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer">Gator Website Builder</a>, made by HostGator. It&#8217;s another popular tool for small businesses to use to build a website.</p>\
<p><strong>Pros:</strong></p>\
<ul>\
<li>Drag and drop builder is incredibly easy to use to add images, video, Google maps, and more to your site</li>\
<li>Tons of professionally designed themes to pick from so your site looks fantastic</li>\
<li>The already low price even includes a custom domain name, SSL certificate, and hosting which makes it one of the most cost-effective site builders on our list</li>\
</ul>\
<p><strong>Cons:</strong></p>\
<ul>\
<li>The limited features make it not ideal for eCommerce stores or websites that want more than a simple online presence</li>\
</ul>\
<p><strong>Pricing:</strong></p>\
<p>Wondering what is the best <strong>and</strong> cheapest website builder? If you want a basic website, Gator Website Builder could be a good choice for you because it starts at only $3.46/month.</p>\
<h3>7. <a title="MemberPress" href="https://wpforms.com/refer/memberpress/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer">MemberPress</a></h3>\
<p><a title="MemberPress" href="https://wpforms.com/refer/memberpress/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-537340" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/memberpress-membership-plugin-for-wordpress-site-builder.png" alt="memberpress membership plugin for wordpress site builder" width="1116" height="493" srcset="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/memberpress-membership-plugin-for-wordpress-site-builder.png 1116w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/memberpress-membership-plugin-for-wordpress-site-builder-300x133.png 300w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/memberpress-membership-plugin-for-wordpress-site-builder-768x339.png 768w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/memberpress-membership-plugin-for-wordpress-site-builder-1024x452.png 1024w" sizes="(max-width: 1116px) 100vw, 1116px" /></a></p>\
<p><a title="MemberPress" href="https://wpforms.com/refer/memberpress/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer">MemberPress</a> is a great site builder for small businesses and it&#8217;s actually a plugin that you&#8217;ll need a <a title="Bluehost" href="https://wpforms.com/refer/bluehost/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer">self hosted WordPress.org</a> website to use. This is the route you&#8217;ll want to take if you want to <a href="https://wpforms.com/create-a-membership-site-with-wordpress/">set up a membership website easily</a>.</p>\
<p><strong>Pros:</strong></p>\
<ul>\
<li>You can accept payments for memberships, sell digital downloads, and control who sees all of your site&#8217;s content</li>\
<li>Build a business online with recurring subscription revenue</li>\
<li>Set up a membership website in just minutes with no coding</li>\
<li>Integrates with email marketing services to help <a href="https://wpforms.com/best-wordpress-lead-generation-plugins-to-grow-your-email-list/">grow your email list</a></li>\
</ul>\
<div class="alert alert-warning"><p>Check out our list of the <a href="https://wpforms.com/best-wordpress-membership-plugins-compared/">best membership plugins compared</a>.</p>\
</div>\
<p><strong>Cons:</strong></p>\
<ul>\
<li>Like many 3rd-party plugins, it&#8217;s works with WordPress.org so you&#8217;ll need to take care of software updates and backups yourself</li>\
</ul>\
<p><strong>Pricing:</strong></p>\
<p>MemberPress pricing starts at $149/year.</p>\
<h3>8. <a title="Weebly" href="https://wpforms.com/refer/weebly/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer">Weebly</a></h3>\
<p><a title="Weebly" href="https://wpforms.com/refer/weebly/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-535806" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/weebly-drag-and-drop-builder.jpg" alt="weebly drag and drop builder" width="1116" height="561" srcset="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/weebly-drag-and-drop-builder.jpg 1116w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/weebly-drag-and-drop-builder-300x151.jpg 300w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/weebly-drag-and-drop-builder-768x386.jpg 768w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/weebly-drag-and-drop-builder-1024x515.jpg 1024w" sizes="(max-width: 1116px) 100vw, 1116px" /></a></p>\
<p><a title="Weebly" href="https://wpforms.com/refer/weebly/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer">Weebly</a> is listed among the best free website builder software for small business often since you can get started for free. And while it’s hard to argue with that price tag keep in mind — you get what you pay for.</p>\
<p><strong>Pros:</strong></p>\
<ul>\
<li>Start building a website right away with the easy drag and drop builder tool if you need a simple online presence</li>\
<li>Ability to see website stats</li>\
<li>Offers pre-designed layouts to help customize your site</li>\
</ul>\
<p><strong>Cons:</strong></p>\
<ul>\
<li>There&#8217;s no free domain name here since you&#8217;ll need a premium plan to remove the Weebly subdomain from your URL (which can make your site look unprofessional)</li>\
</ul>\
<p><strong>Pricing:</strong></p>\
<p>The Weebly Starter plan starts at $8/month.</p>\
<h3>9. <a title="BoldGrid" href="https://wpforms.com/refer/boldgrid/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer">BoldGird</a></h3>\
<p><a title="BoldGrid" href="https://wpforms.com/refer/boldgrid/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-535808" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/boldgrid-website-platform-for-small-business.png" alt="boldgrid website platform for small business" width="1116" height="401" srcset="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/boldgrid-website-platform-for-small-business.png 1116w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/boldgrid-website-platform-for-small-business-300x108.png 300w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/boldgrid-website-platform-for-small-business-768x276.png 768w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/boldgrid-website-platform-for-small-business-1024x368.png 1024w" sizes="(max-width: 1116px) 100vw, 1116px" /></a></p>\
<p><a title="BoldGrid" href="https://wpforms.com/refer/boldgrid/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer">BoldGrid</a> is a unique and new type of website builder that&#8217;s built on top of WordPress.org. It&#8217;s offered as a standalone WordPress plugin as well as a fully hosted website builder suite. It&#8217;s one of the best website platforms for small business since it has very little cons.</p>\
<p><strong>Pros:</strong></p>\
<ul>\
<li>Build a website quickly with a professional design from their theme collection</li>\
<li>Access the benefits of WordPress.org since it&#8217;s built on top of the platform</li>\
<li>Drag and drop site builder customizer to change fonts, colors, layouts and more</li>\
<li><a title="WooCommerce" href="https://wpforms.com/refer/woocommerce-2/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer">WooCommerce</a> ready</li>\
<li>WordPress.org backups are handled through BoldGrid</li>\
<li>Very affordable so great for new small business owners</li>\
</ul>\
<p><strong>Cons:</strong></p>\
<ul>\
<li>You&#8217;ll need WordPress.org to use BoldGrid</li>\
</ul>\
<p><strong>Pricing:</strong></p>\
<p>The basic plan is free and premium plans start at only $20/year.</p>\
<h3>10. <a title="SiteBuilder" href="https://wpforms.com/refer/sitebuilder/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer">SiteBuilder</a></h3>\
<p><a title="SiteBuilder" href="https://wpforms.com/refer/sitebuilder/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-536361" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/sitebuilder.png" alt="sitebuilder" width="1116" height="597" srcset="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/sitebuilder.png 1116w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/sitebuilder-300x160.png 300w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/sitebuilder-768x411.png 768w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/sitebuilder-1024x548.png 1024w" sizes="(max-width: 1116px) 100vw, 1116px" /></a></p>\
<p><a title="SiteBuilder" href="https://wpforms.com/refer/sitebuilder/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer">SiteBuilder</a> is a straightforward (and affordable) website builder that lets you easily and quickly create a small business site, blog, or even an eCommerce store.</p>\
<p><strong>Pros:</strong></p>\
<ul>\
<li>User-friendly drag and drop builder</li>\
<li>Hosting and a domain name are including with their plans</li>\
<li>Set up an online store easily with their eCommerce option</li>\
<li>Includes some <a href="https://wpforms.com/best-google-analytics-plugins-for-wordpress/">website analytics</a></li>\
<li>Offers lots of gorgeous pre-built templates</li>\
</ul>\
<p><strong>Cons:</strong></p>\
<ul>\
<li>SiteBuilder has limited options if you&#8217;re hoping for more than just a basic online presence for your small business</li>\
</ul>\
<p><strong>Pricing:</strong></p>\
<p>SiteBuilder starts at $5/month for their basic plan and $9/month for eCommerce.</p>\
<h3>11. <a href="http://squarespace.com" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer">Squarespace</a></h3>\
<p><a href="http://squarespace.com" target="_blank" rel="= nofollow noopener noreferrer"><img class="alignnone wp-image-514674 size-full" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/squarespace-blogging-service.jpg" alt="squarespace blogging service" width="1116" height="600" srcset="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/squarespace-blogging-service.jpg 1116w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/squarespace-blogging-service-300x161.jpg 300w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/squarespace-blogging-service-768x413.jpg 768w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/squarespace-blogging-service-1024x551.jpg 1024w" sizes="(max-width: 1116px) 100vw, 1116px" /></a></p>\
<p><a href="http://squarespace.com" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer">Squarespace</a> is one of the best website builders for small business that&#8217;s very well-known for their sleek and cool designs. It&#8217;s an OK choice if you want a simple website that looks professionally designed.</p>\
<p><strong>Pros:</strong></p>\
<ul>\
<li>It&#8217;s very easy to use with their drag and drop builder</li>\
<li>They take care of hosting and it includes a custom domain</li>\
<li>Not only do they have tons of templates, you can use more than one on the same website to make it really unique</li>\
<li>Offers an eCommerce plan if you&#8217;d like to add an online store to your site</li>\
</ul>\
<p><strong>Cons:</strong></p>\
<ul>\
<li>You can&#8217;t access most 3rd-party applications which can be a huge barrier to <a href="https://wpforms.com/wpforms-power-hacks-to-grow-your-business-online/">growing your business online</a></li>\
<li>They have limited payment gateways you can accept money through</li>\
</ul>\
<p><strong>Pricing:</strong></p>\
<p>Squarespace starts at $12/month. If you&#8217;d like an eCommerce site, it starts at $26/month.</p>\
<h3>What&#8217;s the Best Website Builder for Small Business?</h3>\
<p>Our picks for the best website platform for small business are self-hosted <a title="Bluehost" href="https://wpforms.com/refer/bluehost/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer">WordPress.org</a> and <a title="Constant Contact Website Builder" href="https://wpforms.com/refer/constant-contact-website-builder/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer">Constant Contact Website Builder</a>.</p>\
<p>Both of these solutions offer access to or their own drag and drop builder making them very user-friendly. On top of that, they both are affordable so they&#8217;re perfect for a small business budget.</p>\
<p>If you want the best of the best in websites and online marketing capabilities, you&#8217;ll want to go with WordPress.org.</p>\
<p>But if you&#8217;re looking for a simple solution to build a website quickly, Constant Contact Website Builder is our other suggestion.</p>\
<h3>In Conclusion</h3>\
<p>And that&#8217;s it! You now know the best website builders for small businesses. Hopefully, this post helped you find the right solution for you from the builder on this list.</p>\
<p>Make sure you check out our post on <a href="https://wpforms.com/reduce-shopping-cart-abandonment/">ways to reduce shopping cart abandonment</a> if you&#8217;re just getting started with your business online.</p>\

So easy that anyone can do it.</p>\
<p>That&#8217;s why we&#8217;re so thrilled to announce our new partnership with Themify.</p>\
<p>Themify&#8217;s flexible and powerful WordPress themes make it so simple to set up a site because they use something we love — A drag and drop builder.</p>\
<p>Now, when you combine the power of the user friendly WPForms plugin with a <a title="Themify" href="https://wpforms.com/refer/themify/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer">Themify</a> theme, you&#8217;ll master creating and managing your very own WordPress site in just a few clicks.</p>\
<h3>Build a Great Looking Site with WPForms + Themify</h3>\
<p><a title="Themify" href="https://wpforms.com/refer/themify/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-535339" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/themify-features.png" alt="themify features" width="1116" height="326" srcset="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/themify-features.png 1116w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/themify-features-300x88.png 300w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/themify-features-768x224.png 768w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/themify-features-1024x299.png 1024w" sizes="(max-width: 1116px) 100vw, 1116px" /></a></p>\
<p>Themify offers customizable, stylish, and beginner friendly WordPress theme templates. Their <a title="Themify Ultra" href="https://wpforms.com/refer/themify-ultra/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer">Ultra theme</a> lets you pick from dozens of different skins and addons to make your site exactly the way you want it.</p>\
<p><iframe src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/SENb0osYYXs?rel=0" width="560" height="315" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="allowfullscreen"><span data-mce-type="bookmark" style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; overflow: hidden; line-height: 0;" class="mce_SELRES_start">﻿</span></iframe></p>\
<p>With Themify, you can really make your online presence stand out with the latest cool trends — like parallax scrolling and single-page themes.</p>\
<p>Now Themify is partnering with WPForms so you can automatically install the WPForms plugin along with your theme.</p>\
<h3>Easily Customize Your Themify Theme</h3>\
<p>We love Themify&#8217;s drag and drop WordPress theme builder — you don&#8217;t need technical knowledge to build a great looking website.</p>\
<p><a title="Themify Ultra" href="https://wpforms.com/refer/themify-ultra/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-535404" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/themify-drag-and-drop-builder.jpg" alt="themify drag and drop builder" width="1116" height="614" srcset="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/themify-drag-and-drop-builder.jpg 1116w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/themify-drag-and-drop-builder-300x165.jpg 300w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/themify-drag-and-drop-builder-768x423.jpg 768w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/themify-drag-and-drop-builder-1024x563.jpg 1024w" sizes="(max-width: 1116px) 100vw, 1116px" /></a></p>\
<p>And the <a title="Themify Ultra" href="https://wpforms.com/refer/themify-ultra/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer">Ultra theme</a> lets you create the site of your dreams without hiring someone to make it for you. It offers tons of flexible features like:</p>\
<ul>\
<li>An instant demo content importer so your site is customized in just a few clicks</li>\
<li>A wide range of layout options to make your site look and feel unique</li>\
<li>Parallax scrolling for animated effects</li>\
<li>A live preview to see your work while you change it on the frontend</li>\
<li>A basic or advanced theme customizer to support the needs of beginners and developers</li>\
<li>Fantastic documentation and support for help when you need it</li>\
</ul>\
<p>And every single one of Themify’s WordPress themes are <a href="https://www.wpbeginner.com/glossary/responsive-theme/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">100% responsive</a> and mobile-friendly, so they&#8217;ll look awesome on any device.</p>\
<p>But the coolest part about Themify? If you can&#8217;t decide on a theme, you can <a title="Themify" href="https://wpforms.com/refer/themify/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer">join their Theme Club</a> and access them all — saving yourself a lot of money.</p>\
<p>If you&#8217;re looking for a site that lets even beginners customize their websites exactly the way they want it, Themify could be a fantastic choice for you.</p>\
<p>We&#8217;re delighted to work with <a title="Themify" href="https://wpforms.com/refer/themify/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer">Themify</a> to keep creating user-friendly tools that make it effortless to build your own professional-looking website.</p>\
