<p>The post <a rel="nofollow" href="https://wpforms.com/reduce-shopping-cart-abandonment/">10 Easy Ways to Reduce Shopping Cart Abandonment (2019)</a> appeared first on <a rel="nofollow" href="https://wpforms.com">WPForms</a>.</p>\
";s:7:"attribs";a:0:{}s:8:"xml_base";s:0:"";s:17:"xml_base_explicit";b:0;s:8:"xml_lang";s:0:"";}}}s:32:"http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/";a:1:{s:7:"creator";a:1:{i:0;a:5:{s:4:"data";s:12:"Lisa Gennaro";s:7:"attribs";a:0:{}s:8:"xml_base";s:0:"";s:17:"xml_base_explicit";b:0;s:8:"xml_lang";s:0:"";}}}s:40:"http://purl.org/rss/1.0/modules/content/";a:1:{s:7:"encoded";a:1:{i:0;a:5:{s:4:"data";s:19420:"<p>Tired of losing money from your online store when people abandon their carts?</p>\
<p>Since an average of 77% of shoppers have reportedly abandoned a shopping cart before completing a purchase, you&#8217;ll definitely want try some proven tips to avoid this and see your sales soar.</p>\
<p>In this guide, we&#8217;ve listed some of the best ways to reduce shopping cart abandonment.</p>\
<h3>What Is Checkout Abandonment?</h3>\
<p>Checkout abandonment is when someone abandons their shopping cart during the checkout process while online shopping.</p>\
<p>If lots of people abandon their carts without completing their purchase, your form conversion rate will be sky-high.</p>\
<h3>Cart Abandonment Statistics</h3>\
<p>Here are some powerful cart abandonment statistics about shoppers who abandon the checkout process:</p>\
<ul>\
<li>12% of people abandon a form during an online checkout if there aren&#8217;t trust badges</li>\
<li>23% of people won&#8217;t fill out your checkout form if you make them create an account</li>\
<li>The top 3 reasons for abandonment include unexpected costs (shipping, taxes, fees), required account creation, a complicated checkout process</li>\
<li>76.9% of shoppers abandon checkout forms at some point</li>\
<li>29% of people cite security reasons as a concern when it comes to completing online forms</li>\
<li>More than 67% of site visitors will abandon your form forever if they encounter any complications</li>\
</ul>\
<p>You can check out this awesome <a href="https://wpforms.com/how-to-combat-order-form-abandonment-and-increase-your-sales/#infographic">form abandonment stats infographic</a> to get a visual view of some of these and more stats:</p>\
<p><a href="https://wpforms.com/how-to-combat-order-form-abandonment-and-increase-your-sales/#infographic"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-528990" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/small-form-abandonment-infographic-stats.jpg" alt="average form abandonment stats infographic" width="1116" height="603" srcset="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/small-form-abandonment-infographic-stats.jpg 1116w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/small-form-abandonment-infographic-stats-300x162.jpg 300w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/small-form-abandonment-infographic-stats-768x415.jpg 768w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/small-form-abandonment-infographic-stats-1024x553.jpg 1024w" sizes="(max-width: 1116px) 100vw, 1116px" /></a></p>\
<p>Since online shoppers who abandon their carts can really cause your cart abandonment rates to climb, you may be asking yourself how do you recover an abandoned cart? Well, we&#8217;ve got the best cart abandonment solutions listed next.</p>\
<div class="alert alert-success"><p><a href="https://wpforms.com/online-form-statistics-facts/">Click here to see even more online form statistic and facts</a>.</p>\
</div>\
<h3>The Best Ways to Reduce Shopping Cart Abandonment</h3>\
<p>If you want to reduce shopping cart abandonment on your site, try these proven solutions:</p>\
<ol>\
<li><a href="#offerfreeshipping">Offer Free Shipping</a></li>\
<li><a href="#enableguestcheckout">Enable Guest Checkout</a></li>\
<li><a href="#offermultiplepaymentoptions">Offer Multiple Payment Options</a></li>\
<li><a href="#createurgency">Create Urgency</a></li>\
<li><a href="#sendanabandonedcartemail">Send an Abandoned Cart Email</a></li>\
<li><a href="#usesocialproof">Use Social Proof</a></li>\
<li><a href="#breadcrumbs">Breadcrumbs</a></li>\
<li><a href="#useexitintentpopups">Use Exit-Intent Popups</a></li>\
<li><a href="#tryconversationalmarketing">Try Conversational Marketing</a></li>\
<li><a href="#abtestyourforms">A/B Test Your Forms</a></li>\
</ol>\
<h3 id="offerfreeshipping">1. Offer Free Shipping</h3>\
<p>One of the shopping cart abandonment reasons for eCommerce sites is simply that they charge the customer shipping costs.</p>\
<p>Depending on exactly what you&#8217;re selling, shipping may be a small cost for you to consider covering yourself. This makes a huge difference psychologically when your customers are viewing their checkout forms.</p>\
<p>Free shipping is a huge selling point that tons of successful online retailers use to help reduce their cart abandonment rates.</p>\
<p><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-532108" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/offer-free-shipping-to-reduce-form-abandonment.jpg" alt="offer free shipping to reduce form abandonment" width="1116" height="445" srcset="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/offer-free-shipping-to-reduce-form-abandonment.jpg 1116w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/offer-free-shipping-to-reduce-form-abandonment-300x120.jpg 300w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/offer-free-shipping-to-reduce-form-abandonment-768x306.jpg 768w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/offer-free-shipping-to-reduce-form-abandonment-1024x408.jpg 1024w" sizes="(max-width: 1116px) 100vw, 1116px" /></p>\
<p>If you can&#8217;t offer free shipping, make sure you&#8217;re upfront about shipping costs through the entire purchase process.</p>\
<p>You can do this by using a plugin like the <a title="Woocommerce Shipping Calculator On Product Page" href="https://wpforms.com/refer/woocommerce-shipping-calculator-on-product-page/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer">WooCommerce Shipping Calculator on Product Page</a>.</p>\
<div class="alert alert-warning"><p>You should definitely check out our list of the <a href="https://wpforms.com/best-woocommerce-plugins/">best WooCommerce plugins</a></p>\
</div>\
<h3 id="enableguestcheckout">2. Enable Guest Checkout</h3>\
<p>To really reduce shopping cart abandonment, you shouldn&#8217;t require customers to create an account before they check out on your <a href="https://wpforms.com/how-to-create-a-simple-order-form-in-wordpress/">order form</a>.</p>\
<p>The more you ask of people during the checkout process, the more likely people will abandon it.</p>\
<p><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-532132" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/guest-checkout.jpg" alt="guest checkout" width="1116" height="600" srcset="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/guest-checkout.jpg 1116w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/guest-checkout-300x161.jpg 300w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/guest-checkout-768x413.jpg 768w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/guest-checkout-1024x551.jpg 1024w" sizes="(max-width: 1116px) 100vw, 1116px" /></p>\
<p>Enabling guest checkout also helps speed up the process. And, you can always ask people to register for an account after they&#8217;ve completed their purchase.</p>\
<h3 id="offermultiplepaymentoptions">3. Offer Multiple Payment Options</h3>\
<p>One of the biggest reasons for shopping cart abandonment is because a site doesn&#8217;t offer a variety of <a href="https://wpforms.com/how-to-add-optional-payment-to-your-wordpress-forms/">payment options</a>.</p>\
<p>Some people want to pay with credit cards. And, tons of users already know and trust online payment solutions like Stripe and PayPal. So you should mix it up.</p>\
<p>With WPForms, you can accept credit card payments, <a href="https://wpforms.com/addons/stripe-addon/">Stripe</a>, and <a href="https://wpforms.com/addons/paypal-standard-addon/">PayPal</a>, so your users have lots of choices in ways to pay.</p>\
<p>Giving people more than one payment options is a fantastic way to reduce your order form abandonment quickly.</p>\
<h3 id="createurgency">4. Create Urgency</h3>\
<p>You&#8217;ve probably seen a product online, read about it, and left the website to &#8220;think about it more&#8221; at one time or another in your life when shopping online.</p>\
<p>Well, your website visitors are doing this too — and there&#8217;s a fantastic way to help give them a nudge to make the purchase before leaving. Countdown timers.</p>\
<p><a href="http://rafflepress.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-532152" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/how-do-you-recover-an-abandoned-cart-with-countdown-timers.jpg" alt="how do you recover an abandoned cart with countdown timers" width="1116" height="360" srcset="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/how-do-you-recover-an-abandoned-cart-with-countdown-timers.jpg 1116w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/how-do-you-recover-an-abandoned-cart-with-countdown-timers-300x97.jpg 300w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/how-do-you-recover-an-abandoned-cart-with-countdown-timers-768x248.jpg 768w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/how-do-you-recover-an-abandoned-cart-with-countdown-timers-1024x330.jpg 1024w" sizes="(max-width: 1116px) 100vw, 1116px" /></a></p>\
<p>Give your visitors a boost of encouragement to checkout while they are on the page with a countdown timer. Product pages and checkout pages are some of the best places to put countdown timers.</p>\
<p>And i you&#8217;re using Shopify, check out this post on <a href="https://optinmonster.com/how-to-create-a-shopify-sales-countdown-timer/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">how to create a Shopify sales countdown timer</a>.</p>\
<p>So there&#8217;s actually a variety of ways to <a href="https://www.wpbeginner.com/plugins/how-to-add-a-milestone-countdown-widget-in-wordpress/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">add a countdown widget in WordPress</a>. Try it out and let us know how much you reduce shopping cart abandonment.</p>\
<h3 id="sendanabandonedcartemail">5. Send an Abandoned Cart Email</h3>\
<p>One of the absolutely easiest ways to reduce shopping cart abandonment is to make sure you&#8217;re using a tool to <strong>capture partial entries</strong> on your order forms.</p>\
<p>With the <a href="https://wpforms.com/addons/form-abandonment-addon/">Form Abandonment addon</a>, you can save the info people type into your form — even if they didn&#8217;t ever hit submit.</p>\
<p><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-27305" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/form-abandonment-entry.jpg" alt="Partial form entry" width="562" height="196" srcset="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/form-abandonment-entry.jpg 562w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/01/form-abandonment-entry-300x105.jpg 300w" sizes="(max-width: 562px) 100vw, 562px" /></p>\
<p>Then, you can follow up with those interested customers.</p>\
<p>You can even set up automatic form abandonment emails to go out to the email address they entered. This will give you the chance to invite them back to your website to finish the checkout process. How cool is that?</p>\
<h3 id="usesocialproof">6. Use Social Proof</h3>\
<p>Social proof marketing is a wonderful tool to add to your business online to help reduce your shopping cart abandonment rates.</p>\
<p>And social proof is really psychologically fascinating — It&#8217;s where people lean on the actions of others to help them make their own decisions. And it&#8217;s a very smart way to reduce shopping cart abandonment.</p>\
<p>One way to do this is to try adding <a href="http://trustpulse.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">TrustPulse</a> to your site. It lets you use the power of social proof and FOMO (fear of missing out). It works really well next to the urgency of the countdown timer you added from tip #4.</p>\
<p>TrustPulse displays recent activity on your site from real transactions.</p>\
<p><a href="http://monsterinsights.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><img class="alignnone wp-image-532169 size-full" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/social-proof-for-online-shoppers.jpg" alt="social proof for online shoppers" width="1116" height="503" srcset="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/social-proof-for-online-shoppers.jpg 1116w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/social-proof-for-online-shoppers-300x135.jpg 300w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/social-proof-for-online-shoppers-768x346.jpg 768w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/social-proof-for-online-shoppers-1024x462.jpg 1024w" sizes="(max-width: 1116px) 100vw, 1116px" /></a></p>\
<p>Plus, adding <a href="http://trustpulse.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">TrustPulse</a> to your site can boost your site conversions by up to an amazing 15%.</p>\
<p>For more ways to add social proof to your site, check out this guide on the <a href="https://www.monsterinsights.com/best-social-proof-wordpress-plugins-to-boost-your-sales/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">best social proof WordPress plugins to increase your sales</a>.</p>\
<h3 id="breadcrumbs">7. Breadcrumbs</h3>\
<p>One of the other helpful cart abandonment solutions to lower your shopping cart abandonment rate is to use breadcrumbs.</p>\
<p>Sometimes, you may need to get a lot of info from your customers. Especially if they&#8217;re on your checkout page — they may need to enter details like name, phone number, shipping address, payment information, email address, and more.</p>\
<p>If you have a long form, this is a fantastic opportunity to use breadcrumbs on your <a href="https://wpforms.com/features/multi-page-forms/">Multi-page forms</a>.</p>\
<p><a href="https://wpforms.com/features/multi-page-forms/"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-532014" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/breadcrumbs-reduce-form-abandonment.jpg" alt="breadcrumbs reduce form abandonment" width="1116" height="494" srcset="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/breadcrumbs-reduce-form-abandonment.jpg 1116w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/breadcrumbs-reduce-form-abandonment-300x133.jpg 300w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/breadcrumbs-reduce-form-abandonment-768x340.jpg 768w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/breadcrumbs-reduce-form-abandonment-1024x453.jpg 1024w" sizes="(max-width: 1116px) 100vw, 1116px" /></a></p>\
<p>WPForms lets you easily add breadcrumbs to your multi-part forms. That way, you can keep your website visitors informed throughout the entire checkout process.</p>\
<p>Head over to our tutorial on <a href="https://wpforms.com/how-to-create-a-multi-part-form-in-wordpress/">how to create a multi-part form in WordPress</a> to learn how to add breadcrumbs to help reduce shopping cart abandonment.</p>\
<h3 id="useexitintentpopups">8. Use Exit-Intent Popups</h3>\
<p>Exit-Intent popups work by sensing when someone is about to leave your site, and activating a popup at that exact moment.</p>\
<p><a href="https://optinmonster.com/features/exit-intent/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><img class="alignnone wp-image-520474 size-full" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/exit-intent-example.gif" alt="exit-intent-example" width="558" height="404" /></a></p>\
<p>You can put Exit-Intent popups on every single page of your site. But to use them to help reduce your shopping cart abandonment rates, add them to product pages and checkout pages and offer a deal, coupon, or give more info.</p>\
<p>And with <a href="https://optinmonster.com/features/exit-intent/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">OptinMonster&#8217;s Exit-Intent</a>&#8216;s other features, you can add customized popups depending on what the visitor has done on your site.</p>\
<p>For example, you can tweak the message based on which pages they&#8217;ve been on and what products they&#8217;re interested. It&#8217;s one of the many amazing features of <a href="http://optinmonster.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">OptinMonster</a> that helps reduce shopping cart abandonment.</p>\
<h3 id="tryconversationalmarketing">9. Try Conversational Marketing</h3>\
<p>Having a <a href="https://wpforms.com/ultimate-guide-to-conversational-marketing/)">conversational marketing</a> strategy for your website is an awesome way to help reduce shopping cart abandonment on your site.</p>\
<p>You can start by using conversational forms, which act like a one-on-one conversation with the user.</p>\
<p><a href="https://wpforms.com/ultimate-guide-to-conversational-marketing/"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-456788" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/conversational-marketing-example-wpforms.gif" alt="conversational-marketing-example-wpforms" width="562" height="405" /></a></p>\
<p>Also, if you make getting in touch with your brand super easy (especially during the checkout process) you&#8217;ll see way more people completing their checkouts. A great way to do this is with a live chat software.</p>\
<p>Don&#8217;t have the time to chat with customers yourself? You can use Chatbots, artificially intelligent software programs, that use <a href="https://wpforms.com/natural-language-form-examples/">natural language</a> and pre-programmed responses to have a conversation with your site visitors.</p>\
<p>Check out the <a href="https://wpforms.com/best-live-chat-software/">best LiveChat software</a> for your website if you&#8217;d like to learn more about using chat bots on your website so you can up your conversational marketing game.</p>\
<h3 id="abtestyourforms">10. A/B Test Your Forms</h3>\
<p>So even if you follow form conversion best practices, it’s not 100% guaranteed that you’ll get good results. That&#8217;s because every website is unique, so you&#8217;ll need to test what works best with your specific audience.</p>\
<p>The best way to do that is with a tool for your forms. Check out this great post on the <a href="https://wpforms.com/best-ab-testing-plugins-and-tools-for-your-wordpress-forms/">best A/B testing plugins and tools for your website</a>.</p>\
<p>If you&#8217;re using OptinMonster, you already have the option to preform A/B testing.</p>\
<p><iframe src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/I6ZZMvv_heQ?rel=0" width="560" height="315" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="allowfullscreen"><span data-mce-type="bookmark" style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; overflow: hidden; line-height: 0;" class="mce_SELRES_start">﻿</span></iframe></p>\
<p>A/B testing, also known as split testing, is a way to compare 2 different versions of your forms and view the stats about which one performed better.</p>\
<p>It&#8217;s actually a fantastic way to optimize your checkout forms without completely changing everything.</p>\
<p>A/B testing&#8217;s pretty successful at helping reduce shopping cart abandonment, too.</p>\
<h3>Final Thoughts</h3>\
<p>So there it is! You now have some easy tips to use to reduce shopping cart abandonment on your website.</p>\
<p>If you&#8217;re interested in boosting your email marketing game and need more people to visit your eCommerce site, be sure to check out our post on <a href="https://wpforms.com/get-more-email-subscribers/">how to get more email subscribers</a>.</p>\

In this post, we&#8217;ve rounded up the best Rafflecopter alternatives and their coolest features. The Best Rafflecopter Alternatives To create a successful [&#8230;]</p>\
<p>The post <a rel="nofollow" href="https://wpforms.com/rafflecopter-alternatives-create-free-giveaway/">9 Best Rafflecopter Alternatives to Create a Free Giveaway (2019)</a> appeared first on <a rel="nofollow" href="https://wpforms.com">WPForms</a>.</p>\
";s:7:"attribs";a:0:{}s:8:"xml_base";s:0:"";s:17:"xml_base_explicit";b:0;s:8:"xml_lang";s:0:"";}}}s:32:"http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/";a:1:{s:7:"creator";a:1:{i:0;a:5:{s:4:"data";s:12:"Lisa Gennaro";s:7:"attribs";a:0:{}s:8:"xml_base";s:0:"";s:17:"xml_base_explicit";b:0;s:8:"xml_lang";s:0:"";}}}s:40:"http://purl.org/rss/1.0/modules/content/";a:1:{s:7:"encoded";a:1:{i:0;a:5:{s:4:"data";s:26226:"<p>Looking for other options besides Rafflecopter to create a free online giveaway?</p>\
<p>Organizing a giveaway is a great way to skyrocket your online growth, and there are even free tools to help you.</p>\
<p>In this post, we&#8217;ve rounded up the best Rafflecopter alternatives and their coolest features.</p>\
<h3 id="rafflecopteralternatives">The Best Rafflecopter Alternatives</h3>\
<p>To create a successful free online giveaway, you should check out these Rafflecopter alternatives:</p>\
<h3>1. <a href="http://rafflepress.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">RafflePress</a></h3>\

<h3>FAQs</h3>\
<p>We get a lot of questions about free WordPress giveaway plugins, so we&#8217;ve put together a handy FAQ here.</p>\
<h3>How Do I Run a Contest Online?</h3>\
<p>The easiest, most effective, and most popular way to run a social contest for your online business is by <strong>hosting giveaways</strong>. Wondering how to run a giveaway? First, make sure you understand what a giveaway actually is and means.</p>\
<h3>What Are Giveaways?</h3>\
<p>Online giveaways are promotional drawings (sweepstakes, technically) where a prize is given away to a participant chosen at random from a pool of entries.</p>\
<h3>What Are the Best Giveaways?</h3>\
<p>Whether your digital marketing strategy includes growing your email list or simply getting more followers, the best online giveaways are usually <strong>social media contests</strong>. This just simply means that your contest is easily shareable via social media.</p>\
<div class="alert alert-warning"><p>Make sure to check out this guide on <a href="https://www.isitwp.com/create-successful-giveaway-wordpress-site/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">how to create a successful giveaway on your WordPress site</a>.</p>\
</div>\
<h3>How Do I Track and Manage a Social Media Contest?</h3>\
<p>If you&#8217;re using a WordPress website for your business online, the simplest way to track and manage social media contests on your social networks is with a WordPress giveaway plugin like <a href="http://rafflepress.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">RafflePress</a>. With a social promotions tool like a giveaway plugin, you can track and manage your social media contests through an easy-to-use software.</p>\
<h3>How Do You Pick a Winner for a Giveaway?</h3>\
<p>You can use RafflePress to pick your winner with the random generator.</p>\
<p>But, before you pick your winner, make sure you&#8217;ve let your email list know about your giveaway. You can do this easily with RafflePress, since they have tons of <a href="https://optinmonster.com/beginners-guide-to-email-marketing/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">email marketing</a> and <a href="https://wpforms.com/top-crms-for-your-small-business/">CRM</a> integrations. Also, spread the word about your social media giveaway by submitting your contest to <a href="https://woorise.com/promote-giveaway-contest-free)" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer">free giveaway websites</a>.</p>\
<h3>Are Giveaways Allowed on Instagram?</h3>\
<p>Wondering to yourself can you promote a giveaway on Instagram? Great news, you can absolutely promote a giveaway on your Instagram account. Just make sure you are closely following <a href="https://help.instagram.com/179379842258600" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer">Instagram&#8217;s official Promotion Guidelines</a>.</p>\
<h3>How Can I Do a Free Giveaway on Instagram?</h3>\
<p>Yes, you can do a free giveaway on Instagram. If you&#8217;re using a free tool like the Rafflecopter alternatives listed above, you can share your contest via Instagram from the tool.</p>\
<p>The easiest way to keep track of an Instagram Giveaway is to use one of <a href="#rafflecopteralternatives">these tools</a>.</p>\
<h3>Are Facebook Giveaways Legal?</h3>\
<p>You may be asking yourself is it illegal to do giveaways on Facebook? And the answer is, it depends.</p>\
<p>It all depends on the terms of the giveaway, where you live, how you conduct it, and type of social promotions you run on the social media network.</p>\
<p>Keep yourself super aware of these rules. If you&#8217;re in the U.S., check out this great post about <a href="https://www.semrush.com/blog/facebook-promotions-us-law-contests/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer">Facebook contests and sweepstakes</a>.</p>\
<h3>How Do I Create a Giveaway on Facebook?</h3>\
<p>You can get started creating a free giveaway to share on Facebook by installing and setting up <a href="http://rafflepress.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">RafflePress</a> today.</p>\
<h3>In Conclusion</h3>\
<p>And there you have it. Hopefully, this post helped you find a Rafflecopter alternative to create a free online giveaway that works for you and your site&#8217;s needs.</p>\
<p>Plus, we hope we&#8217;ve helped answer your questions and you&#8217;ve learned how to create a giveaway.</p>\

<p>The post <a rel="nofollow" href="https://wpforms.com/lead-generation-forms-examples/">Lead Generation Forms: 23 Examples That Convert (Like Crazy)</a> appeared first on <a rel="nofollow" href="https://wpforms.com">WPForms</a>.</p>\
";s:7:"attribs";a:0:{}s:8:"xml_base";s:0:"";s:17:"xml_base_explicit";b:0;s:8:"xml_lang";s:0:"";}}}s:32:"http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/";a:1:{s:7:"creator";a:1:{i:0;a:5:{s:4:"data";s:12:"Lisa Gennaro";s:7:"attribs";a:0:{}s:8:"xml_base";s:0:"";s:17:"xml_base_explicit";b:0;s:8:"xml_lang";s:0:"";}}}s:40:"http://purl.org/rss/1.0/modules/content/";a:1:{s:7:"encoded";a:1:{i:0;a:5:{s:4:"data";s:31765:"<p>Want some design inspiration to get more conversions on your site?</p>\
<p>Your forms can convert like crazy if you follow the psychological and design tactics that the forms on this list do.</p>\
<p>In this post, we&#8217;ve searched the web and found some excellent lead generation forms examples to help increase your form conversion rates.</p>\
<h3>What Is a Lead Generation Form?</h3>\
<p>A lead generation form is a web form meant for capturing emails and other information of potential customers. The most common types of lead generation forms include contact forms, registration forms, and simple newsletter signup forms.</p>\
<h3>How Do You Optimize Lead Generation?</h3>\
<p>You&#8217;ll see a few themes of effective tactics on this list of lead generation forms examples.</p>\
<p>Many of these examples use a combination of some of these simple form optimization tricks:</p>\
<ul>\
<li>Use a compelling call to action button</li>\
<li>Offer a discount</li>\
<li>Optimize your pre-existing content as a lead magnet</li>\
<li>Create distraction-free landing pages</li>\
<li>Make multi-step forms if you have a long form</li>\
<li>Try gamified <a href="https://wpforms.com/best-discount-wheel-popup-plugins/">discount wheel popups</a></li>\
</ul>\
<p>Let&#8217;s take a look at some examples of how brands are using these and other lead generation forms tricks next.</p>\
<h3>Lead Generation Form Examples</h3>\
<p>To help you navigate the different niches of businesses online, here&#8217;s a list of the brands on our list of lead generation form examples.</p>\
<ol>\
<li><a href="#backtotheroots">Back to the Roots</a></li>\
<li><a href="#chamaileon">Chamaileon</a></li>\
<li><a href="#snacknation">SnackNation</a></li>\
<li><a href="#yumi">Yumi</a></li>\
<li><a href="#expat">Expat.com</a></li>\
<li><a href="#dailyharvest">Daily Harvest</a></li>\
<li><a href="#yumble">Yumble</a></li>\
<li><a href="#eof">Entrepreneurs On Fire</a></li>\
<li><a href="#mikelardi">MikeLardi.com</a></li>\
<li><a href="#basepaws">Basepaws</a></li>\
<li><a href="#linkedin">LinkedIn</a></li>\
<li><a href="#shark">Shark</a></li>\
<li><a href="#netflix">Netflix</a></li>\
<li><a href="#peloton">Peloton</a></li>\
<li><a href="#okcupid">OkCupid</a></li>\
<li><a href="#sme">Social Media Examiner</a></li>\
<li><a href="#simplehabit">Simple Habit</a></li>\
<li><a href="#marieforleo">Marie Forleo</a></li>\
<li><a href="#bulkly">Bulk.ly</a></li>\
<li><a href="#modsy">Modsy</a></li>\
<li><a href="#neilstrauss">Neil Strauss</a></li>\
<li><a href="#medium">Medium</a></li>\
<li><a href="#cracku">Cracku</a></li>\
</ol>\
<p>Check out these fantastic lead generation form examples and their tactics that you may want to start using on your own forms.</p>\
<h3 id="backtotheroots">1. Back to the Roots</h3>\
<h3><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-524429" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/messenger-use-in-lead-form-example-back-to-the-roots.jpg" alt="messenger use in lead form example back to the roots" width="1116" height="631" srcset="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/messenger-use-in-lead-form-example-back-to-the-roots.jpg 1116w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/messenger-use-in-lead-form-example-back-to-the-roots-300x170.jpg 300w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/messenger-use-in-lead-form-example-back-to-the-roots-768x434.jpg 768w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/messenger-use-in-lead-form-example-back-to-the-roots-1024x579.jpg 1024w" sizes="(max-width: 1116px) 100vw, 1116px" /></h3>\
<p>The Back to the Roots website has some great lead generation form examples, including this very wise use of a chatbot.</p>\
<p><strong>Key Tactics:</strong></p>\
<ul>\
<li>Social media type of <a href="https://optinmonster.com/docs/connect-optinmonster-manychat/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">ManyChat integration</a> through Facebook Messenger shows the user already &#8220;logged-in&#8221; — giving the sense of trust and reliability</li>\
<li>A <a href="https://optinmonster.com/docs/how-to-create-a-slide-in-scroll-box-optin-form/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">slide-in scroll box optin</a> that doesn&#8217;t disrupt the user experience</li>\
<li>Call to action copy &#8220;Tell me more&#8221; is actionable and written in 1st-person</li>\
</ul>\
<h3 id="chamaileon">2. Chamaileon</h3>\
<p><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-524358" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/distraction-free-landing-page.png" alt="distraction free landing page" width="1116" height="730" srcset="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/distraction-free-landing-page.png 1116w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/distraction-free-landing-page-300x196.png 300w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/distraction-free-landing-page-768x502.png 768w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/distraction-free-landing-page-1024x670.png 1024w" sizes="(max-width: 1116px) 100vw, 1116px" /></p>\
<p>This form from Chamaileon is straight to the point with no distractions and a simple, effective design.</p>\
<p><strong>Key Tactics:</strong></p>\
<ul>\
<li>Form submission is more likely with a <a href="https://wpforms.com/how-to-create-a-dedicated-form-landing-page-in-wordpress/">distraction-free landing page</a></li>\
<li>Call to action button uses a bright color and actionable copy</li>\
</ul>\
<h3 id="snacknation">3. SnackNation</h3>\
<p><img class="alignnone wp-image-524359 size-full" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/example-with-2-options.png" alt="lead-gen-form-example-with-2-options" width="1116" height="708" srcset="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/example-with-2-options.png 1116w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/example-with-2-options-300x190.png 300w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/example-with-2-options-768x487.png 768w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/example-with-2-options-1024x650.png 1024w" sizes="(max-width: 1116px) 100vw, 1116px" /></p>\
<p>SnackNation does an excellent job in this example of using effective <a href="https://optinmonster.com/features/yes-no-forms/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">yes/no forms</a> to get visitors to click something and personalize their sales journey themselves.</p>\
<p><strong>Key Tactics:</strong></p>\
<ul>\
<li>Personalized questions to identify the type of lead and send them to a page/form based on their needs</li>\
<li>Offers limited options for easier completion, including no &#8220;submit&#8221; button</li>\
</ul>\
<h3 id="yumi">4. Yumi</h3>\
<p><img class="alignnone wp-image-524360 size-full" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/example-with-personalization.png" alt="lead-generation-form-example-with-personalization" width="1116" height="726" srcset="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/example-with-personalization.png 1116w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/example-with-personalization-300x195.png 300w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/example-with-personalization-768x500.png 768w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/example-with-personalization-1024x666.png 1024w" sizes="(max-width: 1116px) 100vw, 1116px" /></p>\
<p>This straightforward multi-step form has a contemporary, sleek design to match the brand and help boost conversions, on top of other tactics.</p>\
<p><strong>Key Tactics:</strong></p>\
<ul>\
<li><a href="https://wpforms.com/how-to-add-html5-placeholder-text-in-your-wordpress-forms/">Custom placeholder text</a> in the form fields</li>\
<li>Different stages of the long form are broken down into a <a href="https://wpforms.com/features/multi-page-forms/">multi-page form</a></li>\
</ul>\
<h3 id="expat">5. Expat.com</h3>\
<p><img class="alignnone wp-image-524361 size-full" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/expat-with-benefits-for-joining.png" alt="expat-with-benefits-for-joining" width="1116" height="760" srcset="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/expat-with-benefits-for-joining.png 1116w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/expat-with-benefits-for-joining-300x204.png 300w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/expat-with-benefits-for-joining-768x523.png 768w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/expat-with-benefits-for-joining-1024x697.png 1024w" sizes="(max-width: 1116px) 100vw, 1116px" /></p>\
<p>What makes Expat.com&#8217;s lead generation form so impressive? The list of bulleted benefits on this split style form helps give visitors the best reasons to convert without taking up too much space.</p>\
<p><strong>Key Tactics:</strong></p>\
<ul>\
<li>List of benefits that lead the eye to a call to action button</li>\
<li>Bright colors for the CTA buttons</li>\
</ul>\
<h3 id="">6. Daily Harvest</h3>\
<p><img class="alignnone wp-image-524362 size-full" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/full-page-stunning-visuals-with-multistep-form.jpg" alt="full-page-stunning-visuals-with-multistep-form" width="1116" height="798" srcset="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/full-page-stunning-visuals-with-multistep-form.jpg 1116w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/full-page-stunning-visuals-with-multistep-form-300x215.jpg 300w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/full-page-stunning-visuals-with-multistep-form-768x549.jpg 768w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/full-page-stunning-visuals-with-multistep-form-1024x732.jpg 1024w" sizes="(max-width: 1116px) 100vw, 1116px" /></p>\
<p>What is a lead generation page and how do you create a lead generation page? Take a look at this Daily Harvest example of a lead generation page with lots of smart conversion tactics, then read our post on <a href="https://wpforms.com/how-to-create-a-dedicated-form-landing-page-in-wordpress/">how to create a dedicated form landing page in WordPress</a></p>\
<p><strong>Key Tactics:</strong></p>\
<ul>\
<li>Distraction-free <a href="https://wpforms.com/addons/form-pages-addon/">form page</a></li>\
<li>Stunning hi-res visual</li>\
</ul>\
<h3 id="yumble">7. Yumble</h3>\
<p><img class="alignnone wp-image-524364 size-full" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/geolocation-lead-form-example.jpg" alt="lead form" width="1116" height="556" srcset="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/geolocation-lead-form-example.jpg 1116w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/geolocation-lead-form-example-300x149.jpg 300w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/geolocation-lead-form-example-768x383.jpg 768w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/geolocation-lead-form-example-1024x510.jpg 1024w" sizes="(max-width: 1116px) 100vw, 1116px" /></p>\
<p>Yumble does a great job keeping their lead generation form focused on conversions and the user experience, all at the same time.</p>\
<p><strong>Key Tactics:</strong></p>\
<ul>\
<li>A multi-page form for their long form</li>\
<li>Distraction-free full-page design</li>\
</ul>\
<h3 id="eof">8. Entrepreneurs On Fire</h3>\
<p><img class="alignnone wp-image-524365 size-full" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/get-higher-quality-leads-with-a-confirmation-checkbox.jpg" alt="get-higher-quality-leads-with-a-confirmation-checkbox" width="1116" height="661" srcset="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/get-higher-quality-leads-with-a-confirmation-checkbox.jpg 1116w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/get-higher-quality-leads-with-a-confirmation-checkbox-300x178.jpg 300w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/get-higher-quality-leads-with-a-confirmation-checkbox-768x455.jpg 768w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/get-higher-quality-leads-with-a-confirmation-checkbox-1024x607.jpg 1024w" sizes="(max-width: 1116px) 100vw, 1116px" /></p>\
<p>This confirmation <a href="https://wpforms.com/docs/how-to-add-a-terms-of-service-checkbox-to-a-form/">checkbox</a> above the email field is a great tactic to get better conversions.</p>\
<p><strong>Key Tactics:</strong></p>\
<ul>\
<li>Adds a confirmation checkbox to help get higher quality leads by confirming consent in the form instead of in their inbox</li>\
<li>Uses bold colors</li>\
</ul>\
<h3 id="mikelardi">9. MikeLardi.com</h3>\
<p><img class="alignnone wp-image-524366 size-full" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/lead-generation-example-with-a-stunning-image.png" alt="lead-generation-example-with-a-stunning-image" width="1116" height="770" srcset="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/lead-generation-example-with-a-stunning-image.png 1116w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/lead-generation-example-with-a-stunning-image-300x207.png 300w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/lead-generation-example-with-a-stunning-image-768x530.png 768w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/lead-generation-example-with-a-stunning-image-1024x707.png 1024w" sizes="(max-width: 1116px) 100vw, 1116px" /></p>\
<p><strong>Key Tactics:</strong></p>\
<ul>\
<li>Full-page campaign with a stunning <a href="https://optinmonster.com/docs/how-to-add-a-custom-image-background-for-your-full-page-optin/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">custom background visual</a></li>\
<li>Direct call to action copy with the <a href="https://optinmonster.com/700-power-words-that-will-boost-your-conversions/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">power word</a> &#8220;freebie&#8221;</li>\
</ul>\
<h3 id="basepaws">10. Basepaws</h3>\
<p><img class="alignnone wp-image-524367 size-full" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/lead-generation-form-example-with-spin-to-win-popup-wheel.png" alt="lead-generation-form-example-with-spin-to-win-popup-wheel" width="1116" height="756" srcset="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/lead-generation-form-example-with-spin-to-win-popup-wheel.png 1116w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/lead-generation-form-example-with-spin-to-win-popup-wheel-300x203.png 300w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/lead-generation-form-example-with-spin-to-win-popup-wheel-768x520.png 768w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/lead-generation-form-example-with-spin-to-win-popup-wheel-1024x694.png 1024w" sizes="(max-width: 1116px) 100vw, 1116px" /></p>\
<p>Basepaws made sure to include a mention of their Shark Tank appearance right away on their lead generation form, using social proof on top of a few other tactics for getting more conversions.</p>\
<p><strong>Key Tactics:</strong></p>\
<ul>\
<li><a href="https://optinmonster.com/features/exit-intent/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Exit intent</a> style form triggers as user is exiting the page but before they leave</li>\
<li>Spin-to-win <a href="https://optinmonster.com/features/coupon-wheel-optins/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">coupon wheel</a> for a fun user experience and high conversions</li>\
</ul>\
<h3 id="linkedin">11. LinkedIn</h3>\
<p><img class="alignnone wp-image-524369 size-full" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/linkedin.png" alt="linkedin-lead-gen-form" width="1116" height="605" srcset="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/linkedin.png 1116w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/linkedin-300x163.png 300w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/linkedin-768x416.png 768w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/linkedin-1024x555.png 1024w" sizes="(max-width: 1116px) 100vw, 1116px" /></p>\
<p>Most of the content people want to see on LinkedIn is <a href="https://optinmonster.com/gated-content-marketing-strategy/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">gated content</a> that requires you to sign up, so this lead generation form is the first thing many website users see unless they&#8217;re registered.</p>\
<p><strong>Key Tactics:</strong></p>\
<ul>\
<li>Distraction-free landing page</li>\
<li>Social media integration for easy registration</li>\
<li>Branded colors create trust in the page since they&#8217;re recognizable</li>\
</ul>\
<h3 id="shark">12. Shark</h3>\
<p><img class="alignnone wp-image-524370 size-full" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/multiple-options-to-sign-up.png" alt="multiple-options-to-sign-up" width="1116" height="679" srcset="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/multiple-options-to-sign-up.png 1116w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/multiple-options-to-sign-up-300x183.png 300w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/multiple-options-to-sign-up-768x467.png 768w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/multiple-options-to-sign-up-1024x623.png 1024w" sizes="(max-width: 1116px) 100vw, 1116px" /></p>\
<p>Shark&#8217;s lead generation form example shows how a referral program is a brilliant way to explode your conversions by getting more than one email address per form.</p>\
<p><strong>Key Tactics:</strong></p>\
<ul>\
<li>Uses <a href="https://wpforms.com/brilliant-examples-of-social-proof-for-your-sites-forms/">social proof</a> to gather not one but 2 leads at once</li>\
<li>Adds a comment box form field to create the idea the user is sending a personal message to a friend</li>\
</ul>\
<h3 id="netflix">13. Netflix</h3>\
<p><img class="alignnone wp-image-524371 size-full" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/netflix-multipage-form-long-form.jpg" alt="netflix-multipage-form-long-form" width="1116" height="624" srcset="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/netflix-multipage-form-long-form.jpg 1116w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/netflix-multipage-form-long-form-300x168.jpg 300w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/netflix-multipage-form-long-form-768x429.jpg 768w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/netflix-multipage-form-long-form-1024x573.jpg 1024w" sizes="(max-width: 1116px) 100vw, 1116px" /></p>\
<p>Netflix&#8217;s lead generation form is straightforward, clean, and distraction-free for maximum conversions.</p>\
<p><strong>Key Tactics:</strong></p>\
<ul>\
<li>Clear and direct form submission button catches the eye immediately</li>\
<li>Multi-step form to break up a long form</li>\
<li>Actionable copy in the call to action button</li>\
</ul>\
<h3 id="peloton">14. Peloton</h3>\
<p><img class="alignnone wp-image-524372 size-full" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/offer-a-trial-to-website-visitors.jpg" alt="offer-a-trial-to-website-visitors." width="1116" height="711" srcset="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/offer-a-trial-to-website-visitors.jpg 1116w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/offer-a-trial-to-website-visitors-300x191.jpg 300w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/offer-a-trial-to-website-visitors-768x489.jpg 768w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/offer-a-trial-to-website-visitors-1024x652.jpg 1024w" sizes="(max-width: 1116px) 100vw, 1116px" /></p>\
<p>Peloton uses a very popular marketing strategy in this lead generation form — the <a href="https://optinmonster.com/free-to-paid-conversion-strategy/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">free trial</a>.</p>\
<p><strong>Key Tactics:</strong></p>\
<ul>\
<li>CTA button is brightly colored and has a <a href="https://wpforms.com/docs/how-to-customize-the-submit-button/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">customized submit button</a> with actionable copy</li>\
<li>Split style template of a <a href="https://optinmonster.com/fullscreen-optin-examples/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">full-screen optin</a> with only 3 simple form fields</li>\
</ul>\
<h3 id="okcupid">15. OkCupid</h3>\
<p><img class="alignnone wp-image-524373 size-full" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/okcupid-lead-form.png" alt="okcupid-lead-form" width="1116" height="808" srcset="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/okcupid-lead-form.png 1116w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/okcupid-lead-form-300x217.png 300w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/okcupid-lead-form-768x556.png 768w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/okcupid-lead-form-1024x741.png 1024w" sizes="(max-width: 1116px) 100vw, 1116px" /></p>\
<p>OkCupid continues the use of the very popular tactic of distraction-free form pages, on top of some other tricks.</p>\
<p><strong>Key Tactics:</strong></p>\
<ul>\
<li>Full-screen landing page to keep potential customers focused</li>\
<li>Strategic psychological use of the color blue to create trust</li>\
</ul>\
<h3 id="sme">16. Social Media Examiner</h3>\
<p><img class="alignnone wp-image-524374 size-full" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/social-proof.jpg" alt="/social-proof." width="1116" height="413" srcset="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/social-proof.jpg 1116w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/social-proof-300x111.jpg 300w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/social-proof-768x284.jpg 768w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/social-proof-1024x379.jpg 1024w" sizes="(max-width: 1116px) 100vw, 1116px" /></p>\
<p>In this example, Social Media Examiner&#8217;s lead generation form hits a lot of the right tactics to get people to convert into subscribers in exchange for an in-depth report.</p>\
<p><strong>Key Tactics:</strong></p>\
<ul>\
<li>Social proof to show how many people have already signed up</li>\
<li>Bold call to action button helps with <a href="https://optinmonster.com/beginners-guide-to-email-marketing/">email marketing</a></li>\
</ul>\
<div class="alert alert-warning"><p>Check out this post on our sister site with details on <a href="https://www.wpbeginner.com/beginners-guide/how-to-choose-a-perfect-color-scheme-for-your-wordpress-site/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">how to choose a perfect color scheme for your WordPress site</a>.</p>\
</div>\
<h3 id="simplehabit">17. Simple Habit</h3>\
<p><img class="alignnone wp-image-524375 size-full" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/text-lead.png" alt="/text-lead" width="1116" height="419" srcset="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/text-lead.png 1116w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/text-lead-300x113.png 300w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/text-lead-768x288.png 768w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/text-lead-1024x384.png 1024w" sizes="(max-width: 1116px) 100vw, 1116px" /></p>\
<p>Because this product is an app, Simple Habit gets right to what they need to do to get their website visitors to convert — download their app.</p>\
<p><strong>Key Tactics:</strong></p>\
<ul>\
<li>Only 1 form field asking for phone number on this especially <a href="https://optinmonster.com/features/mobile-friendly-popups/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">mobile-friendly</a> form</li>\
<li>A clear call to action written in 1st person and a colorful button</li>\
<li>Social proof by displaying awards/recognition on the form</li>\
</ul>\
<h3 id="marieforleo">18. Marie Forleo</h3>\
<p><img class="alignnone wp-image-524376 size-full" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/2-step-optin-example-with-monsterlinks.png" alt="marie forleo lead generation form example 2 step optin" width="1116" height="723" srcset="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/2-step-optin-example-with-monsterlinks.png 1116w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/2-step-optin-example-with-monsterlinks-300x194.png 300w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/2-step-optin-example-with-monsterlinks-768x498.png 768w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/2-step-optin-example-with-monsterlinks-1024x663.png 1024w" sizes="(max-width: 1116px) 100vw, 1116px" /></p>\
<p>To get her visitor&#8217;s email address, this popup lead generation form uses a minimalist design, which matches the overall theme of the entire site.</p>\
<p><strong>Key Tactics:</strong></p>\
<ul>\
<li>Asks for just name and email address so the user doesn&#8217;t get overwhelmed</li>\
<li>Offers a strong lead magnet to gain trust with the visitor while also capturing email</li>\
</ul>\
<h3 id="bulkly">19. Bulk.ly</h3>\
<p><img class="alignnone wp-image-524377 size-full" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/actionable-call-to-action-form-related-to-visitor.png" alt="actionable-call-to-action-form-related-to-visitor" width="1116" height="716" srcset="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/actionable-call-to-action-form-related-to-visitor.png 1116w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/actionable-call-to-action-form-related-to-visitor-300x192.png 300w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/actionable-call-to-action-form-related-to-visitor-768x493.png 768w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/actionable-call-to-action-form-related-to-visitor-1024x657.png 1024w" sizes="(max-width: 1116px) 100vw, 1116px" /></p>\
<p>Where do your eyes land when you look at the above image? In this lead generation form example, Bulk.ly made sure that the submit button was the most noticeable part of this popup with bright colors and compelling copy.</p>\
<p><strong>Key Tactics:</strong></p>\
<ul>\
<li>Offers an excellent incentive that&#8217;s targeted at their customer&#8217;s needs</li>\
<li>Uses a yes/no button tactic along with a psychological use of color on the button they want users to select</li>\
</ul>\
<h3 id="modsy">20. Modsy</h3>\
<p><img class="alignnone wp-image-524378 size-full" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/breadcrumb-in-multipage-form.jpg" alt="breadcrumb-in-multipage-form" width="1116" height="688" srcset="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/breadcrumb-in-multipage-form.jpg 1116w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/breadcrumb-in-multipage-form-300x185.jpg 300w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/breadcrumb-in-multipage-form-768x473.jpg 768w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/breadcrumb-in-multipage-form-1024x631.jpg 1024w" sizes="(max-width: 1116px) 100vw, 1116px" /></p>\
<p>Modsy knows a smart way to ask for a lot of data and personal information but still get conversions is to break a long form up into steps.</p>\
<p><strong>Key Tactics:</strong></p>\
<ul>\
<li><a href="https://wpforms.com/how-to-create-a-multi-part-form-in-wordpress/">Multi-part form</a> displays breadcrumbs to create a better user experience when filling out a long form</li>\
<li>Asks for personal information for a targeted experience</li>\
</ul>\
<h3 id="neilstrauss">21. Neil Strauss</h3>\
<p><img class="alignnone wp-image-524379 size-full" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/call-to-action-example.png" alt="call-to-action-example" width="1116" height="677" srcset="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/call-to-action-example.png 1116w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/call-to-action-example-300x182.png 300w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/call-to-action-example-768x466.png 768w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/call-to-action-example-1024x621.png 1024w" sizes="(max-width: 1116px) 100vw, 1116px" /></p>\
<p>Author and entrepreneur Neil Strauss&#8217; website uses a few tried-and-true lead conversion tactics to promote his email list.</p>\
<p><strong>Key Tactics:</strong></p>\
<ul>\
<li>Bright call to action button on a fantastic <a href="https://optinmonster.com/9-lead-magnets-to-increase-subscribers/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">lead magnet</a></li>\
<li>Displays benefits for signing up and includes power words like &#8220;controversial&#8221; to spark emotion</li>\
<li>Full-screen popup to remove any distractions</li>\
</ul>\
<h3 id="medium">22. Medium</h3>\
<p><img class="alignnone wp-image-524380 size-full" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/cookies-tracking-lead-form.jpg" alt="cookies-tracking-lead-form" width="1116" height="784" srcset="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/cookies-tracking-lead-form.jpg 1116w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/cookies-tracking-lead-form-300x211.jpg 300w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/cookies-tracking-lead-form-768x540.jpg 768w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/cookies-tracking-lead-form-1024x719.jpg 1024w" sizes="(max-width: 1116px) 100vw, 1116px" /></p>\
<p>Medium very wisely targets visitors based on their browser cookies and display a custom campaign for returning visitors.</p>\
<p><strong>Key Tactics:</strong></p>\
<ul>\
<li>Uses <a href="https://optinmonster.com/docs/how-to-target-visitors-based-on-browser-cookies/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">browser cookies</a> as a way to customize the message to returning or new website visitors</li>\
</ul>\
<h3 id="cracku">23. Cracku</h3>\
<p><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-524381" src="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/countdown-timer-on-form.png" alt="" width="1116" height="511" srcset="https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/countdown-timer-on-form.png 1116w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/countdown-timer-on-form-300x137.png 300w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/countdown-timer-on-form-768x352.png 768w, https://wpforms.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/countdown-timer-on-form-1024x469.png 1024w" sizes="(max-width: 1116px) 100vw, 1116px" /></p>\
<p>On top of using a bunch of color psychology, this lead generation form from Cracku creates a sense of urgency to drive conversions and sales.</p>\
<p><strong>Key Tactics:</strong></p>\
<ul>\
<li><a href="https://optinmonster.com/features/countdown-timer/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Countdown timers</a> are known to skyrocket form conversion rates</li>\
<li>Call to action button color draws the eye and user to click</li>\
</ul>\
<h3>What Are the Best Lead Generation Tools?</h3>\
<p>There are a lot of high-quality products out there, but only some are the <a href="https://optinmonster.com/best-lead-generation-tools/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">best lead generation tools.</a></p>\
<p>Based on ease-of-use and flexibility, <a href="http://wpforms.com">WPForms</a> and <a href="http://optinmonster.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">OptinMonster</a> are our 2 picks.</p>\
<p>They offer easy ways to set up most of the lead generation form tactics in the examples above. On top of that, they integrate with all the <a href="https://wpforms.com/top-crms-for-your-small-business/">best CRM</a> and <a href="https://wpforms.com/best-email-marketing-service-providers-with-free-options/">email marketing services</a> so they make it incredibly easy to capture and manage your leads (so you can start making more money online).</p>\
<p>Plus, both products offer a 100% money back guarantee.</p>\
<h3>Final Thoughts</h3>\
<p>And there you have it. Hopefully, these lead generation form examples gave you some great ideas on tactics you can try to increase your own conversion rates.</p>\
